title: Check-in one of the worst I've ever experienced
desc: Check in procedure is insulting. They've replaced staff at the check-in counter with computers and a system which failed for every single person trying to self-check-in at the time I was there. I felt sorry for the member of staff who was there, who was running around trying to assist and apologise on behalf of swissotel for the mess that check in is.

title: Well located and a great stay!
desc: Checking was smooth, hotel first impressions were awesome. Felt at home. Felt safe and secure and the staff was ever ready to assist if needed. Hotel connected to the mall so it was easy to get around.

title: Excellent stay!
desc: Beautiful hotel-majestic in size, even better in service! I was received at my car as I arrived, keys to my room ready!! Vanessa was brilliant. Food, stay, room cleanliness and customer care all was beyond expectations.

title: Well located
desc: We had a blast on our stay for our family vacation. Rooms were spacious and breakfast was great. Location was very convenient, lots of food at Raffles City connected to the hotel and within walking distance to Suntec and Marina Square. Staff were courteous and very helpful. Will definitely stay here again.

title: Convenient location
desc: check in experience was challenging - given that the self service system did not work. needed assistance to check in. the staff needed to manually search and input my information in the self-service kiosk to check in

title: Singapore's Best
desc: From the Moment you arrive you are treated like 5stars. The staff are fantastic. The Rooms are Modern and Fresh and the Corner Suit has great views of Singapore and Marina Bay. The Executive Lounge has sweeping views of Singapore. Great Way to watch the Sunset. The Food is also 5 star. Will be back for more!

title: A great stay albeit the Front Office experience
desc: * Location * Smack right in the intersection to the different parts of the city, location is no doubt an A* * Room * Cozy, spacious and impressive although it would have been better if its fully carpeted for the lush feel. * Service Staff * A shoutout to Leonardo whom we met at the driveway! We felt very welcome when he escorted us to the Lobby and was at hand to assist with the luggage when we left. * Front Office * When we arrived, we were walked to the island table @ Front Office counter. There was no clear indication of a queue system. We had to wait around and hope someone notices us and render assistance while the staff on duty were attending to other guests. A pre-registration was done but the process has to be repeated again when we arrived. At 3.30pm, the room

title: Normal
desc: Smooth check in and check out. Booked a room for 3 but everything was for 2. Went down to concierge to get extra bed and toiletries. Indicated birthday staycation when booking but there seems to be no special attention to the remarks, not even a simple message arranged : I Signed up ACOR membership but not know how to earn points at restaurants, and no asking for this membership when paying bills.

title: Staycation at Swissotel the Stamford
desc: The rooms air conditioning are not cold due to the ECO setup. There is no complimentary car park tickets for in house guests. This will discourage locals to select this hotel for staycation. Hope the management can review this.

title: Staycation
desc: Have to refresh on their hospitality /forget to greet and smile ! Do not give excuse that foreign talent work in Singapore ! Service comes from heart and with a built in the DNA . Is not about color or country ! Bell hop from fairmont just let us carry our own luggage to swissotel although is just next door , due to we drop off the wrong entrance! Welcome 2870 ! Who did they welcome ? Curtain

title: Expected More - Disappointed
desc: Stayed here for 3 nights. I'll start with the positives: - Great location, just steps away from City Hall MRT station. Plenty of food at the basement of Raffles City. - The bed is very comfortable and the view from the room facing MBS is fantastic. - Staff were generally friendly and did their best to assist us. - Prego service team were very professional. I was only there for a coffee and dessert but had a great experience. - Housekeeping very great and did well in keeping things neat and tidy. Now the negatives: - Arrival was a disaster. About 10 cars parked right outside the lobby, practically blocking the driveway. My car was parked at the back where the buses usually park as I had to get my suitcases out. I went in to the concierge desk to ask a bellboy for help

title: Overall below expectations
desc: Breakfast lack variations if you stay for many days. the receptionist at the kids cafe area on the last day wanted to charge me for my children's breakfast when my package comes with 4 pax breakfast. Though I had 5 pax (2 adults 3 kids), my youngest was 3 years and she told me that she will charged me for my 9 year old instead, which I went confused: the 3 year old should dine for free, right? This is no complimentary parking despite numerous asking and Paid Valet parking was more like self service parking. Swimming pool was crowded and service was slow to replenish towels and drinks delivered almost 40 mins from ordering. Make up room was replenishing slippers each day and I already told them not to waste (environmentally), as we can reuse. threw away both all of our

title: Nice family staycation
desc: Wonderful location with plenty of F&B choices both in hotel and Raffles City Mall. Pool at level 8 is perfect for a swim and sun. Renovated rooms are clean and layout is ok. Coffee machine in pantry is a plus factor instead of the usual instant coffee bag. View from this hotel is always a reason why guest are repeating to come for stay.

title: Perfect Singapore Location
desc: The Swissotel The Stamford is a premium hotel located in a wonderful central location in Singapore, with views directly over Marina Bay - iconic! Not only are their great views from the rooms, the bar on level 70 of the hotel offers panoramic views of even more of the city. The staff were accommodating, the rooms were clean and luxe and the buffet breakfast offerings were extensive. Only downside was the lack of dairy-free milk available (no free coffee for me). But there is a Starbucks right outside the breakfast restaurant. As a member of the tourism industry myself, a big well done to the team behind this wonderful hotel üëè

title: Swiss Harbor View Room amazing
desc: Booked a Swiss harbor view room & was given at 56th floor. The view was breath taking and absolutely beautiful. Took it for father's day as its my hubby's fav Hotel. I had no regrets. There were some NDP rehearsals so it was an added bonus. Check in and check out was very smooth. Highly recommended. Only setback is the swimming pool. Very small n cramp. But the room is very big and clean. Very convenient to eateries as well as the hotel is connected to the mall. Btw the difference between normal room n swiss Harbor room, is the level. Swiss Harbor is after 38th floor.

title: Hotel with a view!
desc: We stayed at the Swiss harbour view suite. It's all about the view, view, view. I can't recommend taking any other room. Big room, decent bathroom, nice tub. Slow room service. Took 1-1.5 hours to get us lunch. The reception is always crowded but that's fine. Breakfast spread was good, but couldn't you guys keep it at a higher floor with a view? Cocomelon cafe is a winner with kids. It has a play area too! Hotels in a Great location. Mrt, and mall are right below. Just that the rooms are pricey! All in all, Id definitely stay here again if I get myself a good deal!

title: Wonderful Stay
desc: Had a fabulous time here. Beautiful hotel and great location. Stunning rooms and so clean, very well equipped with toiletries and your own Nespresso machine! Lovely swimming pools. Great staff. We walked to many of the attractions but taxis are cheap and the staff will get one for you. The hotel breakfasts are amazing! And it is over a fabulous mall. Would definitely stay there again. Great value for money.

title: Great location, Excellent Property
desc: Great location, overlooking the Marina Bay. Fine property with access to the Raffles Mall. Great large modern rooms with excellent facilities, good wifi. Excellent standards of service all across. The public areas like the reception can be a bit busy. Nevertheless, this is first rate property and stay experience.

title: Well located, good service
desc: A very good service provided by the hotel. The front office desk named Cornelius was very helpful and attentive to our family needs. The green and clean program which gave a $20 voucher per day for clean the room by ourself is truly good. It‚Äôs a good deal. Very good located. Next to MRT Station, makes easier to go around.

title: Great services! Still have room for improvement.
desc: I visited Singapore for 5 nights and I choose Swissotel Stamford for the whole stay. It was a business trip and also my mother in law birthday trip. Overall experience was great! Cheers to Mr. Zai on Executive Lounge that give me the best experience on evening cocktail for the whole stay. Mr. Zai and team was very helpful and kind to all guest. The only thing I‚Äôm a bit upset when I was trying to reserve Mikuni Japanese restaurant that is also part of Swissote for 7th June 2022. I asked front office to help me reserve Mikuni restaurant since 4th June and try to reconfirm on 6th June but unfortunately when I checked on 7th June morning there still no reservation with my name on Mikuni. Luckily theres still table for me to book for dinner on 7th June. I hope the front office can

title: Friendliest staff of any hotel we‚Äôve visited
desc: We‚Äôve just finished wonderful stay at Swissotel The Stamford to celebrate Bachelorette Party for my friend. It certainly lives up 5 star rating and everything about the property was impeccable and we enjoyed the view, the room was spotlessly clean and comfortable. The hotel location is perfect, surrounded by amazing restaurants and in a central position for easy of access to everywhere via the MRT station. The biggest praise we had, was just how friendly the hotel staff Mr. Hanafi is, he even gave us complimentary cake to celebrate my friend bachelorette party. Definitely will come back to this hotel again.

title: Good Stay, Well Renovated Room
desc: Did a 3D2N staycation over the last weekend. The room was nice, well renovated, although I feel that the lack of cupboard space may be an issue to long stayers. However, the rest of the room was nice, with nice touches to the toilet and the writing desk area.

title: Great Staycation
desc: Very nice staycation, great view of the outside surroundings, very comfortable room. Hotel staff are very friendly and ready to help. Shopping, restaurants, supermarkets are all within walking distance.

title: Great staycation and customer service
desc: Stayed at SWISS HARBOUR KING PLUS connecting rooms with my family. We are mesmerised with a great view overlooking the CBD area. In the morning, able to see the sunrise. While at night time, there‚Äôs marina light show and beautiful night view of the city. Customer Service is at its best, we are greeted and assisted immediately during our arrival. Celebrated my birthday with the help of the concierge. Our whole stay was fuss free and so relaxing. The rooms are cozy with comfortable bed. I find the rooms child friendly as well. Overall, a great place to stay! Definitely coming back again to Swissotel! Thank u for your service!

title: Check-in hassle and lack of complimentary parking a big turn-off
desc: 1. Hotel is embarking on online check-in system which is fine. But the irony is, while they are pushing for digitalization, they don't accept my digital document! I show them my IC via SingPass and was told it cannot be accepted. The staff just tell me I cannot check-in. So I should head home? Thankfully, another staff came along and offer to do a manual check-in. Long story short, the management have to make up their mind, you want to go digital or not? 2. I read in the review that complimentary parking is provided after feedback from guests. However, upon check-out, I was told they don't provide complimentary parking. And my 2 nights of parking in the hotel comes up to more than $70! Very bad taste! If you are not going to provide complimentary parking, please tell your

title: Fun staycay with family
desc: Room is spacious and everyone have adequate space. Rollaway bed is a plus for elder boy. Pool is fun for kids to enjoy the noon away. Free welcome drinks could have told us on the spot instead thru email. Overall is a good stay.

title: Cosy with breathtaking view
desc: Enjoyed my stay at this hotel. Great view from my room as well Staff weee courteous and helpful My balcony faced the beautiful Marina Bay and Padang Room was cosy and clean with king sized bed. Wifi given and also nice cable selection Bathtub with hot running water. Toilet had no bidet sadly Sofa with small business table and other necessary room essentials. Iron and board. Safe. Coffee machine Price worth the view.

title: Worst Check-in Experience
desc: First time here and it will be my last. They have installed self check-in machines which did not work. They have numerous agents going around trying to help people and it still does not work. Waited 30 minutes before they fixed my issue. Then i was given a complimentary drink coupon for the inconvenience..but cannot be used for wine and spirits..so basically beer and soft drinks. Very cheap gesture. I did not use the coupon. And while waiting for the elevator to go to my room a hotel staff barged into the elevator when it arrived instead of letting the guest in first. I made a comment to her but she was texting on her phone. Get you act together.

title: Excellent Stay and wonderful location
desc: Excellent location with great view of the habour. I love chilling at the balcony to immerse in the day and night views. The facilities in the room is good and just recently renovated. Check in and check out was really fast. Request for additional amenities was also attended to quickly (items were sent to my room in less than 20 min) unlike some other hotels where I needed to wait for at least 45 min. The shopping and transportation is all within reach. Able to walk to many malls from the hotel using the covered walkways. You could even take a slow stroll to Esplanade or Marina Bays Sands. You could also explore many attractions like by foot and also experience many vintage coffeeshop behind Raffles hotel if you do not want to eat in the basement food area. Thoroughly enjoyed

title: Perfect hotel stay
desc: Check-in was done quickly and I was assigned a room fulfilling all my booking criteria. Bedding was exceptionnal with mattress and soft bed linens of the utmost comfort. Shower water pressure was very good and no annoying noise came from A/C, pipes or other surrounding rooms. Housekeeping was done discretely and efficiently. Amount charged at check out was accurate and ALL ACCOR loyalty points forwarded to my account very quickly. All the staff I interacted with were well educated with good manners and customer satisfaction oriented. Hotel location is ideal in the very center of the city with a SMRT train station -City Hall- linking the Swissotel Stamford to the airport in 30 minutes with one same level platform change. However, there is little space available in the

title: Great location
desc: The hotel is centrally located right in the city centre and is easy to navigate around. There is a kids pool on the 8th floor which is great for kids, however the pool only gets the sun from the late morning onwards so it can be a little chilly. The spa facilities in the hotel is also nice to have, however some maintenance is required. the facility is pretty old (think vintage wooden lockers) and unfortunately there was dead cockroaches found floating in the heated pool + cold pool in the Men's spa. Imagine the horror! The hotel could also improve its check-in processes as its currently quite haphazard and there was difficulty finding staff to handle the check in. Free parking coupons for hotel guests would be welcome, too.

title: Good stay & service by swissotel
desc: Got my room upgraded to harbour view, get the access to lounge & tried their cocktail hour buffet. Easy check-in & check-out Well located in raffless city, next to mcd & mrt station and connect to the mall Definetly will stay at this hotel again in my next visit

title: Great stay
desc: Love the stay here. Rooms were great & comfortable, location was strategic, walking distance to MRT, all the staffs were friendly , helpful & pleasant. The hotel attempts to go eco friendly is also good, without causing discomfort for guests.

title: A mix of city life and history learning journey.
desc: I arrived at 3.15 p.m. on Sunday. Check-in was fast. Had a small issue initially but was quickly resolved. Thank you, Fateha. Room and toilet were very clean with complete amenities. My room had a partial view of the city and harbour. Near to historical colonial buildings, National Gallery and Singapore River. Check-out was a breeze too. Enjoyed the stay.

title: Birthday Staycation
desc: Checked in on 09 June for a night and the view overlooking Esplanade/MBS was spectaculous. Ivan was a star - taking great care of my stay and ensuring all my needs were well taken care of. Check-in by him was seamless as well. Another icing on the cake would be the late check-out provided courtesy of Ivan. Great stay, excellent service!

title: Great to be home!
desc: Fantastic Service.....Warm personalities.....and Great Attitute Staff and Service Ambassadors......From the Doorman ....Front Desk Ambassadors....Meticulous Housekeepers and Club Floor Butlers and Smiling Chefs Pls congratulate these Ambassadors for me: Miss Eddy Tan,Ron Sanson, RonSeah, ZhiQi, Hui Shie, Angelia, Rhea, Cedric, Zai, Juninee and Zafir....plus Bfast Chef Dinesh! They really made me feel recognised, important and loved with their warm tender love and care throughout my Staycation!

title: Family stay
desc: Great location, room and staff. Loved the view from our Harbour view room. There was a cake in our room for my son‚Äôs birthday when we arrived home at the end of the day- which was lovely. Easy access to shops and MRT. Great for families. We will be back.

title: A wonderful stay in the Swissotel The Stamford in Singapore
desc: A wonderful stay in a great hotel The Swissotel The Stamford with a team led by Ms Eddy Tan. From day one to my 10th night was perfect. Ms Eddy Tan made sure that I had comfortable & happy stay. All my friends & relatives were impressed with the services i received

title: Best Views in Singapore , Excellent Hotel
desc: All hotel journeys begin with checkin . The experiance at Checkin was so good that everything from there went smoothly. Must compliment Ms Fatima for helping us check in effortlessly and providing 2 excellent rooms with great views. The hotel was very clean , The views of Gardens by the bay and the entire bay area were amazing. Breakfast options were splendid at both the locations. The location of the hotel itsel is suberb with access to a shopping mall and other restaurents directly connected. In walking distance one can cover most of the main tourist attractions.

title: Good hotel in the heart of Singapore!
desc: I stayed in the Swissotel, Singapore, for business. It's a nice hotel in a buzzy part of town! But I've stayed in better hotels in Singapore. The service could have been better, but it was fine for a couple of nights.

title: Super Hotel with stunning views
desc: We stayed July 2022, and had 2 adjoining rooms on floor 60. We also had the most stunning views over the harbour, and Marina Bay Sands Hotel. Everything from check in onwards was exceptional. The rooms were huge and contained everything you could want. Huge beds, lots of seating options, and a huge bathroom. We had bottled water and a plate of fruit too. We had breakfast which was very varied in options. The speed of the lifts were amazing. I would highly recommend anyone staying here. We found it was very well placed near Raffles City Shopping Mall. I would love to come back here it was amazing!! The staff were super friendly and efficient.

title: Back to my 2nd home
desc: It's back to my 2nd home after nearly 3 years Therefore it's a great experience and all was supported by the fantastic staff of the hotel Only can recommend this place to any traveler's as it is a great experience to stay here Thank you so much to all of the staff

title: Fantastic Stay
desc: Love this property. Room is big and the view was excellent. Love the balcony and the good quality amenities. Had the dinner buffet at Asian Market Cafe and the food was awesome. Service was top notch and the variety was good. Staff were always checking and replenishing the food and prompt in clearing the tables.

title: Good experience and will return to stay
desc: It has been a pleasure to Swiss√¥tel The Stamford. No hassle check in, top customer service and spacious room. It ticks all boxes. Good location and easy access to MRT station. We will stay again. Great view from the hotel room.

title: Amazing
desc: Centrally Located, the Rooms have a excellent view (harbour View located on higher floor), Walking distance to most of the attractions. Excellent spread of breakfast, express check -in and check - out literally like less than 5mins. Raffles city mall below the hotel, MRT next to the hotel.

title: Executive lounge - Cedric fantastic service!
desc: Cedric provided fantastic service! He was very attentive and knows how to pour a beer, even better than us ignorant Australians! I would certainly recommend a visit to the executive lounge and ask for Cedric to pour your beer! 6 stars out of 5!

title: Mrs
desc: We lived in 66 level with club breakfast. Very good location, clean rooms, brilliant staff. I would like to say big thank you to Panir Khalid for help us to find our lost item. We will come back again.

title: Average stay, disorganised service, broken rooms and shower flooding
desc: All in all, a just above average stay at Swissotel. All seemingly nice on the surface but when it comes to details, it was lacking in standard. Check-in during peak time was chaotic, some staff seemingly disinterested in helping, shower bathroom flooding the floor due to a poor bathtub design, broken and loose towel racks, closet doors not working well, and iron broken. All in all, just a collection of minor things that collectively take away from what could have been a wonderful stay at a 'Premium' hotel range within the Accor brands.

title: Comfortable Suite, Poor service and none-recognition of Diamond Accor Status
desc: We checked into the Crest King Suite at Swissotel the Stamford. The spacious Crest King Suite is the second highest tiered suite (just one tier below the Presidential Suite), having a total floor area of 87 m¬≤. The Crest King Suite uses a wooden and earthy tone in its d√©cor, which brings a sense of calmness and a cosy feel. The furniture in the suite is placed near the walls, maximising the usable space for its guests. Our suite sits on one of the hotel‚Äôs top floors, giving us sweeping views of downtown Singapore. I like the inclusion of a Powder Room next to the main entrance to the suite. The elongated Powder Room is stylishly fitted with a toilet and a standalone sink. Decked in light brown marble tiles and dark brown fittings, the theme in the Powder Room is consistent

title: Awesome staycay!
desc: It was amazing experience - we actually booked for my aunt birthday celebration and again the team exceeded our expectation. Special mention to Ms Eddy Tan - she went above and beyond her duties. She was very thoughtful coz she had asked if I need to book a body massage at Willow Spa. So my family and I had a wonderful time and we will booked again in future! Hats-off to Ms Eddy and team!

title: Very pleasant stay in a room with a great view
desc: Newly renovated room was very nice . Minor design issues in bathroom - not very practical. Room was spacious , clean and bright. Excellent view. Ask for upgrade to higher floor room facing the Padang. Carpets were clean, no smell. Lobby was spacious and not crowded. Staff were very helpful too.

title: Great stay and lovely helpful staff but really hard beds. Ask for a mattress topper!
desc: I have stayed at this hotel several times since it was the Westin Stamford and now the Swissotel but it‚Äôs been a while since I‚Äôve stayed here since before the pandemic. I do love this hotel and it‚Äôs facilities and amenities. The newly renovated rooms are fantastic. I have to say again the beds though are the hardest I‚Äôve ever slept on. It was like being on a wooden bench. I have stayed at hundreds of hotels and over 20 hotels since the pandemic. My parents checked out after one night however after advising Chelsea at reception of the situation, she assisted me with organising a mattress topper for my room. I feel that with the hard mattress in the room, a mattress topper should be a standard. I know not everyone likes a plush mattress however at the least it should be a medium.

title: Not happy
desc: Two things: 1. The hotel staff refused to place a second baby cot in the room for our second child so that she had to sleep in our bed resulting in two terrible nights where my wife and I had no sleep at all. Multiple requests where waived with the excuse that it's not safe and secure. The room was big enough for a second baby cot without causing a safety issue, the table for example could be replaced and so many other alternatives were available. I am deeply disappointed by the attitude of the staff and unwillingness to come up with an alternative as they could clearly see and conclude that it was unpleasant for us. 2. As we travel with a baby who gets fed by using a bottle with milk we asked the staff to clean the bottle so that we could use it again and so that we did not

title: Great stay, great location
desc: The hotel was excellent, rooms clean, staff helpful, great location. There is only one thing I will mark them down on and that was breakfast options for Gluten Free were very sad. I travelled with 2 coeliac's and all they could eat for breakfast was cornflakes, every day. There was some GF bread on 2 out of the 5 days we stayed but nothing to go with it except some beetroot salad. We ate at Clove.

title: Wonderful stay! Best poolside cocktails ever!
desc: My friend & I had a couple of days relaxation at the hotel before a work conference & it was wonderful. Amazing view from our harbour view room on the 57th floor, comfy bed & super quiet. The staff were lovely to deal with & nothing was too much trouble. A special thank you to Jose & Steven who work at the pool bar. They were an absolute delight, so friendly & polite & made the most delicious cocktails........just quietly, their Singapore Sling was better than the Raffles one too! Thanks guys. Your hospitality was next to none. 10 stars. Kath & Ali

title: Level65
desc: What a wonderful experience staying at the Stafford. My only criticism is the food on level 65 was not what we expected however the service and hospitality shown by Cedric is the reason why I am giving 5 stars. Thank you Cedric.

title: Fabulous stay
desc: This is thus far the most awesome staycation in Singapore. Staff: Upon arrival, my daughter actually vomitted due to car sickness. The staff immediately help by passing some tissue and assist us in checking in. Mr Hanafi really go all the way out in helping us to check for the next available room for upgrading, providing us with the details of various room and in the end we manage to upgrade our room to skyline suite at reasonable top up price. He even assist to escot us to the room and explain the room in details. It is really a pity that he is just a intern over there. I would love to see him around in our next stay. Room: Fabulous! The view is awesome. Big and comfy. I can't ask for more. The size is perfect for 2 active kids to run around. Pool: Nice pool but a pity that

title: Nice Hotel at SG
desc: Our stay at Swissotel SG is such a bliss! I liked that this hotel has mall attached to it, also Esplanade & Cityhall MRT station is also very near to it. It is also near to Suntec & Marina Square. I also commend their staff for their prompt response on our requests. Room is also spacious & have a great view in the balcony area.

title: Perfect Location
desc: This place is right smacked between most attractions in Singapore - Merlion Park, Singapore Flyer, Esplanade, etc. Everything is within walking distance, or just a short train or bus ride away. Check in was smooth, room was great. The bed was huge. The harbour view is really amazing, and worth the upgrade. We were there for our toddler's birthday staycation and the hotel kindly arranged for a cake for us as well. Staff were lovely and check in and out were smooth. We would definitely be back again.

title: Pleasant and enjoyable stay
desc: The smart check-in was quick and seamless. We were expecting a complimentary birthday cake which was informed in advanced but didn't receive any during our stay. However, the upgrade to a higher floor made up for it and we enjoyed the balcony view. All in all, it was still a pleasant experience.

title: Level 65
desc: Stayed at Fairmont last time and was in Stamford for this time. The experience was bad until we met cedric from the lounge. He was very helpful , he know how to take care of the guest. Thanks cedric for your service.

title: Had a wonderful time!
desc: Got an amazing suite that overlooked the city/Marina Bay for the NDP fireworks and it was just spectacular, most definitely highlight of the year so far. The skyline and surrounding buildings at night were a sight to behold as well. Definitely have to thank Ghafar, Fu Hui and XiaoYong for getting the room ready, it felt so nice and welcoming upon entering. The kids were also thrilled with the little gifts waiting for them and immediately went for them first! The F&B amenities was enjoyed later in the evening by the adults. Everything was just immaculate in the room and it was easy to feel at home. It was a wonderful stay and experience and we leave with precious memories to cherish for a long, long time. - The hotel is also easy to get to with many food options readily

title: Great hotel but buffet breakfast needs urgent attention.
desc: My first time back to the Swissotel in about five years and great to see the public areas and rooms have all had a refurb. Love the rooms which are full of conveniently located power points and USB ports as well as an espresso machine. Same great pool area and excellent gym and spa. What I found really disappointing was the buffet breakfast in Clove. All three days that I attended breakfast there were shortcomings. Firstly, the restaurant is enormous with a very large capacity and each day there was a line of varying lengths to access the restaurant. Although the choice of foods are excellent there were severe shortcomings in replenishing items. Several times on each days I waited up to fifteen minutes for items to be replaced. The huge restaurant also only has two self

title: Will stay here again when in Singapore
desc: This is a very comfortable and stylish hotel, with well-appointed rooms perfect for rest and work, with a fantastic firm bed, small couch, desk and chair, plenty of electrical outlets where you need them (each side of bed and at the desk); plenty of storage for longer stays, and a very nice shower and tub. Great central location maybe a 15 minute walk to Gardens by the Bay, with beautiful views when facing the marina. Staff has been incredibly helpful and pleasant; room service prompt. Nespresso machine and mini-fridge (not stocked) and quite large room safe are included. My only minor criticism is the lighting controls, which are unusable in the dark (they are touch panel with no lighting themselves, so one has to fumble in the dark to try and turn on a light). But when I

title: Excellent stay
desc: Excellent room. Excellent location and excellent view. Truly amazing place to stay in singapore. Well worth the price paid. It‚Äôs so convenient when there‚Äôs a huge shopping center below you and the mrt too. The service was also excellent. What else to say?

title: Good hotel in the centre of Singapore
desc: The hotel is quite large( tall ..88 floors) The rooms are very decent size with good amenities. The two restaurants Clover and Asian kitchen serve wide variety of food of different cuisine The self check in was a let down‚Ä¶ almost every one wanted help to check in. Very nice location and there is mall and MRT in the same campus Over all good experience

title: Excellent service
desc: The mode of service delivery at the hotel was top notch. My family was well received at the reception and we got good information on how to find our way around from the staff. Breakfast was yum! The location was perfect. We will be back!

title: Great location, good stay.
desc: Loved our room with the view on the 62nd floor. Comfortable bed and everything you need. A great location to walk or taxi to lots of places. Clean and friendly hotel all staff were always lovely and helpful. We always love the Club Room of course!! Felt very relaxed and comfortable on our stay.

title: Great stay
desc: This is our second time to stay with Swissotel the Stamford as a family, the check-in was super smooth with the pre-arranged rollaway bed ready in the room. Upgraded to a room with view over the MBS which is gorgeous view late night. The facilities in the hotel are top-notch, with the breakfast of really high standard to cater for both east and west appetites. Highly recommend for anyone visiting Singapore, both for business or casual purpose, to choose this centre located hotel as their base.

title: A Birthday to remember
desc: We will be back definitely. The surprise staycation with my kids on my birthday is one for the books. The great harbor view facing Marina Bay Sands and Merlion is definitely a must be for every family visiting Singapore. Breakfast and lunch are a feast not to be missed. Love the hospitality of the team from the concierge to the shuttle attendant. Foodcourt at the basement connecting with other hotel reminds me of Hongkongs Marco Polo hotel. Really a memorable birthday celebration with a complimentary cake to top it off. Kudos!

title: A comfortable Staycation
desc: Although I'm not entitled to any upgrade, as I was told based on my membership I had already booked the highest entitlement. But overall the room which I booked was still comfortable and cosy. The view is also excellent as allocated level 62.

title: Room for improvement
desc: Despite having the quick check in with the QR code, we have to show our identity card and the fron desk cannot handle the crowd. Wasted more than 20mins at the counter. Was given the totally wrong type of room at 12th floor, looking at the recreation center even Vicky told me that it was an upgrade. I paid for the harbor view and high floor. Only after showing her my email confirmation, she changed our room to 43rd floor. It was an heaven and earth of difference view. Would have given a 8 if not for this, check out was good. Complimentary birthday cake came and breakfast was OK.

title: Good Room Housekeeping but So so Club Lounge Experience
desc: The marina bay view lookout from the club lounge is fantastic, no doubt. During the evening cocktail at the executive lounge, I asked Gin Tonic from a male leader. He claimed that the lounge is self-service, I was speechless, ha... He still assists me with the drink anyway. The spread of food is limited comparing some premium hotels in town. I think the staff should dress up more formally instead of just being equipped with T-shirts like costumes. You see how professionally dressed up at Fairmount Gold Lounge.

title: Well located
desc: My experience was good: The room was comfortable, very clean and with a nice view. The Hotel personnel were kind and supportive. The food in the restaurants(inside the hotel) was good, and personnel from the restaurant(inside the hotel) were kind

title: OK stay
desc: The hotel is nice with excellent views. Overall, however, the service let us down. No welcome gift as a gold member. We opted to get some credit for dining etc. by forgoing the housekeeping service but it was missed when calculating our bill on departure which was annoying. The contactless check-in and checkout just doesn't work for me. I prefer to deal with an actual person. It is particularly unsatisfactory when you have a problem. Got conflicting and inaccurate information on where to use our complimentary drink vouchers. The rooms are nice but the lighting is really annoying. It needs to come with a manual on how to operate and we never did work out how to immobilize the annoying motion sensor night light. Pool area is OK. There was a bit of maintenance going on so

title: Close to MRT, good underground food court. Great view of the F1 track
desc: Spacious room. Good wardrobe space. Practicle desk/dinning area. Amazing view of the F1 track & Marina bay from the balcony-nothing compares. Could also hear the music from the concerts. Attached shopping mall is so convenient.

title: Excellent Stay
desc: Thank you Swissotel, I had an amazing stay. Despite the hectic weekend there, but your staffs had not failed us. We were from Ritz Carlton on the previous night and had a horrid experience there but not at the Swissotel. Will come back next year as we had been since 2017.

title: Family holiday
desc: 5 star holiday in Singapore, stayed at the Swissotel Stamford located in the heart of Singapore Central to everything. 15min to Sentosa Island, 20min to high end shopping on Orchard road and 10min to either China town or little India. My 4th time in Singapore and I'll be back. The place constantly changes and grows. People are beautiful so is the food

title: Great Location
desc: The hotel is in a great location and has wonderful views of he city. Rooms are large, modern and clean. The bed was very comfortable and pillows nice a plump. The wifi works very well in all areas. The hotel has an outdoor pool and a spa too.

title: Excellent location and amazing view!
desc: Excellent location and amazing view! Friendly staff. Room clean! It would better if they bring back the individual package of toiletries instead bulk big bottles as it felt like sharing personal items with past customers in the same room.

title: Great location
desc: I cannot fault this hotel. The location was perfect- so central and convenient to so many attractions (and shops everywhere!). The staff were helpful and friendly, especially concierge Venessa who was just amazing! The facilities available in the hotel were great, plenty of dining options and the spa was lovely. The room was spacious, the bedding was super comfortable and the coffee, tea and water were replenished daily, which was a very welcome addition. Also, our view of the bay was amazing!

title: Great stay in a fantastic location.
desc: Fantastic location, great staff and room. The view from level 65 is outstanding! Stayed for 2 days in a club room on level 60 with views across to Marina Bay. Very comfortable room. The bathroom is a little small but that is the only drawback. Lovely pool area with lounges and cabanas. The door staff are some of the best I have ever experienced. It was the little touches that made it a great stay.

title: Great elite recognition and stellar service at Level 65
desc: This was also one of my postponed-multiple-times staycays and I am super glad I managed to do it! ‚ù§Ô∏è The Swiss Signature Suite is now one of my fav rooms in SG - the double balcony, the generous work + living area, and the comfy firm bed. An entire 50SqM of gorgeous space which I wouldn‚Äôt mind spending a week in üôà Fantabulous elite recognition as an ALL Platinum: upsized welcome amenities, and /stellar service especially by the Level 65 team - Zhi Qi, Ivan, Clarence, the two Ronalds, and Romulus. üåü The eats at Level 65 were high quality calories and drinks were okay-ish but would have liked having a sparkling option ü•∂ A malfunction of the high rise lifts on check out day meant a joyride in their service lifts to get to my room which was memorable to say the least üëª I

title: One of the Very Best
desc: We stayed at this hotel during the FHA show in room 6259 which is on one of the executive floors. The room was very, very clean and had a smart set-up. There was also a Nespresso machine, along with bottles of complimentary water and TWG Tea. We had a very comfortable stay with good sleep quality. I was very impressed and just had to write this review. I have never stayed in a hotel where I did not find a single strand of hair in the bathroom or in a corner of the room and Swissotel is the very first one. Kudos to their Housekeeping! The executive lounge is also worth commending and we had our breakfast there every morning, away from the hustle and bustle. Service was excellent, especially by Ria, who made sure that we had everything we need.

title: Great staff and great ambiance. Very clean and well-maintained
desc: I didn't get to enjoy the room much, but it did give me a much needed rest after the conference. The decorations were good and the soundproofing was up to standard. I would like to have a bidet though. I expected it at such a hotel.

title: Well located, great rooms, great service
desc: Great service, great location, great views of the city. No request was too much trouble. Service always with a smile. Although a large hotel, well set out and serviced so yo felt it was personal. Great view for the F1 if interested.

title: Still Excellent!
desc: This hotel was heavily renovated since my last stay and it‚Äôs a big improvement. It was a great hotel before - last time I stayed in May 2015 the rooms were basically the same as they were the time I stayed before that in Jan 2007. However the 2019 renovation has really given this hotel a lift. The building itself is beautiful, it was the tallest hotel in the world when it first opened in 1986. It‚Äôs great to see that it‚Äôs been well taken care of and still has amazing views particularly from the executive lounge on level 65 which I had access to. Awesome location right on top of City Hall MRT and about 15 mins walk to the Merlion. Might not be as insanely impressive as Marina Bay Sands but this hotel is special to me and is still on par with the best.

title: Not impressed
desc: Having stayed at the St Regis, the Westin in Singapore, this is much much poorer. The room decor with the open cupboard is just not premium. The check in experience is also very poor. And I‚Äôm a good Accor member - clearly not planning to stay here or any other Accor hotel

title: Wonderful hotel with amazing service
desc: The hotel was great - conveniently located, room was newly renovated with amazing view, but the service is the biggest stand out for me. They were helpful, attentive and go out of their way give us an lovely experience. Hey call out to Ronald in the lounge who was super helpful, thank you so much!!

title: Overall good stay!
desc: Good stay, variety of buffet breakfast is good. The only downside is room aircon is not cold. Location and customer service is good. Access to Raffles City mall is plus point. Recommended for family holiday.

title: Excellent
desc: Excellent stay with great amenities and comfortable rooms. Breakfast was nice and the rooms are quiet large. No issues during check-in or check out. Quiet a busy hotel with many guests checking in and out at each interval.

title: Courteous staff, well located property
desc: The location is awesome, you are few minutes away from all local attractions. Staff is polite and always eager to help. I can tell from my experience that the housekeeping teams take utmost care of your belongings. Neat and clean rooms, quite spacious for a family.

title: Nice City Hotel near Marina Bay
desc: A well connected hotel for family and business stay. Conveniently located with lots of shops and eatery around the area. Try to stay in executive room with lounge access at level 72. You will enjoy a great view of Singapore.

title: Birthday stay in 2022
desc: Great birthday staycation since the last time l(before Covid). Had a great time with family and friends during this stay. A special thank to the director of FO ops - Kho Yung Chien and her group of hotel personnel that make this such a happy and enjoyable trip. Stayed in a signature suite room, hopefully next time round, will stay in the other suite room. Nice view with 2 separate balconies. Staffs at the executive lounge are friendly. Have to give credit to the guy (Filipino) - sorry I didn‚Äôt get his name during the stay, whom checked me in and we encountered a couple of times when in the lounge. Very helpful and attentive. Will be back again.

title: Not the best experience with Swissotel
desc: Was hoping for a pleasant stay in the Junior Suite room but water leaking from the ceiling of the bathroom. I hoped it wasn't sewerage water that dripped on my head when I was using the toilet bowl. Second time at Swissotel at Stamford, but now I question if I will consider staying in the hotel again for future travel. Good customer service (responsive to call and issue) didn't help to resolve the leak. The technician was professional and apologetic. Was informed that it would be a major repair (tearing apart the ceiling). The room should not have been given out to any guest in the first place. It is not the fault of the technician for not being resolve the issue.

title: My first Singapore experience
desc: The hotel is conveniently located in the city center and is a tall and large modern building. While staying at the hotel, I received a warm welcome and was able to achieve my business goals without any inconvenience. I recommend this hotel to others as well. However, the breakfast was not as varied as expected.

title: Great Stay
desc: Easy check in, recognition of Accor membership and status together with allocation of appropriate reward during the stay was great. Rooms facing the harbor are fantastic - the view is just amazing. Rooms are very well appointed.

title: Great location and view
desc: we had booked a bay view room. Upon checking in we realized that our room technically had a bay view but at a very sharp angle and had two double beds. I spoke to one of the young ladies that checked us in and she was able to change our room to a very bay view on the 31st floor with a king bed. That made all the difference for us and we really enjoyed our stay and especially the view of the Sands hotel and the gardens from our room. My only question was, if the better room was available, why was it not given from the beginning

title: Very Refreshing Stay at the Crest Suite
desc: Love the ID design of the fairly newly renovated Crest Suite at the Stamford Swisshotel. I may just decide to switch my loyalty over from a Platinum Elite member with the Bonvoy Marriott Group! The Lounge had a beautiful scenic view of the bay and I even had a private gym to use on the 65th floor.

title: Review Swiss√¥tel The Stamford
desc: We stayed at Swiss√¥tel The Stamford, Premier Harbour View King. The room view is very nice. Very convenient Check-in/out process. Even we check-in weekend, we do not need to wait so long. Check-out as well. Thanks for the chocolate cake as our anniversary gift. It‚Äôs really delicious.

title: Very Enjoyable Stay
desc: Nice hotel in a fantastic location.Clean, Very comfortable beds and extra long pillows. Great breakfast options at hotel or food hall and market place at Raffles City next door, and convenient MRT station two mins away . Would recommend this hotel to family and friends

title: Mr
desc: Very good location, very nice stuff. Everything was perfect. Thank you Swiss√¥tel the Stamford Singapore. The room is big and the king size bad was amazing. The harbor view on MBS was just Great. We will come back for sure.

title: Excellent Location and Good Service
desc: Another visit by me and again a great experience. Was given the same room with a lovely view. No hesitation in recommending to stay here. Staff is attentive and service is excellent. Rooms are clean and spacious.

title: Well located, great service.
desc: The room was modern with a great view of Marina Bay Sands. The hotel is next door to City Hall MRT station and walking distance to Marina Bay Sands. There is a variety of restaurants to choose from to dine. Concierge and reception very helpful.

title: Perfect stay
desc: Fantastic stay, fantastic staff. From walking in to leaving our stay could have not been more perfect. Highly recommend and would stay again. Club room/lounge definitely worth the extra again lovely helpful staff.

title: Amazing service
desc: The service from the team, particularly Rea was wonderful. because I didn‚Äôt book through Accor, my benefits and ability to earn points was not recognised. the Accor membership and status was pointless

title: üëçüèªüëçüèª
desc: Fantastic guest services, good location, well renovated rooms. Hotel is clean, services are prompt. The premier harbour room has a good view of the Marina Bay. Would highly recommend to get a room with a high floor for an unblocked view. Thank you Perseus for your assistance!

title: Club lounge on L65.
desc: The staff on L65 were fantastic especially Ria and Eddy. Views were incredible and our group of 8 were well looked after. Food was lovely although a bit repetitive when u stay for a long time. Would recommend even just for the view and the staff.

title: beautiful view
desc: Hotel room was big, with a balcony that looks out to Marina Bay Sands. The view from my room was amazing! The room came with a nespresso machine. There were 2 big king single beds in our room, as well as a big sofa and desk. The room was also brightly lit and designed beautifully. The housekeeping was thoughtful and kind. They helped organize our toiletries! Check in and check out experience was smooth and quick. The hotel is also connected to Raffles City Mall, and very close to the station. I would highly recommend this hotel to anyone looking for a short weekend getaway.

title: Comfy Stay with Great View
desc: Had my room upgraded by luck. My upgraded room is huge with a huge bed and a balcony overlooking Singapore City Centre, The Merlion Park, The Esplanade and Marina Bay Sand‚Ä¶ the room is clean and comfy. Everything is good and perfect. Very convenient as the hotel is attached with Raffles City.

title: Excellent location, service and everything else
desc: Stayed 3 nights on a business trip. My room had a balcony and the view was of Marina Bay. Absolutely amazing scenery. Location-wise it is perfect as it is connected to the City Hall MRT. Very convenient. And for a casual jogger like me, the location is perfect for a run around the Marina Bay. The recptionists were very pleasant people and welcomed me cheerfully despite checking in at close to midnight. Checkout was also done smoothly by a very cheerful lady, who thanked me with utmost sincerity for choosing Swissotel The room itself is rather big, and extremely clean. Lots of mineral water provided, enough toiletries and a very comfortable bed. Breakfast was a delight, with a huge variety to choose from. Negatives? Couldnt find any. Will return to stay here again next

title: good stay
desc: I stay there to celebrate our wedding anniversary. Over all was good and enjoy the stay. But one thing, I litte bit dissapointed because I didnt got any decoration or cake or honeymoon set that I mention before by email. When I stayed at Swissotel Jakarta, I got all that hehehe,,maybe different management :)

title: highly recommended
desc: The hotel is located in the very centre of Singapore with tube connections in the same building. The rooms are newly renovated (2022) with amazing bird view of Singapore downtown. All hotel employees i have met are very friendly and willing to help. Especially we would appreciate the heartwarming assistance of ms Wan W. Written by a loyal Accor member: 30840965313042PI

title: Great location and room - pity about the restaurants
desc: 2 day stop over in Singapore - Great Location and my room was excellent with lovely bed linen.BUT after a long walk we were tired - we decided to eat at the hotel the Skai bar would be perfect snack and drinks with a view - not possible the lounge closed for a private function - OK then the chinese restaurant - nope closed - OK then Clove the Indian restaurant - nope FULL. We finally settled for room service - impossible to order on my phone - eventually went to concierge who helped - delicious - but not the ambiance we planned - and the room service waiter could not lower my table after 40 minutes of trying - so I lived with the table in my room all night

title: Great Location
desc: Stayed there on a business trip in October 2022. Great location, spacious rooms. Loved the view of the harbour. Stunning! It there is something to criticise, it would be the breakfast. It was ok but I feel there should be more hot items on the buffet. Also the one size coffee/tea cup fits all is not ideal when you want to drink an espresso. But besides these minor comments, I had a great stay and on my next trip to Singapore I will definitely stay there again. Thank you.

title: Short Stay
desc: We had a very short stay here of only 2 nights but the staff were incredible. We were greeted by a self checkin system which was amazing and handled very well. One member of staff went out of his way to get a soft toy for each of my girls which was such a lovely touch and we were so pleased with. The location is amazing - you are right in the CBD surrounded by things to do and the room was so spacious for 4 people. Our only hiccup was our washing was taken from our room without our consent (we hadn't filled out any of the paper work only used the laundry bag to keep things seperate) but the hotel compensated us for this rather than charging as it wasn't something we had requested. Over all it was an incredible stay and we will absolutley come back again.

title: Great location and attentive staff
desc: The hotel is centrally located with connectivity to a mall, MRT system and various caf√©s. The in room dining was quick and food was decent. I didn‚Äôt book the breakfast buffet as comments online said there are long queues; that‚Äôs the last thing I want in the morning. Went to coffee bean cafe and ordered in room dining as an alternative, both of which worked fine. Check out was smooth as it only took 30 seconds. One star subtracted because of check in time and those self check in machines. I hope management get rid of those. Imagine getting down from a 7-8 hours flight and trying to learn to self check in. I just want to hand over my passport and credit card and get my room card and get on with it.

title: Location excellent. Good room. Near mall and close to esplanade
desc: Stayed for a week in Singapore at various hotels. Liking the Swissotel brand also booked 2 nights at Swissotel Singapore. Although I have a paid ALL account, forgot to book through the Accor ALL website. Bit disappointed about not getting an upgrade or higher floor. Had expressed this also during my stay, but no feedback from the hotel during my stay though. If you share a questionnaire during, then feedback also about it during the stay! Would I book again. Probably yes. Maybe even coming weekend...

title: Wonderful Stay Great Staff
desc: The hotel staff were very helpful and friendly which made our stay even more special. The hotel facilities and position close to the City Hall metro station made for a nice relaxing stay, easy to get to the Cities attractions and easy to get back to the hotel. Highly Recommended

title: F1 experience in Swissotel The Stamford
desc: As part of the F1 Singapore afterparty's we have stayed in Swissotel The Stamford. The hotel was in front of the racetrack at the Stamford Stand side. It was literally less than 5 minutes walk from the hotel to the racetrack. Swissotel The Stamford is a very nice and modern hotel with a friendly staff. The rooms are spacious and everything you need is available. Daily cleaning and fresh towels. The hotel is next to Raffles shoppingmall where you have several restaurants and shops.

title: Harbour View rooms worth the cost.
desc: Very large, busy and largely impersonal hotel. Stayed 14 nights after a cruise was cancelled and needed a getaway, so booked a Harbourview room with breakfast for approximately $600 AUD per night. Beautiful view and reasonable room, but nothing exceptional for the price ‚Ä¶ the view was probably the best part of my stay. Breakfast was in one of 2 venues and the main one (Clove) often had a long line up to get a table. Weekends were a complete mess with locals enjoying a staycation and adding to the numbers. It was not unusual to have 200 people having breakfast (buffet) at the same time. If you don‚Äôt mind crowds, the food was good. Didn‚Äôt eat at the restaurants otherwise- the prices were too high and there are numerous other places nearby. On that, the hotel is in a great

title: Time well spent
desc: We spent 4 nights at the Swissotel during our trip to Singapore. This is perfectly located, very near to some of the main attractions of Singapore (infact can easily walk down to places such as Merlion, Suntex city, Flyer etc..) The experience of staying at one of the tallest hotels is definitely an attraction of this hotel - you can request for a higher floor and the reservation team takes a note of this (of course based on the availability). Concierge desk at the hotel is always there to assist you with any queries and help at plan your stay at Singapore - talk to them for some valuable tips.

title: Great location, super views, friendly staff.
desc: Great location, super harbour view (if you book one), friendly staff. Our go to hotel in Singapore, wouldn‚Äôt now think to stay anywhere else. Special mention to Gaylen from Housekeeping, who went above and beyond on a certain request we made.

title: Pathetic checkin and below Average breakfast
desc: I would like to mention, the only USP of this hotel is the location and the view...Please avoid this hotel otherwise. .Travelled with a 2 and half year old child..Am an Accor silver member ...Was denied an early check in inspite of an early request ...My daughter was crying continuously because she wanted to rest but however checkin staff(ladies) were absolutely not concerned. in fact they were Arrogant ...When I rerequeted one of them because of the child, she said we can't help and that we are not concerned if you are an Accor silver member. ... Breakfast was below average for a 5 star hotel ...15 mins lines on weekends to juts enter the breakfast place and get seated Bad experience. ..Please avoid the hotel .. The staff at Checkin will RUIN your day.

title: Front row experience with a perfect view!
desc: Fantastic view of Formula 1 night race! We actually have tickets but because the view is phenomenal (and it was starting to rain) we decided to stay and watched the qualifying session in our room. The sound of the car and the concerts in Padang stage can even be heard clearly in the room. Room service was also very fast!

title: Best team spirit L65 by Miss Eddy Tan
desc: This is not the first time we stay in Swissotel The Stanford. Because Awesome service from the team of Miss Eddy Tan . They made us feel like a home sweet home. It‚Äôs the main reason we return ‚ù§Ô∏è We enjoyed the sauna and L65 gym very much. Many choices for The breakfast at the hotel . Our room are spacious n clean . Superb nice view from our room too. We will prefer higher floor on our next visit üëç

title: Well located and good stay in the city centre.
desc: The hotel was newly renovated and is very clean and comfortable. Check-in was easy on the ground floor and there are service advisors who will help your stay be enjoyable. There is a shopping mall nearby and is very accessible.

title: Good location, friendly staff, modern rooms
desc: Recently spent two nights and really liked the way they have modernised the hotel and the rooms. I was on the 48th floor, overlooking the skyline and had all the amenities I could ask for, including a coffee machine. Check in was easy, buffet breakfast has a good variety of food, and the staff throughout the property are very friendly. Although the hotel seemed full, they have enough people to accommodate the guests' needs.

title: well located
desc: a beautiful family holiday, however I asked to be on the same floor as my children but it wasn't possible due to it being very busy. Overall it was a great experience and a great holiday. We would certainly do it again

title: Fabulous for Grand Prix/location/decor/ambience/gym. Lifts need a rethink!
desc: Very nice hotel in an excellent location in Singapore. Not far from Marina Bay Sands, and right next door to the famous Raffles Hotel. Other reviews have commented negatively on self-check in. In fact its not really self-check in - they have plenty of staff there to assist and they do the checking in for you! Efficient and easy. Rooms are very spacious, very clean and well appointed with magnificent views of the city. If you are thinking of a hotel for the 2023 F1 Grand Prix (its why I was here for 2022) this is a fabulous choice. Ensure you face Stamford - my view of 5 corners of the track from my room was SO good that I watched the race from my balcony instead of from my Grandstand purchased seat! It was amazing! Hotel is also attached to a great shopping mall. Gym is

title: Excellent Stay
desc: This is a brilliant hotel. The high rise rooms offer brilliant paranomic views. The ambience and decor of the hotel are superb. The customer service is outstanding. I stayed at level 54 and the view was breathtaking from the room. The rooms are spacious and very inviting. Overall a great place to stay and heavily recommended.

title: Good location, Good service, Very good Saty. Still one of the best in Singapore
desc: We watched the F1 race and it was a good hotel to be in. Convenient enough for the weekend. However, probably because of the full capacity, we had to call for our rooms to be cleaned and turned down, though service was immediate upon making the call. Generally, a great hotel still and will definitely stay there again

title: Family staycation
desc: We stayed at the Swissotel for 2 nights in the suite room. It was a very enjoyable time as there are lots of things to keep everyone occupied. Daniah from reservations was exceptionally helpful with my reservations and upgrade. I tried calling Accor for room reservations but it was a very difficult process. I had difficulty understanding the person and she was unable to help me. At level 65(club) special mention must go to Ronald who was such a delight! Always helpful and cheerful. It was a great holiday for us all! Thank you.

title: Hard for me to be impressed by a hotel
desc: But I was! Wonderful stay in a clean, well organised, friendly hotel, with great access to everything you'd need. Easy check in and out, and even on one of the busiest times of the year, the team still impressed. It was so easy staying here, thank you!

title: Good location, room with a room but over priced
desc: Room is odd shape. Bathroom is small. Club at 65 is a disappointment. Below average snacks and alcohol served. Breakfast at 65 was a disappointment too. Limited selection and below average taste. Staff service is very good.

title: Family holiday incorporating F1 weekend
desc: We stayed up on the 56th Floor in the rooms facing towards Suntec Centre and War Memorial. When we walked into the room we were blown away! For the F1 weekend we had an amazing view of the track. Other family were on the 11th floor facing the same direction and the view was nearly as good but with the added bonus of feeling closer to the action.

title: Swissotel Stamford did not disappoint!
desc: Well located property - well equipped rooms - pleasant efficient service. Breakfast was good with many options to choose from. Pool deck was a pleasant surprise and the Spa was excellent. Access to Raffles City shopping centre was a bonus!

title: a pleasant stay
desc: Never get me disappointed to stay at Swissotel - great location, newly renovated room with good view. Service is good and efficient. Breakfast is ok with lots of choices and varieties. Pinky from reservation is great and handling my booking professionally and very efficient. Definitely will recommend to all my friends and Swissotel is my first choice if I get a chance to return to Singapore.

title: Great location
desc: Great room,great view‚Ä¶..only complaint was we were with the club package advertised cocktails between 5.30-7.30.There was never any cocktails on offer‚Ä¶.minor complaint though.Good swimming pool with separate kids pool.

title: Wonderful Reservation Experience
desc: Diniah from reservations was amazing! She went the extra mile to look for suitable dates for my soon to expire reservation booking. She was warm and yet had a cheerful disposition! Thank you for your help!

title: Fantastic hotel and location
desc: We stayed as a family of 7 in your hotel in 3 rooms. The stay was very comfortable. Room size was good. It would have been good if we were able to lower the aircon as it was very hot for our family as the air con is set to a specific temp set by the hotel. However we did find there was too much confusion with check in and check out particularly with the self-service and the monitors set up in the lobby - there was no order and people who came after us were served before us. We didnt find any cleaning taking place in between people accessing the monitors and checking in/out. We also had breakfast each morning we were there. While the options offered are the same with a few minor changes each day it does get a bit boring having breakfast there every day so we opted to go out

title: Very pleasant stay
desc: Exceeded my expectations, staff was very polite and provided excellent service. I was on a business trip and had my family joining me halfway through, so I had booked an extra room. The staff at check in was very helpful and proceeded to reserve the room next to mine which was connecting.

title: Horrible customer service, don‚Äôt stay
desc: I stayed for 7 nights. Paying SGD 480++ per night. I don‚Äôt expect such poor customer service. Staff are very unfriendly, especially the breakfast reception woman, she treats guests like inmates. Always long queue to be seated. Even my colleagues got a table, I cannot seat down until I passed through the reception woman. The hotel is over crowded. You need to wait and queue for everything. So try to avoid this hotel unless you don‚Äôt have other choices.

title: Good stay
desc: The check in has a bit of a problem as I forgot to bring my physical identification card and passport thinking an e-IC would suffice, I'm a Sinagporean. So i was unable to check in at the self check in kiosk, the system is unable to scan my e-IC on my mobile. Luckily the hotel staff was there to assist me and they are both very helpful to do a manual check in for me. I hope that the system for check in would improve in future if such cases in need arises. Overall stay in the hotel was fantastic. Awesome view and the room was clean.

title: Nice Stay overall
desc: My second stay this time, exactly 6 years ago was the first time... This time late check in like 6pm for business with companion which was her first time in Singapore. Appreciated very much the help from front desk check in basically it was supposed to be a self check in. We had so much welcome by staff there and turns out we decided to stay one more day there totally 3 nights. 70th floor SKAI Bar was amazing and we had a birthday celebration there. Amazing view. Thumbs up overall.

title: Big comfort bed
desc: room Big, Good view, and location. Hotel near public transportation and shopping area, easy to find food. However the staff are not many, checkin counter service have only one open. guest have to do self checkin, if not want to wait in line.

title: Pleasant 5 star hotel stay
desc: Pleasant & enjoyable 5 star hotel stay. Got a small birthday cake surprise. Very nice decorated room. Enjoy swimming, sauna, whirlpool. Nicely located, above the Rafles city Mall and City hall MRT. Just opposite Suntec Mall. Recommended 5 star hotel

title: Excellent customer service and room service through the entire stay.
desc: Kids friendly and very thoughtful from various aspects. Arrived midnight but still have staff attendance at the reception desk. Daily housekeeping was definitely the highlight of the trip. Thanks to Nurul for the fantastic work during our stay in Swissotel. Will definitely recommend to family and friends when visiting Singapore.

title: Top hotels
desc: Best hotel I‚Äôve stayed. The check in was smooth and fast. Room is clean and tidy. Everything and everywhere is nearby. The view from the hotel was so beautiful and extraordinary. The facilities are top notch. They even prepare a cake for me for my birthday.

title: Great Location, poor checkin
desc: Great Location and comfortable rooms. Loved the balcony and associated rooms. On the downside, checkin was stressful. I didn‚Äôt get the usual checkin in email, so emailed the hotel to receive it. That had the wrong persons name on it which added to the stress the night before my morning flight. I then rang (an international call for 20mins which is an unexpected expense) which partially resolved the issue by saying to see someone in person at checkin it, but she did confirm my reservation. This issue with the names really concerned me with the days of data breaches. The name of the other person saw not even close to mine. I was in a room with a shared door with a group would were awake partying ALL night. Could I suggest better sound proofing of adjoining doors. The trip and stay

title: Enjoyable stay
desc: Great location near the MRT, with plenty of shopping and restaurants nearby. We arrived early and staff were very accommodating. Clean spacious room with good amenities. Breakfast have a great mix of Western and Asian meal options. A big thank you to room service staff Tony Zhen who provided great professional care and friendly personalized service throughout our stay. Overall, we really enjoyed the stay and would love to return again!

title: Conference hotel üëçüèΩ
desc: As centrally located as possible. Stayed for a conference and ideal for a conference. Between two shopping malls, with food malls and restaurants all around. Room was what you‚Äôd expect from a conference hotel in the heart of singapore- balcony, coffee/tea.

title: Loved everything about this hotel
desc: First of all, they don‚Äôt say no to anything, if they can‚Äôt give you exactly what you want, they will try to at least give you the best modified version of what you require. From the moment we entered the hotel, everyone was so courteous. Yes, like the other travellers mentioned, we have check in using a computer, but there are staff around to help you with it, so no complaints. Breakfast was nice, I‚Äôm a vegetarian and there were some nice options for me as well. Everything is so close to the hotel. The mall, mrt, other malls. Like raffles mall is attached to the hotel , and suntec city is a 10 minute walk away. There are so many places to eat, one piece of advice, do not go to the food court on the third floor of the mall, instead go to the basement food area , it‚Äôs called

title: Wonderful
desc: What a beautiful hotel. Staff are genuinely lovely. We had a room on the 62nd floor with a balcony and it was delightfully. Room was incredibly spacious shower was large and delightful. Nespresso machine so that was great also. Club lounge at 125.00 per night was way too expensive, particularly for a non drinker, but for business travellers, if work is paying, so be it. Other than 1730 hrs canap√©s, the remainder of the day was 2 types of cookies and softdrink.Location is great, just a quick walk to hop on hop off bus abd Raffles. Public transport is cheap and dependable. Really love this property. We stayed in 2009 and it was looking a little tired back then, but now it is really luxurious looking

title: Best service Best Location View Fantastic
desc: Location in city hall MRT link with Mall. Many restaurants in mall and supermarket and bakery store. View from our room was fantastic. Marina bay sands from terrace. Gym complete and have jacuzzi too. Executive lounge serve many food and excellent service and kind staff. Surprise welcome greeting in my bedroom.

title: A TRULY WONDERFUL HOTEL AND BEST LOCATION
desc: WE JUST HAD 7 DAYS THERE AND WHAT A WONDERFUL HOTEL. OUR ROOM HAD THE BEST VIEWS YOU COULD WISH FOR. THE STAFF WERE ALL SUPER FRIENDLY AND EXTREMLY HELPFUL. THE HOTEL IS IN A WONDERFUL LOCATION. SO HANDY WITH THE UNDERGROUND RAIL PRETTY MUCH RIGHT AT THE DOOR OF THE HOTEL WHICH MADE IT SO EASY TO GET AROUND AND ALSO VERY EASY TO USE AND CHEAP TOO. THE HOTEL AND ROOMS ARE VERY CLEAN AND ASLO VERY NICE. THE BREAKFAST BUFFET WAS GREAT AND CATERED FOR ALL. THERE WAS A GORGEOUS YOUNG LADY AT THE RECEPTION OF THE CLOVE RESTUARANT (ELAINE) WHO WAS THE SWEETEST YOUNG LADY WHO GREETED US EVERY MORNING WITH THE WARMEST AND KINDEST SMILE AND CONVERSATION :) THE HOTEL HAD GREAT SHOPPING MALLS CONNECTED THAT HAD HIGH END SHOPPING AND FOOD COURTS AND MANY OTHER DINING WHICH MADE IT SUPER

title: Spectacular views
desc: An absolute WOW, when entering our room, on seeing the view across the water to Marina Bay, all lit up. Reception staff excellent, on our arrival and check in. Large, spacious, comfortable room. Plenty of hanging space for our clothes. Pool area very relaxing. Again, Reception staff very helpful in providing us with an extension to our room fordeparture, as we had a very late flight.

title: Large business hotel that meets expectations
desc: I stayed in a Premier Harbour View Room King for 6 nights. Pros - Spacious room with contemporary design and wooden floor - Balcony with unparalleled panoramic views over Marina Bay and Singapore River - Multiple seating areas including desk chair, sofa area, rocking chair and cushioned bench in front of the bed - Crisp linens and well made bed - Generous amount of quality towels  - Sufficient and smartly placed hangers in the bathroom - Gimmicky back-lit light switches with motion sensors - Impeccably clean with consistent and thorough housekeeping  - Large amount of complimentary water bottles provided without need to request more - Surprise welcome fruit platter, hand written card and decorative towel art  - Decent room service food quality and delivery speed - Located above

title: Lovely hotel, lovely staff but trouble with reservations at hotel restaurants
desc: Everything was lovely except we unable to get a dinner reservation at any hotel restaurant to use a credit. So we went to the tearoom for lunch (located in the middle of the lobby), then when we went to charge it to the rooms was told the tearoom was not associated with the hotel (In the middle of the lobby)

title: Nice and Experienced Staff that provided wonderful help when i am very sick in the middle of the night.
desc: I was staying here for 3 days 2 nights during my business trip. I am not feeling well, my leg cramped and hurts a lot (for almost 1 hr 30 mins) on my last night. I called the operator requesting help, the hotel send 3 staff (2 men 1 lady) to help me out. they are very patient and helpful. providing a lot help to help me reduce pain.I am sorry that i dont have their name, but please help me to say thank you to the staffs. However, the hotel need to improve the air conditional, its not cold for the first night, until the hotel sent someone to fix it. and i am on my business trip, the organizer allocate daily credit under the room for room service. the room service took too long (more than 1hr) until i need to cancel almost all my room service order.

title: I woul definitely go somewhere else next time.
desc: It is supposed to be a luxury hotel but rooms are average and the staff is rude. I stayed here as part of a business trip and was surprised to find the gym was closed for renovation, this was never mentioned when I booked as I wouldn't have booked here. I stayed in an executive club room and check in 3pm. When checking in, I found out afternoon tea finished at 3pm. I was not notified regarding this ether, surely you can let people know in advance, especially people staying just 1 night. So maybe take this into consideration if you're in one of these rooms. I gave my feedback about my stay but I heard nothing back from the hotel. **crickets** The rooms are just OK. The 1 good thing about this hotel is the location.

title: Ok lor
desc: Generally clean. Overall comfortable stay. Room was spacious for 2. Nothing special/extraordinary or out of the norm. Location is good and very convenient as raffles city is right beside and connected.

title: GREAT SERVICE BY PEI LI!
desc: We were looking for the room of delegates coming for ILO event this coming December. Pei Li is so helpful and gracious in showing us the type of room while we were unable to meet Ingrid Lai as point of contact. Thank you so much Pei Li for the hospitality!

title: Amazing stay, highly recommend!
desc: We've previously stayed at Swissotel The Stamford on my husband's business trip about 5 years ago and loved it so much we booked it again for this trip. This time, we stayed 2 nights before and 1 night after our trip to the Maldives in a King Room with City View whilst stopping by in Singapore. From our city view room balcony we were also able to see a fantastic view of Marina Bay Sands. The hotel has been renovated recently and updated to a modern look whilst maintaining the luxury feel. Rooms are clean, comfortable and spacious, and staff and the customer service are exceptional. We were surprised with decorations, a cake and a wonderful message from housekeeping to celebrate our honeymoon - it was a very thoughtful gesture and really shows their 5-star service at Swissotel.

title: Good location, newly renovated
desc: The hotel has been newly renovated and the location is excellent. All the attractions are nearby with one of the central train station just located below. Shopping is also available in the same building. Breakfast spread is pretty good as well. Highly recommended for all types of travellers

title: Perfect location!
desc: Amazing stay. Best part of the hotel is you have a huge mall connected to the hotel with lot of eat outs and shopping you need to get done. The hotel also is connected directly to two metro stations - City Hall and Esplande and its in the midst of the most happening Singapore.

title: Amazing location, great facilities and friendly staff
desc: This is my second stay at the Swisshotel and we can't fault the location and the quality of the hotel. Even though the Raffles City complex is over 35 years old now it's been well maintained and constantly refreshed, the rooms at the hotel are clean, modern and of course the amazing views from the balconies blow away all hotels in Singapore. The tennis facilities at the hotel will keep us coming back.

title: Great stay!
