desc: Incredible service (especially Eddie!). Great location. Spacious , clean and modern rooms. Quiet and relaxed pool area. Nice gym. Great views. Value for money! It‚Äôs our fifth stay here and we will definitely be coming back! Stayed 10 nights and the hotel really felt like home.

title: Swissotel stay
desc: Lovely room with fantastic views. Use of The Lounge for breakfast and evening really worthwhile. Easy Access to everything tbis great city has to offer. Staff extremely pleasant and helpful. Thanks to Rhea especially.

title: Anniversary Stay
desc: The hotel was clean, well maintained and the staff were lovely & helpful. We had a harbour view room and the view didn‚Äôt disappoint. Room was comfortable, only slight downside was the shower over the bath. Great to be above the mall, and the SMRT. We did breakfast in Clove as well as on 65, Clove was busy market style with a wider range of food, but 65 was calmer and relaxing.

title: Good hotel, well located shopping mall right under the hotel
desc: Very good hotel, the room is clean and big. The bar on the 70th floor have the best view. Only stayed one night, hope we stayed longer. The shopping mall is handy, there is a food court in it as well. Overall good stay and it seems like always fully booked.

title: Wedding Anniversary @ Swissotel
desc: Stayed at Swissotel for 3D2N to celebrate our wedding anniversary. The staff were all very warm and hospitable. Check-in was done with a breeze and was given a welcome platter of fruits, cake and a bottle of wine as we informed the hotel about our celebration. Would like to particularly mention special thanks to Renan who conversed with me over email in preparation for the stay. Ronald who was at the L65 reception was very helpful and hospitable making us feel like we were home. Eddy (Director of Guest Relations) knew the names of the guests who were using the L65 lounge and even helped accommodate some of the requests we had for our celebrations to the best of her ability. Would like to say that this 3 staff whom we had the honour to interact with made this stay especially

title: Trendy but lacking personality
desc: We have stayed at this hotel many times previously and enjoyed its services and location. On this occasion however we found ourselves being somewhat disconnected from staff and customer service generally. Check-in and check out is by way of self service at computer terminals in Reception, a somewhat messy and disjointed arrangement which lacks the personal touch where one can ask questions about facilities in the hotel etc. Staff are there to assist but it is limited. Give us traditional customer service at a reception counter - more personal and welcoming. Our room was clean and comfortable with all the mod cons and a nice balcony. We took the ‚Äúgreen‚Äù option which credited us for not having a daily room service - a nice innovation. The Stamford Bar on the ground floor seems to

title: Poor service in hotel reservation system, messed up our room type
desc: I have booked room type "Swiss Harbour View King' but when I arrived, the staff gave us a twin bed room. I told her that I booked for one big bed room, why I got 2 beds. It took a while before I got change to 'King' room. Even worse, our new room is lower than, from 47th to 38th Floor. It was almost mid-night and we had to drag our luggage up and down to new room. Very upset on this.

title: Best hotel in Singapore
desc: Wow, the best place to stay in Singapore. Excellent rooms, the friendliest staff particularly Sokling, Rhea, Wan, Zhiqi, Thiva & Renan. Very well looked after. 4th time here and I won‚Äôt stay anywhere else. Very central, 15 mins walk to Chinatown, views to die for. Food is exceptional.

title: Such an enjoyable first stay !
desc: Highly recommend Swissotel ! Helpful staff! Clean fresh rooms, easy check-in/check-out & it‚Äôs conveniently located within a mall, MRT & underpass towards esplanade, walking distance to various shops. I will definitely return! Loved my stay ! Thank you üôè

title: Well located & beautiful view from room
desc: I have stayed here view times because of some thought (although the hotel is over price). I got very early morning flight that force me to go to aiport before 5 am. That's why I am back to stay at this hotel because well located and easy to find taxi.

title: Great location
desc: Great location. Convenient for meetings. And has places to eat and shop very close. Efficient check in and check out. And rooms have great views all around. Proximity to Marina Bay ensures great running options. Two good options for breakfast.

title: Excellent hospitality from Michelle, Andik, Ronald and front office team
desc: Always a pleasure to be back. The front office and L65 team are helpful, friendly and genuinely care for guests despite being an incredibly busy hotel. Would love to give special mention to Michelle, Andik, Ronald (L65) and the guy that checked me in (sorry I forgot your name) but everyone has been amazing. Cheers!

title: A little disappointed
desc: This was part of a big trip for us. There is a check in which seemed to be more geared to those who spend their lives on a phone. To be honest as a couple I think we got a poorer service than those who came to conferences here. We were on our last day when we were able to get our membership validated due to the business of the hotel. Although at one stage we were flicked away with a hand to look for someone else. We were similarly dismissed when an outside door man felt he would be better served ignoring us and concentrating on corporate guests. On one night we reported a cockroach near the lifts again we were ignored and the dead corpse was still there 24 hour latter. The brasserie closed a little early on the Saturday night and did not open again for the remainder of our

title: Located near iconic Marina Bay on busy street
desc: Very nice Hotel with popular shopping mall in same premises. I stayed there for one of business conference. very supportive staff and easy for commuting. Food is good and mall food court is also available. Will definitely consider this hotel chain for upcoming stays. Pleasant surprise is - everything is digital and through you phone. checking in and out, ordering room service foodetc.

title: Simon Asia tour
desc: Excellent location, good breakfast, kind courteous efficient staff. The breakfast restaurant was particularly busy but still a pleasant experience. Room was very nice with 2 large beds and quiet to recover from flight Pool looked very nice but weather was against us during our stay

title: Unsatisfactory response from Swiss Service
desc: There were no coffee or tea cups in the room. When I contacted Swiss Service, I was abruptly told that they were on the way. Since the room was cleaned probably hours before, I was a bit puzzled and said so. I was again abruptly asked ‚Äúwhat is my request‚Äù. I repeated that the housekeeping staff had probably forgotten to leave the cups in the room. I was told to wait for the cups. Half an hour has passed. No cups.

title: Breathtaking
desc: Luxurious and modern rooms. Best view in the city! Efficient service. Brilliant well rounded and what any hotel should aspire to! Location is convenient right at City hall and Raffles city shopping centre is adjacent. The risk was not venturing beyond the hotels footprint given you have everything Singapore offers at your doorstep.

title: Great location central to everything.
desc: The hotel is central to many of the street eats that we visited, Lau Pa Sat (Satay Street), Arab Street, Little India and Chinatown. It was a very pleasant stay, room was large with great views of the harbour and marina.

title: Excellent
desc: Stayed here for 5 nights and from the very start we were made to feel very welcome. The staff on the 65th floor made sure our stay was perfect. Thank you Sokling for being the smiling and helpful person assisting us at breakfast. Thank you Rhea Wan Zhuqi Thiva and Renan for always being welcoming and organising our stay. Lovely hotel views are amazing. Well worth the visit.

title: Excellent base
desc: Excellent base for our 6 night visit to Singapore. Well placed, as other guests have commented, next to city hall MRT station and the mall. We took the MRT literally everywhere we went, on our daily trips exploring the city and various attractions. A Super efficient way to travel around. Breakfast was very good. The staff were all lovely. Clean rooms. Good facilities. The hotel gave us everything we needed for a wonderful trip. Highly recommended

title: Great building but even greater service!
desc: Oliver is an absolute legend. When checking in he suggested a room upgrade to ensure we had a view of the Marina and fireworks display. Because of an injury this basically saved our new year celebration. The service, building quality and room features were fantastic as well but the overwhelming reason for writing this review was Oliver. Thank you so much!

title: Another great experience
desc: For location, this hotel is hard to beat, being directly above City Hall MRT and thus making getting around the island easy. But there are so many more reasons to stay here. We had a Harbour View room on the 54th floor for ten nights, from where the views were spectacular, especially after dark. For a city hotel, our room was spacious, and well-equipped and serviced, although, in the few days over Christmas, when hotel occupancy was at 100%, it did take until very late in the afternoon/early evening for our hardworking attendant to reach our room. Full occupancy also made for a lengthy wait for a lift, sometimes, too, but neither was a real inconvenience and both were entirely understandable over Christmas. And on the subject of full-occupancy, we never once heard a noise from

title: Extremely satisfying A+++++++
desc: Extremely satisfying. Free upgrade was much surprising. Make up room is almost immediate. Cleanliness after make up is amazing. Buffet Dinner was also satisfying with free for children (age 6) as staff noticing he didn‚Äôt eat much (sick).

title: Terrible hotel. Will not go back again!
desc: Hotel only paid lip service to highest tier member. They did not even bother to upgrade us. Check in issue not resolved since we brought it up to their reservation director. Complementary mini bar was again not told to us during check-in until the housekeeping staff told us. Food at Asian cafe was horrible. Sunny side up was still raw and they staff have the audacity to serve it to us. We got chased out of the restaurant by the manager

title: Great stay with an incredible view!
desc: From the beginning, the lobby staff member was so helpful in checking my mother and me in. The room was spacious and the view was incredible. The concierge was helpful in recommending authentic Singaporean restaurants. The only mediocre portion of the trip was the breakfast buffet. Although there was a variety in selection, the food was sometimes bland in flavor.

title: If in Singapore stay in Swissotel Stamford for amazing experience plus request the room 53 to 59
desc: Excellent service, what a location, so central. View from room of CBD was amazing. I highly recommend rooms from 53 to 59 have excellent views only, dosent matter which floor but from 9th floor upward. I stayed in room 955 and amazing city CBD view, Marina bay view and even you can see marina gardens by bay. So only request for these rooms when booking. just next to hotel is McDonald. This McDonald is Halal. there is also a grocery store in basement. from hotel you can go next to shopping area, food court at level 3. all accessible form hotel. For taxi make sure download "Grab" app as no Uber in Singapore. Easy to use, add you card or pay cash. You can also order food delivery using Grab.

title: Big Rooms and Centralized Location
desc: Booked for a 2-nights stay separately as we couldn't make up our mind if to have it at the same hotel or a different one. We ended up deciding on the same hotel (which we glad we did) but both bookings had different room categories which the team upgraded us instead to the room of higher catergory Premier Twin Harbour View so we did not have to change rooms :) We came by earlier as we had a lunch reservation at Skai and to our delight, our room was ready. Room was huge, comes with a bathtub, balcony and had a view of MBS & Esplanade. Pillows and Beds are bigger than the usual hotels and the housekeeping/front office team was very accommodating and prompt to our requests such as additional pillows and towels. Toiletries such as shower gel, toothpaste, vanity kit are provided

title: Central location and good hotel
desc: Swissotel was very busy during the Christmas period when we visited, but the overall service and standard of everything was very good. The rooms were very comfortable and clean. We did expect a bit more decorations in the hotel but overall it is was a great experience and amazing location to access all main areas in Singapore

title: Beautiful Harbour View
desc: We booked the hotel stay to celebrate New Year's Eve celebrations and to enjoy the fireworks view, it was stunning and perfect view at the Marina Bay, we enjoyed the staycation so far. The balcony is big enough to cater for 6 person standing and overlooking at the Marina Bay Area. This hotel is perfect for business, couple and family travellers. It's proximity to the Raffles City mall where you have restaurants, shops and supermarket make it a superb location.

title: Well located, Best view
desc: This hotel located nearest 3 subway stations (East West Line, North South Line, Circle Line). My room have 2 views city view and bay view that good to watch New Year's Fireworks. Lounge is the best bay view (Aproximately 120 degree).

title: Nice stay
desc: Great pool and gym, good location. Efficient staff. Room can get expensive depending on occupancy rate. Basement food court plenty of cheap eats and supermarket. Rooms were a little small for a family of 4.

title: Superb location but dated facility.
desc: Overall, we had a very good stay. The view from the room (high floor harbor view) was phenomenal, especially due to the balcony. Negatives were the old and somewhat dated facilities and a sub-standard breakfast buffet.

title: Comfortable stay with 5 stars service
desc: To: Ana/Vanessa/Daniah/Timothy Happy New Year to all of you and thank you for all the arrangement that you have made for us. The engagement party went really well along with the great view and firework display. It wouldn‚Äôt be possible without your help by accommodating my request for high floor. This has made the once-in-a-lifetime event even more memorable. With that, I would like to commend all of you for a job well done. With your exceptional service, I will definitely consider coming back for another visit somewhere in the future. Take care and keep the good job up! Cheers. Yours sincerely, Fred Too

title: Best Location
desc: Hotel at best location. direct access to MRT station. shopping center with a lot of resto just next to hotel lobby. the view was amazing. especially when you get harbour view. this hotel former the tallest hotel in the world when it was built back to 80s. excelent breakfast with many choice of food. Thanks Swiss Hotel

title: Great location
desc: Excellent location and plenty of halal choice in breakfast. Had a comfortable stay and views of Marina are amazing. Hotel opens directly into a mall which is convenient and staff are extremely helpful. Good value for money for central stay in Singapore.

title: Good location
desc: The hotel has access to the mall and my room had a nice view of Marina Bay. overall, I had a comfortable stay with all the amenities I need during my business trip. This hotel is something that I would recommend to friends and families

title: Good Stay
desc: Staff service average was only attended by the staff 10-20mins after struggling to check-in myself. Appreciate the staff willing to postpone my check-out timing as I was struggling my way back from Standard Chartered Singapore Marathon. Room had a weird stuffy smell, hair remains on the bed and towel.

title: 11/10 amazing stay
desc: Amazing! Perfect location next to city hall MRT, shopping centre and walking distance to lots of places. View was stunning we could see the gardens by the bay, marina bay sands and city buildings. Staff were so accommodating and helpful. Could not fault a single thing!!! Best hotel!!!

title: Great stay but below expectations breakfast, and no complimentary parking.
desc: Well located, plenty of F&B outlets in the mall. Can skip the hotel breakfast, which is way below expectations with the price paid, and eat in the mall. The F&B outlets in the mall offered much better value for money choices. Swimming pool is very very small, and no complimentary parking for in-house guests.

title: Unpleasant check-in and check-out experience
desc: Firstly, my booking was not updated with latest change whereby it took quite a while to locate my reservation. My stay was shorten and the change was made through travel agent. However the hotel system still showing I was supposed to check-in a day before. It went thru quite some hassles to find my name as that didn't appear on the correct check-in date obviously. To add more pains, when I check-out this mistake was not corrected and resulting I have to pay extra and it took quite some times to reverse the bill. Overall, quite a bitter experience this round...

title: Good experience overall
desc: Good experience overall. Great view overlooking the Padang and singapore skyline. Perhaps they could improve on their housekeeping in terms of assisting families with young kids by allowing more mattresses to elevate the height of crib so that parents could easily put down or pick up their young children.

title: A very happy stay at Swissotel The Stamford hotel
desc: During check-in & check-out, the staff were very fast & efficient. The concierge desk staff were helpful & friendly. Service was very good overall, even when I needed to borrow a hotel wheelchair, it was done very swiftly. All this was led by team leader Ms Eddy Tan who was quick & sweet in every respect, along with her colleagues in helping me. The Buffet Breakfast was good , with a wide variety of choices and even the room service on my last day‚Äôs breakfast before I left for the airport was so good .

title: Disappointing stay for Accor Plus Gold Member
desc: Staff do not know the benefits of Accor Plus Gold Member and have to remind them again and again but in the end still do not enjoy the Gold member benefits. The staff should be re-trained on how to treat different tier members differently, otherwise what's the benefits of upgrading my tier?

title: Best location, good rooms, very nice view and very convenient
desc: It is at very Best location with very good rooms, it has a very nice view of whole marina area and marina bay sands and it is very convenient to have mall, restaurants, metro station in hotel itself. Loved it

title: Very good stay
desc: The room and the view was exceptional. The choices of breakfast every morning were really good and of a high standard. General housekeeping was top notch. The modernised approach to check-in and check-out makes things very flexible and efficient.

title: Satisfying stay
desc: We booked our staycation with Swissotel the Stamford as a family. It was pleasant and comfortable. The room was decent in size. The view was wonderful. The staff were very helpful. We come here to stay often and will make our booking again soon.

title: Excellent hotel
desc: Excellent hotel with convenient location, nice facilities and restaurants. Welcomed staff and service. Highly recommended. The staff also arrange cute soft toys, balloons and towel made bird on the bed. This gives surprise to my children, very special and good idea.

title: Well located, good stay, good food, nice view and super advicer (Ms.Yi Jie)
desc: Very good stay in a good location that easy to go and back in all times. Many stores near by under the building and also easy grab food for outgoing. If you come as a platinum member of Accor, you will get welcome fruit in a big plate, breakfast and evening snacks on 65th.floor are very good too.

title: Fantastic photo in great location
desc: You are greeted by friendly and accomodating staff. I arrived from Europe about seven hours before check-in but was welcomed warmly and in a room on the 48th floor within minutes of arrival. The room (Harbour View) was very modern and up to date and had amazing views of Singapore. Amenities are first class. The hotel is in a great location and has a four level shopping centre adjacent. Breakfast was in a lovely restaurant called Clove and was buffet with so many food options (East and West). You can do better than enjoying a Singapore Sling by the hotel pool either! Check out was very smooth and staff go out of their way to assist. All in all a great hotel to stop and have a relaxing couple of days en route back home to Australia. I stayed once before (15 years ago) and

title: Great location but expensive area
desc: Great location, near shops, trains, and walking distance to various places. We enjoyed breakfast (albeit quite expensive), in room dining was hot and tasted good, pool was set up great for kids (ours are 1 and 4). Our room was spotless, modern and spacious for the 4 of us and our luggage. Our only concern was the checkin process - whilst it was quick and smooth, we didn‚Äôt feel welcomed and weren‚Äôt told about anything the hotel offered. Not the end of the world, but it‚Äôs nice to be told ‚Äòthe pool is here, the restaurants are here, your on this level, here are the elevators etc etc. We just had to fend for ourselves!! Overall, we‚Äôd stay again but beware of the cost of the surround restaurants and shops.

title: Hotel with great service, great location and spacioys room.
desc: Great service and great locations! Walking distance to City Hall, Esplanade and Suntec City. Room is spacious. Wide range of breakfast varieties. Special thanks to Tony Zhen for his creation (refer to pic) , my sons love them üëçüòÄ

title: Best views from a hotel 64 th floor
desc: My third stay in the Swiss upgraded cresent suite really nice well paying nearly 1300$ a night for it so it should be Everything is automated curtains lights toilet opens up by approaching Had a better room last time I mean the views were full Mariba bay on my last stay this time not as good but otherwise nearly perfect The club rooms breakfast is very limited and mediocre so is the happy hour choice Other 5 star hotels has a much superior offering

title: Wonderful stay at Swissotel on Stamford
desc: Beautiful hotel with attention to detail. The buffet breakfast at Clove was fantastic. Our king room with harbour view was stunning. The nice touch of having a Nespresso coffee machine in the room was lovely. They also stick with the TWG tea which is such a great tea.

title: Outstanding hospitality and service for our return stay
desc: This was our first return stay at the Swissotel since covid, and how wonderful it was to re-experience the warm hospitality and excellent care and pampering by all the fantastic staff at the hotel at both the Swissotel and Fairmont, under the leadership of Eddy Tan and Priscilla Osman.

title: Disappointed Hotel
desc: Trully, everything just ordinary nothing special at all. On the check in process, it is too crowded as there is a meeting with many people. There are compies for self check in, with less hotel staff (perhaps this is their way to reduce employee). The room just ordinary nothing else. The breakfast, just do not expect too much. During the breakfast time, everyone should queing, we must wait for the table as the hotel staff took us ..(Singapore is a queing country, everthing, everywhere queing, line up). The food taste it is tasteless. Conclusion: I would never, ever back to this hotel!

title: Good Location, with easy access to everywhere
desc: Efficient self-check-in and check-out. Comfort bedding, clean and large newly renovated rooms with balcony for good scenery. Big shopping mall downstairs with many food stalls and restaurants. Easy access to everywhere by MRT.

title: Wow Experience
desc: Location super strategic. The room is well equipped and immaculate specially highlight on the very comfortable bed, we‚Äôre well taken care by the crew here. Thanks to Laurence who taking care of our unplanned upgrade on the second day. Tips, ask for room 40th floor and above , room ended with 54-56 to have the unbeatable Marina Bay view. Thanks for the complimentary chocolate mousse cake for our celebration, one of the best cake we tasted. Totally gonna come back again!

title: Incroyable!
desc: Our visit was a 10/10 experience, my parents loved it too! One thing is that there should be a safety device for preventing falling hazard at the balcony, not because I think that the those could really happen, but because it makes guests feel much safer. title: Great views, great hotel to match
desc: Views were breathtaking from our suite on the 66th floor. L65 lounge is arguable even better for the view, because you can see basically 360 degrees out. Love the presence of balconies in the rooms and lounge. Service for us was excellent, staff always addressed us by Mr./Mrs. last name and were extremely attentive. The ability to avoid the crowd downstairs and check in at the L65 lounge was greatly appreciated. Food and dining were also excellent. We ordered in-room dining from Prego and had dinner at Skai - both were excellent. Skai was a bit expensive but absolutely worth it in my opinion, the quality of the food, in all aspects, was great. And, it was still much cheaper than other fine dining establishments, none of which have a remotely comparable view out the window.

title: Nice stay at the Swissotel Stamford
desc: Good stay at the Swissotel Stamford, had great rooms on the 63rd floor with absolutely amazing views. Visited the lounge on level 65 for breakfast which was very good with more than enough choice for our family. Would definitely stay at this hotel again.

title: Satisfactory.
desc: Very comfortable room. Service at the reception good. Great location. Best view from my balcony in level 9. Food at Clove most unsatisfactory. Poor quality and service for a five star hotel. Excellent service from the hotel Concierge who was on duty on the 28th afternoon/evening. Thank you. You helped me to select a venue for our dinner.

title: Well located, Comfortable
desc: Well located with plenty of food selection nearby. Good option for family trip. Room size is big enough for family of 4. Connecting with MRT, shopping mall, thus not a worry even weather is bad. 10-30minutes by car can get to most of the sightseeing points.

title: Great location and view
desc: We spent two lovely nights here. The room was neat and clean. The little couch and table made the room feel really cosy and functional. The only complaint we have is the basin and shower area. It would be good to either have a sliding door or extend the shower screen by a bit so that water does not splatter outside the shower area easily especially when the rain shower is turned on. And the basin faucet is too close to the edge of the basin, which made it tricky not to wet the surrounding outside the basin when washing up. Overall, it was a wonderful stay! And, the check-in staff was very helpful.

title: Good Stay
desc: fast check in process, easy on check in and check out good ambient and room with good view and well Maintenace VIP lounge with good service and caring staff lobby staff very helpful and friendly service beyond expectation

title: Well located, friendly staff, good hotel to stay during visiting Singapore
desc: I book a room via Accor ALL App, good room value and my suggestion should book a room with harbour view to have a great experience with singapore view, of course the price will be higher. really well located, friendly staff, good hotel to stay during visiting Singapore for family or business stays.

title: Great location, staff friendly, fabulous views, plenty of restaurants.
desc: Excellent accommodation paid for breakfast and upgrade great views from room overlooking Mantra Bay, light show at night. Shower over the bath, not good for a person with knee/leg condition, as the bath is high. Clove restaurant for buffet breakfast and tea, great variety of food. Celebrated birthday, at the Skai restaurant on the 70th floor fabulous views, staff arranged for flowers and cake. Tea room was excellent variety of tea from around the word with food. Staff within the hotel and restaurants were friendly. Restaurants in the mall downstairs, shops, chemist, supermarket. Taxis outside hotel. Can catch the train outside the hotel CITY HALL station, ticket machines at station. Checkout is 12:00pm.

title: Good location, great customer service and nice room
desc: Stayed for 6 days in January with my wife and daughter. Totally satisfied with all experiences and great staffs. We had shower handle leakage and attended immediately. Assistance is always available. Nice to see staffs greetings at lobby all the time. We will definitely return in the future.

title: Great stay, great location.
desc: We really enjoyed our stay at the Stamford. The hotel is in an excellent position next to a MTR station and close to many attractions. The staff were very helpful and friendly from the moment we were assisted with our check in. We thoroughly recommend a harbour view room that had fantastic views of the Marina Bay Area.

title: Great location!!
desc: This hotel was great. It is adjacent to the shopping mall and the station. The marina bay view was amazing!! It is 70 floors tall. Although you can search for a room for 2 adults and 2 children, they give you a room with 2 beds. When we asked they prepared an extra bed for free

title: Well Located and Friendly Staff
desc: The Hotel is well located in the Center, downstair is Raffles Shopping Center, quite convenient to grab something to eat or shopping. The Room is clean, good coffee and service, however there is no bidet sprayer in the toilet The Staff is very friendly, one lady at the lounge gave my boy a Niu Niu (Stuffed Toy) Overall, very good Hotel

title: Perfectly positioned and perfectly air-conditioned!!
desc: Traveling from Australia and spent 4 nights at the hotel. Magnificent!! Found out that this is the hotel that a lot of airline crews stay at, so that is always a good sign. Wonderful service and such a great location!! About a 15 min walk to the harbour, 20 min to Marina Bay Sands and also Lau Pa Sat hawker markets in the CBD. It's literally across the road from Raffles, so a Singapore Sling is there and waiting!! Oh, and 15 min walk to Little India too.. Only minor complaint was that when we checked in, we were put on the 10th floor with a very dull view of some pipes, etc. We went to reception and asked if there was a room with a better view and they immediately came back to us with a room on the 52nd floor with amazing views!! My query is, if this room was free originally,

title: Great location. Enjoyed our stay.
desc: Everything was GREAT except our room temperature. it was hot in there and we would reduce the Temp to 18 Deg Celsius but the room would still be hot The team of Swissotel were very respectful and . There was so much positive vibes between the employees and guests. My families have all stayed at Swissotel when they visited Singapore couple of years back

title: Good location/convenience
desc: It was by and large uneventful except on an occasion, some guests must have spilled something on the carpet walkway on the floor that I was on and it absolutely stinks! With that said, I am satisfied that the housekeeping was very prompt in fixing the situation. The front desk is friendly and helpful

title: Excellent Hotel!
desc: Great central location on next block to Raffles Hotel. Easy access to MTR and Raffles City shopping mall. I would recommend a room with a view of the marina and city. Amazing and worth any additional cost! The higher the level the better. The bar/lounge on the 70th floor has stunning views and is a must even if it is a bit pricey. All the staff were friendly and helpful especially the concierge service. Great choice of breakfast. Bedroom was modern and well equipped. Great hotel and would look forward to staying there again.

title: Wonderful!!!
desc: well served in the middle of the main attraction and business, quality of sleeping is fantastic, you have any service, just a small point regarding the widow when there is wind ae not perfectly isolated and you can hear. a small noise coming, but the wonderful view compensates this small inconvenience.

title: Disaster and Super Terrible
desc: Don't go!!! It was a disaster!!! The hotel didn't refund the deposit when I checked out!!! I am a customer checked in Jan 2nd in Swissotel the Stamford in SG. I was charged a deposit of $962 and hadn't received the return of deposit until now. It has been on my credit card and produce interest. How can I know the progress of the refund and when can I get it? The attitude and feedback of the hotel's reservation desk is really disapointing and I want to complain!

title: good stay
desc: Well located with plenty of food selection nearby.Very comfortable room. Service at the reception good. Great location. Best view from my balcony in level 33. breakfast at Clove satisfactory. Excellent service from the hotel Concierge who was on duty on the 20th evening. Thank you.

title: Great place to stay in Singapore
desc: Fabulous location and accomodation in the heart of Singapore - would highly recommend. Breakfast in house were amazing - great range of food. Staff were very friendly and helpful. Location to the local shopping centre, attractions and MRT was fantastic.

title: Great views, amazing staff at club lounge, but that was about it.
desc: Booked a club room for this stay. Check-in (at level 65) was smooth and all the staff I met, including the cleaners, were very polite and welcoming. Evening cocktail spread was a little overwhelming in comparison to other similar hotels in Singapore. An incident/bad experience from the front desk staff though. Was granted late check-out at 2pm during check-in, even reconfirmed it with the club lounge staff that the late check-out was indeed in the system. At about 1pm on the day of check-out, a call came from the front desk asking when we were gonna vacate the room, in a rather rude manner. And when we responded 2pm, the staff further probed if we told anyone we were checking out late. Like...Duh?

title: Surprise birthday staycation
desc: Everything went according to plan and met all my expectations! Wife was completely surprised! Online pre-check in was great and allowed us to quickly go up and kept to the spontaneous spirit of the stay. I had also requested for a welcome amenity to wish her happy birthday and they gave us a chocolate cake, which is much appreciated. The room was as expected, very well appointed but it exceeded my expectation on the details, ie storage options were good, design was uncluttered yet clean and functional, and the view across to Padang and MBFC was breathtaking - we got a high floor upgrade from my Accor Gold membership. Thanks for a great stay and looking forward to returning. Benny

title: Swissotel 5 star
desc: Excellent vibes of the hotel. Breakfast was awesome. Staff is spontaneous & quick to service all your needs. I am sure will stay at Swissotel. Thanks all staff. Swimming pool was great. Skai is must a visit. Check In was smooth. Room service kept our room well cleaned all 5 days we stayed. ‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è

title: Family trip in Singapore
desc: We absolutely loved the location of this hotel, the modern luxurious style and the facilities. They were fantastic at check in even though we arrived very late at night. The dining options and connection to Raffles city is amazing, and there is a beautiful pool. We were able to access many of the most amazing Singapore sites within walking distance even. Special mention to housekeeping, Tony Zhen who kept our room so pristine, even though we had small children and made a super cute towel elephant display that delighted us all.

title: Great location and a nice view
desc: Great hotel with a excellent location. Spacious rooms and good housekeeping. Only truly disappointing experience was the breakfast room. Every day there was a long lineup just to be seated. Not due to lack of space, but due to understaffing of the seating procedure. The breakfast buffet held everything you could wish for, but the buffet was crowded and the egg station was mostly only manned by one and with a wait of 10 minutes just to put your order in. All in all an experience of the breakfast room being understaffed and a little messy.

title: Best Location & Service
desc: the location is perfect above the SMRT City Hall Station that can bring you everywhere in Singapore, the hotel is perfect, very clean, outstanding view from our room, smells good and has many restaurants and stores because it's inside the Raffles City Mall. Our family's favourite is their service and food, all is fantastic. We can not wait to come back at Swissotel The Stamford, Singapore.

title: Excellent customer service
desc: Excellent customer service. We have stayed at the Swissotel Stamford during our last 3 trips to Singapore, and each time they have gone the extra mile to make our stay comfortable and enjoyable. All our requests are met and they even swapped our rooms to a better one without any prompting, to ensure our kids had a good view of the NYE fireworks. It is one of the reasons why we always choose to stay here when we're in town.

title: Helpful and clean!!
desc: My first trip to Singapore and this hotel made my trip so much better. The staff were super helpful (even when the next room decided to eat durian) Easy to get to, amazing views of the harbour, quiet, clean, comfy. There is a train station below as well as plenty of food and shopping. The merlion, Gardens by the Bay, marina Bay sands and markets are a stones throw away. The train station below is easy access to everywhere in Singapore and very simple to find your way around. I highly recommend staying here is you can.

title: average experience
desc: For a $600plus balcony room there wasn't much to look forward. the parking is not free and breakfast was not a great spread. The aircon was not strong in the room and toilet doors couldn't be locked...

title: Excellent stay
desc: our family is very satisfied staying at this hotel during the holidays, enjoying fireworks at new year's time from the balcony.. fast service.. Clean, very good location Raffles city mall, very near to mrt station Quick check in and check out Helpfull staff

title: Excellent experience to stay here
desc: Hotel is located at a very good location. Please send my ‚Äúthank you‚Äù to room service staff, and Liza. They are very professional and respond our requests promptly. For the restaurants (buffet b‚Äôfast) staff (male), I would give the staff applause who guided customers between 2 restaurants from 11-12 Jan 2023. He is nice, patient and cheerful.

title: Great location, loved the hotel, the service and the staff were fantastic
desc: We had an amazing stay with you from the 2 January until the 9 January 2023. We cannot fault the hotel or the service at all, we thoroughly enjoyed our stay and would return in a heartbeat. The upgrade to the 47th floor was also appreciated .

title: Great location, room and views
desc: Excellent rooms and location. We had booked Harbour view rooms which had excellent views. Maybe ask for higher floor. Great service especially housekeeping and Bell desk. Only thing the breakfast had long queues and as a result the food availability was stressed especially for egg counter.

title: Good hotel but Bed bugs present
desc: The young Filipina front desk was helpful and friendly. Location was great. It would have been a nicer experience overall but I got a lot of bug bites which was horrible. I had to asked housekeeping change bedsheets..

title: Simply great
desc: Great central location with great choice of food eateries and shops below. Sensational view from a really comfortable and spacious room. Seamless check in and check out experience. Great breakfast. Experience in Skye Bar memorable

title: Well located , Good stay
desc: Location is so great , most convenience for ppl who want to take MRT (downtown line) and also connected to shoppiing mall Raffle City which is good for shopping and easy to find nice restaurant . Good stay - Room very very clean and bed is soft so much comfy . the room facility and position of walking closet , restroom , living are and bed are well organized.

title: Lunar New Year 2023 @ Swiss√¥tel The Stamford
desc: Nobody throws a bash quite like Swiss√¥tel The Stamford Our only regret is we should have stayed one more night for even more feasting With that said kudos! Executive ‚Ä¢ Jeslin, M.Hanna, R.Strasser Reservations ‚Ä¢ Ana, Norman L65 Lounge ‚Ä¢ Eddy, Renan, R.Seah, R.Sanson, Rhea, Theva, Teresa, Thida, Emerlims, Zai, Juninee, Chef Andrew Front Office ‚Ä¢ Y.C., Alex, Kammie, Sue, Cess, Keane, Angelia, Coco, Vicky, Laurence Concierge ‚Ä¢ Azman, Arman, Naga, Thomas, Deseree, Perseus Housekeeping ‚Ä¢ Hong Zao Prego ‚Ä¢ Nikko, Danica, George, Yoges, Jessa, Bon

title: Fantastic view of the harbour from the higher floor rooms with a harbour view. Balcony was great. Room lovely.
desc: Fantastic view of the harbour from the higher floor rooms with a harbour view. Balcony was great. Room lovely. Excellent central Location. Staff extremely helpful. Restaurants a bit strange as in shopping centre. Buffet breakfast room ok but not 5 star luxury. Functional but like an airport buffet.

title: amazing stay
desc: Stay in this hotel for the 3rd time, staff knoledgeable, nice and helpful, well located hotel and convinience, nice hotel with great views, easy walking distance to many attractions. Happy to stay here, Thanks

title: Good location
desc: As always this is well located. It can get quite busy at times so you'd want to watch check in times. When I got it, it was around 11pm and the lounge check in had closed. There were only 2 people doing check in and 2 airlines had arrived plus a small flow of regular guest. It took ages to be seen and patience was starting the wear thin.

title: Great Location
desc: A nice hotel with great views, within easy walking distance to many attractions. The room was very spacious, with nice amenities, including a motion sensor night light and a balcony. Great shopping complex attached to the hotel.

title: Great stay‚Ä¶as always
desc: Starts right away with the reservation all the way through to the check out‚Ä¶friendly, knowledgeable and efficient staff. The location in Singapore is second to none with all of the transportation modes, literally, right next door.

title: Comfortable stay, enhanced by amenities in Raffles City
desc: We had a good stay at the Swissotel. It‚Äôs rooms are spacious , bright & functional. It‚Äôs a large hotel, catering for aircrew, tour groups & diverse clientele: the buffet breakfast can be very busy, and the lobby crowded and cluttered with assorted furniture. Nonetheless, the rooms are quiet,service standards adequate, & the self check out using the large monitors in the lobby surprisingly easy. The best part is easy access to the shopping mall with its many restaurants & cafes; and the subway which connects to Orchard road & the business precinct.

title: Good Stay on the Whole
desc: On the whole a very good stay in this 5-star hotel. The room is large clean and very comfortable. There is one glaring omission, A DESK for my laptop to work from, normally available in a Premier Inn in the UK. To me bizarre. The breakfast had plenty of choice, even smoked salmon. The was a problem with queuing, a que for the omelette station that varied between 4 and 10 people during my 5 breakfasts here and more than occasional queues to entre for breakfast. Could the two be linked i.e., people being seated but not eating because they were queuing for their egg and table blocking the breakfast restaurant. YOU NEED 2 EGG/OMLETTE STATIONS somewhere in the restaurant. A 5-star queue is not something to brag about. I did not queue for my omelette, not prepared to wait that long

title: Overall great stay!
desc: Overall great stay. Impressed with the self check-in and out service. Food options are great. Staff are amazing. The housekeeping service made sure that we have a clean room everyday. Located conveniently for all traveller types. Accessible to all modes of transport.

title: Nice Stay
desc: I am very satisfied with the swissotel stamford, i stayed last week with my family. The hotel is located in a very very good location, near Cuty Hall MRT, the MRT is just beside the hotel and the room is very spacious and clean. And whats more fabulous is my hotel room balcony is view the harbour. And we love it so much

title: Suite and executive lounge you won‚Äôt be disappointed
desc: Excellent location the staff were extremely helpful and attentive. Attention to detail in the suite rooms and the executive lounge was amazing. They were extremely helpful with sourcing GF food though out the entire stay

title: No more stay with Swissotel
desc: Very terrible management. Nobody would help you when I check in with young kids and 2-3 big luggage. Other hotels previously stayed like Shangri-La and W hotel would take over you to the room once you arrive in the hotel. No upgrade for Accor Gold Membership. Your have to pay a lot if you want to upgrade the room. No stay points for Accor Gold Membership if you booked the room not via their official website. Very disappointed with the service. The swimming is shared with Sofitel. It seems not clean.

title: Fantastic Service, Great location
desc: I had an amazing stay with a room overlooking the Marina Bay Sands! I love how thoughtful the cleaners were. The room was fresh everyday, they even arranged some of my personal clutters. It was right above a Metro station so it was very handy in moving around. Highly recommend it here!

title: Great location and another great stay
desc: Very comfortable rooms, with a good workspace and lovely views. Great food in the restaurants, with a warm and personal welcome. I always enjoy coming back to The Stamford each visit to Singapore. Definitely recommended

title: great position to explore Singapore
desc: our hotel room was excellent, and the staff we came into contact with were polite, helpful and most pleasant. My only negative was the automatic self check-in experience. If it is something not experienced before, or if you have had an early start and long journey, or if the lobby area is incredibly busy, it is not an easy process to switch onto. If you have all three of the above, then it is quite bewildering, suddenly trying to find booking references etc. A very helpful lady did get to us eventually, but all staff were busy when we arrived and we were left to try and sort it out ourselves. From that point on, once checked in, it was a great experience. A special mention to the guys that helped us when we were leaving the next day for the airport

title: Great Staff & Location But There Were Issues......
desc: We were very pleased with the staff, from the moment our taxi pulled up until we checked-out three days later. We booked a high floor which looked out over the water. The accommodations were very comfortable and we were treated to a cake to celebrate our 40th wedding anniversary. Unfortunately, there were IT issues upon arrival so we weren't able to easily check in. Staff was very courteous and helpful and expedited the process. The first morning, the toilet no longer flushed and while this was quickly fixed, we were disappointed that it even happened. Not that we watched much TV but it did not work our last night in Singapore which was also disappointing. There was never an acknowledgement of these issues when we checked out. Nonetheless, we enjoyed our stay at the

title: Executive lounge staff was not aware of Accor's policy on lounge access for Platinum member, hence I was short-changed!
desc: As an ALL Platinum member, I did not receive a room upgrade to a higher category. I booked a Signature King Suite for 3 persons as I was traveling with my mother and sister. Upon check-in, we were assigned a Signature King Suite on high floor. Perhaps that was considered an upgrade. That's fine. Although no one explained to me whether or not I received an upgrade. That was not an issue at all, because I understand that room upgrade is subject to availability. The issue was when I found out that I had been shortchanged! What I was completely unhappy about during this stay was, with 3 registered guests in the room, only 2 of us were allowed access to the Executive Lounge. I did not realize we had been short-changed until we checked-out and I verified on ALL website months

title: Great location
desc: We stayed 2 nights at Swissotel The Stamford. We had a room with a Marina Bay View which was lovely on the 13th Floor. The room was roomy with a small balcony. It was clean and the bed a king bed very comfortable. The dimmed lights that came on when they detected movement during the night were great when you needed the bathroom. You did not have to fumble in the dark for a light switch. The hotel was well located close to the MRT and shopping centre. There was a lovely tea place in the foyer TWG where we had lunch. Breakfast buffet at Cloves was lovely with a great selection of foods. I did find the check in and check out system cumbersome. The staff were very helpful though. However, we are still waiting for an email of our invoice for the stay. Unfortunately, I did not give a

title: Love the Swissotel Stamford
desc: We have stayed at the Swissotel Stamford many times because it‚Äôs so central to everything and the service is second to none. We would stay nowhere else while in Singapore . The view is outstanding, and it seems everything is at your doorstep, All Food and Beverage outlets are of an Excellent Standard.

title: Highly Recommended
desc: Room and bathroom were large and extremely clean. We had a normal room with a balcony overlooking Marina Bay. Rain shower head and normal lift off shower head in shower. Replacement of bathroom items daily. Clean towels daily. Lovely buffet breakfast with fresh eggs cooked in front of you. 6 bottles of complimentary water daily. Service was great. Wonderful position with MRT underneath hotel and also the Raffles Shopping Complex with lots of shops and food outlets. With the experience my husband and I had I would highly recommend this hotel. We booked through Luxury Escapes.

title: Our first memorable staycation at Swissotel The Stamford Singapore.
desc: It was our short staycation at Swissotel the Stamford. The location of the hotel is the plus point as it's the center of the city and there are so many shops and malls you can visit within walking distance. Check-In: Swissotel the Stamford like other Accor hotels has an option for customers to do online check-in and document submission. Once you completed the process there will be an email sent to you with QR Code. Upon arrival, the doorman welcomed my family with a warm greeting and smile. which makes my expectation of their service higher. The self-check kiosk in the lobby wasn't crowded. After trying to check in on my own, a check-in agent renders her assistance with the check-in. Room: We booked the swiss signature suite. The room was located on the 61st floor. when

title: Great Staycation
desc: Had a great staycation at Swissotel The Stamford. The hotel is very accessible as the MRT is right at its door step and staying here gave us lots of convenience with Raffles City Mall providing lots of F&B selections in addition to those outlets in the hotels. We are truly spoilt for choices. The staff are friendly and very helpful. We booked a Premium Harbour View Room with Double-Double bed. The room is spacious and clean and the view is spectacular. The hotel has a fully equipped gym and a nice swimming pool. We enjoyed staying in the room most of the time, enjoying the coziness and the beautiful view. I would strongly recommend this hotel to those who want a nice and cozy hotel with lots of convenience.

title: Great service
desc: Not only was this a great hotel but the service was amazing, especially Desiree who went out of her way to track down my passport that got left in a cab. Would have been lost without her. Would recommend this hotel

title: Top-notch location, well-appointed rooms and quality of service
desc: We really enjoyed our stay at Swissotel Stamford! Traveling with our senior citizen parents and checking in / out was really efficient and service is 100%. Also, the room was big enough to fit a lot of luggage and well furnished (especially the bathroom). There is a just a quick wait for breakfast if you get to the restaurant at around 9am onwards.

title: Great hotel with million dollar view and great service.
desc: Been staying here since it was built and was called the Westin. Accor took over and everything just keep improving both in service and in infrastructure. The view of the Marina Bay is so awesome Service is always great. We arrived early and not sure if we were allowed early check in. We were also but we're disappointed when we saw all the self check in screens and were worried about having to figure out how to do self the check in. Being people's person we do prefer to talk to human and feel the welcome of the staffs as they always make it very pleasant. Thankfully Ye Jie was there to help. Although she looked busy and swarmed with work, she helped us checked in and gave us a nice room on the high floor We had great stay and will make this our regular home everytime we

title: Room with a superb view! Great location!
desc: Stayed at the 'Swiss Harbour View King' room with a superb view of the city. The check-in and out process was swift. Unfortunately, there wasn't a proper queue at the counter, so when there were more people than the staff, people will start to cut the queue. Nonetheless, the service staff was friendly, and attentive and provided the necessary information required. The hotel location is easily accessible with local public transport. Furthermore, there were many shops available at the mall.

title: Excellent hotel would go back in an instant
desc: Staff: Efficient and friendly, ready to listen and assist. Swissotel telephone service: your calls answered in less than 20 seconds , room service on the ball! Lobby: great vibe Location: Couldn't be better. Linked to Raffles City and MRT Concierge: All so helpful. Please say hello to Fadzil. He is so helpful great sense of humour. Reservations: Norman got my booking done quickly and went through T & C's thoroughly.

title: Well and Good
desc: All went well and good which was made possible by service oriented staff who are friendly, helpful and accommodating not forgetting their passions and smiles. Specially applaud and mention the following staff for their good if not great service. Reservations : Norman Club Lounge : Eddy & The Team; Zhi Qi, Wan, Zai, Rhea, Cheary, Thelva, Sok Ling and Juninie Spa : Kathy and The Team; Chanel, Ethel and Siti I will be back and for more Indeed, a comfortable and satisfied staycation.

title: City Gem
desc: The view from our balcony was nothing short of astonishing, and the amenities of the room itself were first rate. I found myself thinking that travelers staying at other properties might have bragged about how they scored a pricey room at, say, the MBS, but the truth is their view of the city could not have been nearly as impressive as the one we had looking back at the harbor. Ideal location for most everything, including the City Hall train station immediately adjacent to the hotel and which provides access to the entire city, including the airport, without one suffering a single drop of rain to walk there. Singapore is not cheap, but this hotel is a great valuable compared to its competitors.

title: Good housekeeping team
desc: My husband and I had a good experience when staying at the swissotel for the first time. I liked and impressed with their service when we reported seeing some stains and dust in the room. The operator gave me good reassurance and patience to us during reporting. The housekeeping staff came fast to attend and the issue is settled in a short time. Here I wanted to say Thanks the housekeeping team for your efforts to make my journey great feeling. Especially Thanks Tony Zhen for the happy surprises during the special day.

title: Great rooom, hospitality needs work
desc: The room was great with an awesome view. The TV remote did not work sometimes, but it was manageable. The room did not have an electric adapter plug, which I felt was not hospitable knowing that I am from Japan. It was also a bit difficult to navigate the hotel as there were no maps provided, and there was an incident where hotel staff was not available for me to coat check my bag. The facilities were great, but the staff could improve with hospitality.

title: Great Staycation !
desc: Our room was on the high floor above Level 60th with a superb view of the Marina Bay Sands and the Marina Bay area. Always a pleasant experience staying at the Swissotel with the amazing hotel and housekeeping staff always ready to help :)

title: Amazing - Level 65 lounge, personalised service and the view - couldn't ask for more
desc: We visited Swissotel The Stamford for our 30th wedding anniversary. Our experience was positive from the moment we set foot in the foyer and were assisted with the check in process. Our room was on the 62nd floor with panoramic harbour views affording us the nightly light show from Marina Bay Sands and fireworks as part of the Chingay Festival. Awaiting us was a lovely towel decoration (swans) and a Swissotel signature cow pair - bride and groom plus a lovely chocolate cake. Just little extras that increased the feeling of being welcome. Our room included access for breakfast and afternoon drinks/snacks at the Level 65 lounge. This was a really great bonus and one we would highly recommend. Not just for the food and view but the staff who service this lounge go the extra length

title: A wonderful 4 day stay in Singapore. Our 1st time but not the last.
desc: My husband and I are waiting in the lounge to depart this beautiful hotel. We arrived Sunday the 12th. We flew from Sydney to Singapore on Qantas. I was apprehensive about Qantas because of the bad reviews of late but our experience was excellent. It helped get us in the positive mood for our trip. We arrived after 8pm at the hotel and we were greeted by Rennan. Such a lovely young man who provided us with coffee. We missed happy hour but ordered food to our room. He gave us an excellent room on the 62nd floor with a beautiful view of the harbour. I tried to go to sleep with the sinking pillow pounding it into shape. The next morning at breakfast in the lounge, I asked if they had memory foam pillows and extra coat hangers. We had a great breakfast and found both pillows and

title: Great hotel to stayWe really enjoyed the experience of staying in this hotel , service and rooms great, Wan in excellent
desc: We had a really excellent stay in this hotel, rooms very good, service by Wan in lounge a higher level, so good, rooms large and bathrooms very good, great location, wonderful, Anita and Michael Hanley, UK.Top bar a great view of Singapore, easy to walk to Matt.

title: Thank you for the pleasant experience!
desc: Great stay, well located, large rooms, comfy beds, food tad bit pricey and overall good security and privacy too. The hotel is right beside the City Hall MRT on the circle line and also next to Raffles City Mall which was convenient.

title: Great location ! Amazing view !
desc: Stayed 6 nights for a business trip ! Great experience, large and clean room, great staff always here to please the guest ! Stunning view in the executive room, and even more from the executive lounge for breakfast ! Loved the hotel ! Thank you all !

title: Great stay for business trips
desc: Amazing stay and great rooms. The hotel room are spacious and hygiene is paramount to housekeeping. Not only this the hotel staff went extra mile to make me feel comfortable by shifting me to a different floor due to renovation. I would love to come again to this hotel and receive the swissotel hospitality.

title: Superb
desc: I used my platinum suite upgrades to book the Harbour View suite. We were provided early check in and late check out, which was wonderful. This is a massive suite with a huge retro style fridge, 2 balconies, 2 bathrooms and thankfully a shower seperate to the bath tub. The rain shower is amazing. The view is spectacular and the only gripe about the room would be that the bed is overly firm. The staff in every department went above and beyond to provide excellent service. Pool area and pool bar are very nice. The club lounge on level 65 has extensive food and beverages and magnificent views. Wish we could have had more than 2 nights. The location is excellent with convenient access to the MRT.

title: Well located
desc: I got a room on the 26th floor. Had an amazing view of the Marina Bay Sands. The room itself was quite spacious. It had a big walk in shower with a rain head too, which was excellent. There were some issues with the AC, temperature was stuck at 19 degrees which made it very cold. Raffles Mall was 50m away from the hotel which was convenient. Loads of places to eat in the mall. MRT was also located in Raffles mall. Overall experience was great.

title: Great hotel
desc: Great location close to everything is the first advantage. When you travel by train from the airport the MRT station is just below. Next great staff and great service. The lounge staff were excellent. Breakfast has a wide range of food food from different cultures. The hotel wasn't cheap but definitely well worth the price.

title: Great location and venue
desc: Stayed here for a conference, location is fantastic with great rooms and amenities. The place is very clean with pleasant ambience with easy access to public transport, great shops, and a food court with plenty of dining options.

title: Well located. Nicely renovated.
desc: I was able to secure a room with a spectacular view. This was my second stay here, the first was pre-renovation. The renovation is tasteful and functional. The room cleanliness and service was excellent. Nothing negative. I now have a go-to hotel in Singapore.

title: Thank you for making me happy :)
desc: Thank you for making me happy :) The traffic and the view were good , Recommend. There is a shopping center in the basement, so you can buy some snack and beer. The facilities are normal, but the location, cost, etc. are satisfactoryüòâ ENJOY

title: Excellent service from excellent hotel
desc: My journey starts from booking by mobile app Accor, After I reconfirm to hotel with booking code, then they happily to respond positive. They also provide pre-arrival form to enable check in process easily and free-hassle. When I arrived in the hotel, from doorman, bellboy and receptionist staff are very quick response and served us with good quality of knowledge and know very well about customer's choices. When I was in the room: + Room is very spacious, my boy was very happy, especially with the city view. Even though I didn't get MBS view. + Towel is completed, big, medium and hand towel are provided. + Mineral water also enough for us. + Bathroom is very OK, clean and spacious. + Clean room was excellent, since my boy has dust allergic, and he was OK during stay in the

title: Great location, great hotel and happy staff
desc: Everything about this hotel says quality and great service. Great communication between concierge when booking transport to and from airport and also making a booking at the Skai for afternoon tea which was delicious.

title: A great and Memorable Experience
desc: We had a great time staying in Swissotel the Stamford Singapore, from the day of our arrival until the end of our stay. Kudos to all the staff especially the warmth and excellent service we recieve from Desiree, Princess, Perseus .The topnach dining experience in Jaan Restaurant from Elaine, Chef Kirk , Chef Hafiz & Steven. Thank you very very much ,you all made our holiday extra special!! Mr & Mrs. Gross, Switzerland

title: The best hotel in Singapore
desc: Hi Mr Robert Thank you for the Swissotel/Fairmont team in giving us the best ever hospitality I can experienced in Singapore. Not to mention Mr Norman and his team for arranging the wonderful hotel stay for us. Rest assured, I will definitely stay again and introduce my friends. In fact I have booked the next Swissotel stay end of this month. For any holiday maker that want to look for a hotel in Singapore. As a local, I will strongly recommend Swissotel. Location,service, products and views are world class. Best Regards Donovan

title: Living in my dreams
desc: Swissotel was a dreamy experience. I stayed for 4 nights and each night slept with the curtains open. It felt so calming to look outside the balcony and see the gorgeous view of Marina Bay. I stayed in a PREMIER HARBOUR, 2 Doubles, 430 SF (40 SM), balcony, harbour view. The room was clean, smells so good and fresh and the bed was prestine, i slept really good. I had enough space for my luggage and workspace. It has the MOST PERFECT (I Know!) VIEW! If there were items I thought lacking they are as follows: 1. Bidet in the toilet 2. Safety deposit box, if the room had one, I wasn't able to find it 3. TV was not working, despite a remote control change Plus points: 1. Attentive room service (I asked for a weighing scale and they provided one) 2. Breakfast at options at

title: Excellent stay
desc: The room was spacious and the location of the hotel was great. The view was spectacular as we could see the landmarks of Singapore just from the balcony. It was so sweet and kind of the hotel to prepare a cake for my birthday celebration. A perfect hotel for a weekend getaway for its convenient location!

title: Bad customer experience
desc: Totally disappointed for an Accor Plus Gold Member. Especially for the service for the male service staff during the check-in. The first experience during the check-in had ruined the stay and was only provided the room like 5pm+ and no late check out given for the next day even though the room was given to me late.

title: Five Star Stay at the Swissotel The Stamford Singapore
desc: Stayed at the Swissotel The Stamford for 8 days from the 24th of April. We can not speak highly enough of this hotel, all the staff were so very helpful and accommodating nothing was too much trouble and that includes the communication with the hotel prior to our arrival. The breakfasts certainly catered for all cuisines and definitely a must to get off to a good start. Our room was meticulously cleaned each day and was a pleasure to comeback to after a long day out and about. I would with out any hesitation stay there again.

title: Excellent service from Reservations team, Timothy
desc: I had the best experience with the reservations team, namely Timothy. It was a really last minute booking for a client who is flying in the next day from Indonesia. Timothy really went the extra mile and helped with this super last minute booking. I would like to highly commend his professionalism and excellent service! Moreover, my client was happy with her stay! Thanks Timothy!!

title: Great central hotel in Singapore
desc: Gorgeous hotel with all the facilities you would want. Across the road from Raffles with train service on the door step. Attentive staff and great service. Buffet breakfast was fabulous with loads of variety. My second stay at this hotel and would be my go to next time in Singapore.

title: Am liking this hotel very much
desc: I'm liking this hotel very much. Having stayed at the neighbouring Fairmont and Sofitel City Centre as well as J W Marriott, the Accor hotels are better designed, priced and a better choice (i think) for Accor Plus members. Swissotel was already aware of my platinum status without me asking and afforded me all the perks that coming along with it. Check in took a few minutes as someone guided me through the computerised check in system. The view is spectacular especially at night. The executive lounge was bigger with a greater choice of food compared to Sofitel. The bathtub was great and i liked the Purovel soaps. The de rigeur nespresso was welcome. I didn't have a chance to try the pool.and gym but both looked good. Comfy beds. nice bedlinen and charging ports bedside are all

title: 24 hours in Singapore
desc: We had a tight connection traveling through Changi Airport, so decided to delay our outbound flight to the next day. Spent the night at the Swissotel, and loved the experience! The view from the room was amazing. Breakfast from room service was wonderful, and the location near the waterfront made it really easy to take in many of the sites around the central business district before heading out the next evening.

title: Well located with many amenities
desc: Swissotel Stamford is well located, clean and comfortable. The Swiss Signature room is spacious and comfortable. It has 2 balconies and i could see the seaview and the city skyline. The toilet has a bathtub but there is no standing shower. The pillows were too soft for my comfort. Wish they have pillows of different firmness for guest to select.

title: Great View of Marina Bay Area
desc: + Great view of Marina Bay area from my 51 storey high-floor room. + Given late check-out at 2pm. - some of the Toiletry dispensers in bathroom are not working. - No complimentary parking. Parking rate is $2.60/hour from 8am to 6pm, $3.25/entry after 6pm to 8am.

title: Best location
desc: I have stayed in many hotels in Singapore (mostly in Orchard) and Swissotel so far has the best location. MRT is practically in the same building with the hotel, right on the corner of the lobby, don't need to cross the street. Easy to hail the cabs, no waiting time. So many restaurants in the mall. It's like Orchard without the crowds. Perfect for me. Room is spacious for Singapore standards. Room service is fast and the price is reasonable, unlike most five star hotels. Definitely my go-to hotel in Singapore from now on.

title: Great View Great Service Crew
desc: Check-in was smooth with lots of staff manning the counters yesterday! Our request for late check-out was approved almost immediately. Stayed for one night with spectacular view on 27th floor! King plus sized bed super comfy. However, pillows too soft for us. Breakfast at Clove good spread. Had a diy station for the noodles. Prawn soup very delicious! Pancakes freshly made but did not try. Coffee was great! Latte macchiato especially! Attentive breakfast service crew at Clove and even showed us around since the crowd not in yet before 7! After 8 will be crowded.

title: Don‚Äôt recommend
desc: + helpful and nice stuff + Gorgeous view from harbour view rooms - miserable limited breakfast. It seems like there is plenty of everything, in fact there is nothing good to eat. No fresh juice , not even talking about the variety, as it‚Äôs normal to see at least several kind of freshly squeezed juices at the same priced 5 stars hotels , even lack of the basic orange juice. During 20 years of active traveling throughout the world , always staying at 5-stars hotels, that‚Äôs the only hotel , where there is no fresh orange juice for breakfast . Only iced juices from the pack. Also there is no porridge ( my daughter used to have it for breakfast) , no waffles and no pancake station - really very bad ones, you should make the pancakes yourself in a very strange machine without

title: Well located, Good view, Best Experience
desc: A hotel in the middle of the city, on top of MRT Station, and the service and quality also very Good, Tried the breakfast also, all is Delicious, Staff very helpful. Definitely a good place to stay in Singapore.

title: Convenient location and beautiful views
desc: I always find my stay at Swissotel The Stamford to be pleasant and the rooms are spacious and clean. You'll get one of the best vistas of Singapore and is conveniently located above Raffles City and MRT station.

title: Great rooms, excellent service!
desc: I had a great experience with Swiss√¥tel. Great service from the advice on room selection, late checkout and the arrangement for my family. I love the view and had the best sleep I ever had in a hotel. Thanks for the exceptional hospitality!

title: Luxury , Location, shopping, food options, access all in 1 location.
desc: Top Location for Food outlets, Shopping , entertainment, room amenities and Most enthusiastic Team ( especially Ms Eddy Tan ). Rooms with a Great View and Location walking distance to many attractions . Subway Trains etc all great . Get club lounge access for Biggest classy comfortable club Lounge in any hotel in the world ( my own judgement ) .

title: Good but could be better
desc: We had stayed many many times before at the Swissotel til around 10 years ago so we were interested to be back. You can check in online in advance which does speed check in up which is great. We had always stayed in Executive Rooms before and did this time too. There is a difference tho compared to before. They have added lots and lots more executive rooms with the result that our room was not on 'curve' of the hotel as before. View was therefore not as good. Executive Lounge is now an entire floor compared to the small one before. Canapes in the evening time were good but alot of the dishes were not hot enough. Service was excellent tho especially Ria who always had huge smile for us....she was there 10 years ago and it was lovely to see her again. The location of the hotel

title: Spectacular hotel and view
desc: Great hotel with spectacular view to the harbour. Positioned in a good location and close to MRT, shops, gardens by the bay, and Bugis Junction. Staff are kind and friendly. I would like to especially thank Aini & Hoang Lam for their creative work in making my kids bed. Would definitely recommend Swissotel üëå.

title: Top notch Service!
desc: We had the most fantastic time staying here on our 7 day holiday in Singapore. We loved the selection of 4 buffet restaurants for the breakfast, and the use of the lounge on level 65 was perfect for snacks and drinks. The willow stream spa was amazing also and so were the gym facilities. The service and hospitality was top notch. Eddy and the team did a fantastic job. Big thanks to Rhea on level 65! We can‚Äôt wait to be back!

title: Great service from Hai Jia
desc: I was very much surprised on day 2 of my stay with a lovely happy birthday display on my bed made up of towel animals, balloon's, ribbons and card from Hai Jia housekeeping. She went above and beyond. Thank you so very much. Comfortable and good size rooms with fresh drinking water on tap and great view.

title: Swissotel - might not be back
desc: First of all, the hotel is seated right smack in the city center, which makes things very convenient. The room is very clean and comfortable. However, there was no complimentary parking for guest. I‚Äôve stayed at a few hotels in Singapore and I‚Äôve never encountered one where they don‚Äôt provide complimentary parking. I‚Äôm truly disappointed as I ended up paying much more in total than staying at other hotels which provide complimentary parking. Might not consider this hotel in the future as there are a lot more hotels in the proximity that provides free parking at a lower price.

title: Happy staff will lead to happy guest
desc: Dear Mr William Indeed another great experience at Swissotel. Has stayed this hotel twice in 2 months. This can explained how much we love this hotel. As a local, I can recommend to any tourist who will be visiting Singapore anytime , choose Swissotel or Fairmont and not other hotels. The location, services and the breakfast are worthy of 5 stars standard. The train station is right below the hotel, Merlion is within walking distance, the staff never fail to go extra mile and food selection of buffet is spoilt with choices. Good job to Mr Norman and the team in arranging the stay once again. Not to mention the Willow Stream Spa staff Ethel,Siti,Tony who upkeep the place clean and comfortable for the guests to relax. To the management, keep up the good work in keeping the

title: Hospitality is in the air
desc: Arrived at the hotel past noon and was warm welcomed by the staff and she introduced me to miss Laurence who helped me to check-in at this highly recommended hotel. Miss Laurence helped me a lot and did her very best in a most friendly way to accommodate our family needs and she is really the true representative of the Accor groups level of hospitality. She really deserves a raise or a promotion! Booked two connecting rooms and they were just perfect! Located at 43rd floor, the view was amazing and I really enjoyed spending my time at the balcony looking at the city view of Singapore. The rooms were clean and beautifully design, the beds are comfy and everything there was just perfect! Few minutes by taxi to Orchard Road (Ngee A City) and to the shoppes at MBS, the hotel is

title: Best of the Best
desc: Thanks to the warmth and hospitality of the staff at your hotel, my wife and I are grateful to you and your team for the extraordinary service provided on our arrival , and off course room preparation was extraordinary . You all went above and beyond to ensure comfortable stay will be cared for throughout our time with you. This has turned out to be the best stay we had so far. The professionalism and warmth your team exuded made us feel quite at home. Thank you!

title: Amazing place to stay
desc: We went to Singapore as a school holiday break and stayed at the Swissotel from 20th to 25th April. Our stay was so much joyous by selecting this hotel. From the very moment we put our feet down we were met with the kindness and respect. Our earlier check in process was flawless. Our room 5555 was upgraded in recognition of our platinum membership to one of the highest level rooms and best and lovely views to Marina Bay. Excellent breakfast for the 2 restaurants and Junior Aloysisious is a great attendant . I will start out by saying that all the staff with whom we had contact at the executive Lounge, were excellent, and they really did make us feel welcome. I recalled their names are Wan, Rhea, Renan and Sok Ling. They went above and beyond, recommended places to visit and

title: Great stay
desc: Fluffiest pillow ever. Staff there were very helpful and friendly, going out their way to help me and my wife. The view was great looking out into singapore‚Äôs skyline whether day or night. L65 lounge is beautiful.

title: Great View, Great Location, BUT...
desc: It was the first time I had experienced automated check-in, and I felt it was very impersonal. I understand the system's motive, but I hope there's a "check-in counter" for those who prefer assisted check-in. The hotel has a great view of the harbor and Marina Bay, as we have booked for the Harbor View. One thing that I don't like is that the toilet doesn't have a bidet.
