You have to wash yourself up on the bathtub slash shower. Because of that, I decided not to use the bathtub during my stay because I couldn't stop thinking about how dirty the bathtub was. Though overall, I am satisfied with my stay. It has a good location, a few meters from the train station, and it is beside Raffles City Shopping Mall which has plenty of food in the food court.

title: Great hotel
desc: Luxury twin room, great facilities, coffee maker, kettle, fabulous shower room with eco ethos (sustainable materials, reduced laundry unless requested etc). Twice daily room check to top up drink items. Amazing views. At breakfast they have an egg chef who makes magical eggs with a range of food choices to suit all tastes. Great pool and spa easy to access. The beds were a little too firm. Extremely convenient location with many walkable things to visit (Orchard Rd, Chinatown, waterfront)

title: Over the top
desc: Very nice hotel in a good environment ! Easy access from the airport close to main attractions in Singapore Astonishing views! Good pool and Fitness! Also to recommend for runners as Parks are close!

title: Great location
desc: Service was outstanding! Rooms spacious and clean. Located in City hall MRT really convenience with direct line to the airport. Many of the tourists places are walkable distante from the hotel. Highly recommend the stay here. Downside: I was expecting a bigger gym facilities given the size of the hotel so a bit disappointed with that.

title: Great service
desc: Great room, great service and location, nice touch when the room was made for us. Great water pressure in the shower, nice to have a balcony in the room as well. Plenty of shops nearby. Highly recommended for families with young children as it‚Äôs easy to get around when your toddler has a tantrum

title: Home Sweet Home
desc: I‚Äòm so grateful and so excited to have got another opportunity to spent some days at the most heartfelt and welcoming hotel worldwide we have ever visited with the most famous and iconic harbour view of Marina Bay in Singapore we have ever enjoyed. Just get to know Swissotel The Stamford and your dream to touch of home sweet home will become true! Our heartfelt thanks and big hugs to the entire team of this unique place on the earth, especially to the Level 65 team and most personally to Eddy Tan, Norman Leong, Robert Strasser and William Haandrikman as a new captain on board. Looking forward to seeing all of you, guys, again soon!

title: Wondrous staycation April 2023
desc: Had a wonderful staycation with my nephew at Swissotel (second stay). Stayed on level 57 King Premier harbour view room and woke up to stunning sunrise of the harbour and city landscape. At night will see the beautiful night lights of the harbour and its surroundings that make you just want to chill in the room instead of heading out. The hotel staff were very friendly and responded to our queries efficiently and made us feel so at home. Swissotel is centrally located above the mrt, Raffles City Shopping Centre and is within walking distance to other nearby malls at Suntec City and Marina Square. Special thanks to Ms Eddy Tan and her team for making this staycation a memorable one for my nephew. He is already thinking of the next date to come back for staycation.

title: Warm and personalised birthday staycation experience
desc: We booked the Swissotel for a special birthday staycation for my mum, which involved three generations of family members, including a young toddler. The hotel made us feel welcome from the very start, including a welcome fruit basket, red wine, personalised note, and beautiful birthday helium double balloons. Not forgetting a cute tuxedo cow plush toy for the little one. We'd like to give a special shoutout to Eddy of Guest Services for her warm personality, and going the extra mile to make this weekend a truly special and enjoyable one. We'll be back for sure! P.S. While there is no complimentary parking, 35 sgd for the entire stay (flat fee, multiple entry) is very reasonable and having lots reserved right in front of the hotel lobby made for easy access. All in, it was a

title: Great location and superb view
desc: Location was very central and easy access to MRT. Well connected to many shopping malls and plenty of dining options. Kid-friendly pools and welcome drink can be enjoyed at the poolside. View was great at the balcony!

title: Excellent view!!
desc: Harbour View room has the best view. Highly recommended. The room comes with water filtered tap for consumption. Equipped with ironing board and bathtub. Nespresso coffee and twg tea bags provided. Nice swimming pool too. Lastly, excellent staff!!!

title: Memorable stay in Swissotel the Stamford !
desc: Last year I enjoyed staying in this lovely hotel 2 times . This year extra few days & i had more memorable days. The beds are comfortable & the bathroom is complete with i need . Being Platinum status of Accor i had 65 th level for my perfect breakfast with Rhia and all staff there . All these great things I had enjoyed thank to Ms Eddy who is always sweet & helpful ,being the team leader of staff.Jacquiline andMai from housekeeping had done well, Allan friendly/helpful concierge always there to help me, Once i accidentally pressed the emergency button , Azhar from security came . I fell down Brian lifted me up when my friend could not. Swissotel the Stamford is in great area

title: Would have given two stars if not because of a great housekeeping staff
desc: To be honest, I would give only two-stars to this hotel if not because of the great housekeeping staff. I am giving 5 starts so that they can get the credit for year-end bonus. But make no mistake, I think Swissotel overall only deserve a two-star. I want to give special thanks to the housekeeping staff Tong Zhen, she is absolutely wonderful. Not only does she cleans the room so well, she makes cute animals from towels to make my daughter very happy, she even bought snacks out of her pocket for my daughter. She refused any tips when I tried to give to her. She is definitely the best housekeeping personel I have ever met and I have lived in many hotels all over the world. Unfortunately, that's about the only good thing about Swissotel. The room is alright, I mean, standard

title: Fabulous!
desc: We stayed for 5 nights in April, and our family had two rooms on the 61st floor with access to the lounge on 65th floor. I can certainly recommend these rooms because the views from that height were sensational, and from the lounge the view included the Marina Bay Sands and the bay itself. The rooms were immaculately presented, reasonably spacious with huge ( and comfy) beds. There was a Nespresso machine included. We chose to eat breakfast in the lounge most days - this was very good indeed with an omelette chef on duty (always a tick in the box for me), and the atmosphere was calm. We did eat downstairs in the main restaurant but that was much more noisy and chaotic. Happy hour in the lounge was highly enjoyable - good quality wines and spirits available and beer on tap.

title: Amazing place will definitely be back
desc: Our 1st stay here at Swissotell Singapore and can't say enough regarding the 5 star service we received. We had breakfast most mornings at level 65 and the selection was amazing compared to other lounges we have been to. A special 5 star rating to our host Rhea for her exceptional service and a beautiful person who just could not do enough for us. Thank you for making our stay a memorable one. 5 stars all round.

title: Very good stay
desc: Celebrated my child's 5th birthday here, and they provided a birthday cake for her. Beautiful MBS and Harbour view. Self check in is a bit tricky but hotel staff will help you once you arrive. Room is very comfy. Pool is nice especially for kids.

title: Highly recommended for best service
desc: Service is top notch. Aini from housekeeping took the trouble to arrange my son‚Äôs toys and turned them into a playground. Thank you for making our day. Excellent location and friendly staff all round.

title: Luxury and Convenience in the Heart of Singapore
desc: I recently stayed at the Swissotel The Stamford with my family for 5 days and we had a great experience. Our room had a beautiful view of the bay and was designed with modern furnishings that gave it a luxurious feel. However, the water pressure in the shower could have been better. The location of the hotel was fantastic - it's connected to the Raffles City shopping complex which provided plenty of food options and shopping choices. We even visited the grocery at the basement level which was convenient for picking up snacks and drinks. One of the highlights of our stay was taking walks and jogs around the area of the hotel. The scenic views and clean streets made for a pleasant outdoor experience. Overall, the Swissotel The Stamford offers luxury and convenience in the

title: Thanks to ur perfect service.(thanks weiwei)
desc: It's my perfect trip with our hotel. Especially, weiwei is the best worker in the hotel. My son touched with a work of art. It is impossible to make the art with just towel and my son's dolls. It is the most memorable tip in my life. Thanks^^

title: 5star service
desc: We cannot fault our stay here. We booked rooms on high levels which included the level 65 lounge where breakfast and happy hour is served every day. We would like to nominate Cheary from 65 for his utmost attention and 5star service. I suffered a leg injury prior to arriving, Cheary stepped up and provided me assistance to and from the buffet food and drinks selection.I was never out of his sight and he couldn't do enough for me. Thank you Cheary. We will definitely be returning here in the not too distant future.

title: Everything is awesome
desc: Everything was perfect but drinking water from faucet was bad. Called to the guy to check it and he said that the filter was replaced a month ago. So seemed that I didn‚Äôt like the taste. It might be a good idea to have any alternative about someone who doesn‚Äôt like the taste of water.

title: View is Spectacular but Staff are even better.
desc: Stayed five nights in a harbour view high floor room. The view over Marina Bay is spectacular. First time visitors to Singapore should always choose this room type. The hotel is well located with MRT and Raffles City mall directly underneath. There is a self-Check-in but staff are always available to assist. As an Accor platinum member, we had access to the lounge on level 65. The staff are amazing, especially Cheary, ZhiQi and Rhea who looked after us over the five days. The director of guest relations, Eddy Tan, is an asset to the hotel. Eddy goes above and beyond to ensure you have the best stay possible. She made our stay like a second home. Looking forward to returning soon.

title: Nice hotel
desc: This is not my first stay in swissotel raffles singapore , inlke the vibes and rooms amenities are excellent and cleanlines of room is one of the best , two thumb up for house keeping team they are really excellent , room are always clean and tidy each day ! many thanks !!

title: Great views and good location.
desc: It was a very nice experience. The best part is that I had the most iconic view of Singapore all to ourselves. And, with only an elevator and escalator ride, you can reach a large shopping mall and MRT terminal station. MRT City Hall station adjacent to the hotel provides easy access by train to major tourist destinations such as Gardens by the Bay, Chinatown and Orchard. Merlion Park is a 3-5 minute walk away.„ÄÄThe shopping mall adjacent to the hotel has a supermarket and Starbucks. The rooms are very economical, as clean drinking water is available from the tap in the room. The only disappointment is that the shower booth and bathtub are not separated. The bathtub does not drain well, so it is not possible to take a long soak in the bathtub after showering. It was also

title: Great location and cleanliness room
desc: The Swissotel the Stamford is my preferred hotel when traveling to Singapore. It is convenient to transfer by MRT from Changi Airport. Checkin and checkout is convenient, room is cleaned and sizeable with good bed and pillow for deep sleep. The club lounge is big and having space for relaxing, working with all day refreshments (soft drinks and cookies).

title: Pampercation
desc: 64th floor Crest Suite Harbour view. Spacious suite with spectacular view, complimentary minibar, access to Executive Lounge, we are here to indulge ourselves with the service and this marvellous suite. Personal Meet & Greet as we arrive at the hotel. Private escort directly to our suite for check-in. An extra touch of birthday greetings in the suite even though I mentioned ‚Äúa late birthday surprise‚Äù. We explored all the different options for breakfast, the buffet are very generously spread out and delicious! Swimming pool and the surrounding area is very small considering the capacity of the 2 hotels (sharing pool with Fairmont!). Our room service experience was brilliant, food was served hot and service from the young lady, (sorry I forgot her name) full of personality and

title: Stay for two nights in June
desc: Everything was fine except for two things ----The room was too cold and the air conditioner would not adjust to a higher setting .We gave up . The shower control did not work correctly , so a lot of water ended up on the floor .

title: The hotel location is good however service is very poor.
desc: It is purely a business hotel. Just in and out. Not for family. Front desk staff are very rude and are so busy that they are not ready to help. Breakfast especially the Indian vegetarian is very sad. Not Varity or effort from the staff. No innovation. Just do the job day after day without any feedback or suggestion.

title: Choice of no regret
desc: I thought I chose a Swissotel well in Singapore where I visited for the second time to celebrate my mother's birthday. All the staff were friendly from the time we arrived at the hotel until we checked in, and the scent from the lobby was not too excessive we liked it because it felt fresh. we enjoyed a delicious dinner in the lounge on the 65th floor with a wonderful sunset of Singapore, and we were satisfied with the neat breakfast the next morning. Above all, I was able to enjoy the beautiful view of Marina Bay thanks to the skilful handling of the staff Mr. Hyun. Thank you Mr. Hyun for giving us unforgettable memories for the rest of our life. Not only hotel facilities, but also hotel accessibility, and travel to nearby commercial districts and tourist attractions were all

title: Outstanding! Excellent service. Beautiful rooms. Shops and public transport within hotel property. Definitely recommend.
desc: Wow! Such a beautiful hotel with amazing staff, excellent service. Just about everything you want or is right there, no need to leave the hotel if you don‚Äôt want to. Rooms are very spacious and comfortable. Great pool and pool bar area. The Brasserie in the lobby was a favorite. Very popular hotel so lots of people coming and going at all times. But lots of staff always available. No request was a problem. Cared very much for your concerns.

title: A Remarkable Experience at Swissotel, Championed by Ms. Eddy Tan and Her Team
desc: My recent stay at Swissotel was an experience par excellence, thanks in large part to the stellar team guided by the incomparable Ms. Eddy Tan. As a seasoned traveller, I've stayed in numerous hotels, but rarely have I been treated to such a sublime blend of warmth, hospitality, and consummate professionalism. From the moment I arrived at Swissotel, Ms. Tan and her team welcomed me with open arms, ensuring my experience was memorable. Ms. Tan, an embodiment of grace and dedication, has undoubtedly elevated the standards of hospitality. Every request was met promptly, and her genuine attentiveness made me feel truly valued. The Guest Services staff deserves a standing ovation for their unmatched service. They went out of their way to cater to my every need. Each team member,

title: will be staying again
desc: Great experience. Hotel is in a great location, staff are friendly and efficient. Rooms are of a good size and breakfasts are just magnificent. Hotel offers everything you could wish for. sits atop the underground so easy to get around.

title: Family friendly
desc: Very family friendly and the hotel staff are extremely helpful. A special shout out to Gui He who provided excellent service. Very convenient location, shopping mall and MRT are just downstairs. Will book again if I'm back to Singapore in future.

title: Thank you
desc: Made our trip very special for my fathers 80th birthday. Thank you to Yue Yuan for the surprise birthday treat. Hotel was nice and comfortable. Huge bed and great check in service. Would definitely stay here again ‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶..

title: Simply Amazing!
desc: The Swissotel Stamford is the perfect place to stay in Singapore. Located above the City Hall MRT it allows easy access to all parts of the island. Our Room was extremely comfortable, beautifully decorated and with a stunning view of the harbour...simply mesmerising! We thoroughly enjoyed the Executive Lounge during our 8 night stay. Staff were all friendly and attentive.

title: Swissotel Stamford is AWESOME
desc: The hotel is very nice, very clean, up to date and in a great location. Close walking distance to all the most popular attractions and sites. The best sea and city view. Aini and Anh showed great hospitality and took excellent care of the room and were very courteous.

title: Customer service at its best
desc: They say first impressions last- well Swissotel has an incredible front desk that assist hotel guests in and out. As a parent with two young babies the customer service team were more than helpful, accomodating and a delight. Very grateful to the team.

title: Awesome Swissotel experience!
desc: Best IG view for sharing. From check-in to check-out, the staff were awesome. You will have free access to there Steam and Sauna facility. And you have quick access to every where, mall, food court downstairs and MRT. The highlight, they have their own TWG Tea Shop. Worth every dollars spent.

title: Great staycay
desc: Modern good size comfy room with awesome city view of the MBS area. Love the idea of filtered water tap for endless drinking water üëç Thank you team for the thoughtful brownie cake for my birthday too!

title: Home away from home
desc: It's comming home every time I stay there and this since 1999 Some of the staff is like my extended family as we know each other's for years or decades Having all this makes this place my 2nd home away from home There are a few minor defects but that's nothing to spoil the home away from home

title: The highest hotel in Singapore
desc: Good as always from few decades ago named as Westin and even better now as Swissotel. Good location for food, point of interests, local friend picks up and right in the center of southern Singapore near the Merina Bay area.

title: Cool view even better people
desc: Beautiful stay in a high level room with an incredible view. A special mention for Cheary who showed saved our bag from forgetful us two times and was a friendly joyful face to have around and help us. Fantastic man, thumbs up üëç

title: Nice surprise
desc: Had a wonderful experience. Celebrated my wife‚Äôs birthday there and had a very pleasant surprise. The team set up our room with towel animal craft with happy birthday wish. Appreciated the special touch especially to Aini.

title: The Swissotel Stamford
desc: Excellent staff, location, service, rooms and view. Couldn't fault it, especially if you are an Accor Member. Fantastic views. Great choice of bars and restaurants. MRT and shops directly underneath.

title: Well done Swissotel
desc: Great location and value for money. Close to Cityhall MRT and shopping mall. Great breakfast buffet. Staff are friendly, helpful and very professional. Thank you Silwissotel for making our trip to Singapore memorable.

title: Great hotel
desc: Had a great experience, as usual, magnificent service and wonderful staff. Stayed on the 30th and the views where magnificent. Recommend highly. The breakfast was like most hotels , many choices and cater for everyone. If you like a cooked breakfast, they‚Äôre magnificent.

title: No Compassion. Not honoring early check-in even when rooms are available.
desc: Arrived Singapore from Europe at 6am. The hotel is not full the night before and I booked a 3-night stay. They demanded $300 SGD for early check-in "in fairness to other hotel guests who paid for the night before." I didn't even understand what they were talking about. The ones who paid for the night before because they needed the room the night before. We are here for an event with dozens of rooms booked plus event venue. They'd rather let a room sit empty than showing some compassion and let me in early. What kind of service is this? I would refuse to stay at this hotel unless there's an event on site and I absolutely need to stay here. In addition, while charging 10% service is standard throughout Asia, check-in here is automated at kioks yet they are very buggy. Why do I

title: Service at the lounge
desc: Excellent service at the lounge and very accommodating by all staff, especially Cheary. Thank you Cheary for the amazing service. Would definitely recommend and stay here again in the future! A big thank you to all staff!

title: No Complains. Fantastic service.
desc: No Complains. Fantastic service. Staff knows everything and issues was fixed almost immediately without disturbing my stay. Location was good and was able to catch the fireworks from the nearby NDP rehearsal.

title: Spacious room with perfect view
desc: We had a 3D2N staycation using the AMEX welcome vouchers, and was looking for a larger room than the default selection. Upon check-in, we were offered the option to upgrade to the Crest Suite, and it was the best decision ever made; the kids never ran out of play space and they had the time of their lives. The view was mesmerizing and it was tough to say goodbye at the end of the stay. Though we had to top-up quite a fair bit for the upgrade, it was well worth it and we would do it again. Maybe we'll try out the Presidential Suite next.... Great service overall, and late check-out at 1pm was accommodated which let us soak in the comfort of the room slightly longer. My only complains were the rather sterile feel at the check-in stations rather than traditional desks, and the

title: Marvellous
desc: Very nice hotel room are comfy and bery clean , amenities great and premiere lounge is awesome though the staff are not very attentive compare with premier lounge staff at sofitel or even pullman staf are more attentive

title: Excellent hotel and staff
desc: We stayed for 3 nights. Stayed at the 54th floor and it was the best stay ever! From front office team to housekeeping and F&B. They were very helpful and very hospitable! Best hotel to stay in Singapore that feels like home but with luxury feels! Hopefully to come back again.

title: 1 of the best and affordable stay for a family of 4
desc: All things about the hotel are great. From room to breakfast to services. The only thing of concern will be informing the guest before or after the booking is made about the parking service. I.E. the Hotel does not provide complimentary parking or what are the parking option available if the guest is to drive for staycation.

title: Time To Remember
desc: Comfortable and satisfied staycation which was made possible by service oriented staff and comprehensive facilities. Centrally located and easily accessible to shopping malls. F & B outlets, museums and public transport with a nearby train station. Following hotel staff were mentioned for their caring, helpful and great service attitudes. Club Lounge : Eddy & Team; Ronald, Rhea, Laurence, Thida, Zai, Cheary, Sok Ling. Operations - Terence Kong Eight Restaurant /Swimming Pool : Raj, Yogesh, Steven, Salleh and Daniel. Concierge : Ian Pereira, Javin and Hafiz. Recommended for relaxing, refreshing and rejuvenating staycation.

title: Staycation with Swissotel
desc: The stay is generally great. However, area for improvement is to provide complimentary car park for locals on their staycation like any other hotel. The parking at Raffles City is expensive especially overnight.

title: Twin bed room can fit a family of 4
desc: Love that this hotel's twin bed are big enough for family of 4. It's really a plus point for a family like us. We got welcome fruits in the room when checked in and a nice chocolate cake (big one) everyday. The view from our room was amazing. Will love to come back again when visit Singapore.

title: Harbour view was stunning.
desc: Perfect location, located right at the train station and connected to the shopping mall, very convenient to go around. My room was spacious and faced the marina bay sand view. I highly recommend to experience the rooftop bar. It‚Äôs one of the best rooftop in Singapore!

title: Perfect
desc: Good location for leisure and business, near to Suntec convention building, good stay : nice property toom clean and bright, good food at breakfast and lunch, smooth aervice since check in to check out.

title: Excellent trip thanks to this hotel
desc: This hotel is excellent. Everything was fine. The view on the city was nice. Room was very clean. The staff is helpful. I was there for the Olympic Esports Week 2023 and have stayed 6 perfect nights. It was very calm even if I was only at a low floor (7th), so I have slept very well. Beds were so comfortable. I slept even better than when I was in Marina Bay Sands. Perfect stay!

title: a great work trip!
desc: The hotel is at a great location, at the center of many things. The staff are very friendly. Rhea and Laurence at the executive lounge were extremely helpful and kind. they made our stay so smooth and special!

title: Best Anniversary Staycation
desc: The Marina Bay view is just the perfect view. Thank You to Eddy and her staff team for making our staycation very special. It's a pleasure to meet familiar hotel staff and new ones too. And also Thank You to the cleaning staff for keeping our room cozy and clean.

title: 53rd floor and stunning view!
desc: The bed linen, comfortable mattress and beautiful views makes this a fantastic choice. For convenience (next to raffles and above a good shopping centre and 5 minute walk down to the Marina and business offices. The metro is right next door to get to where you want but cabs are not expensive and it is always good to hear their story!! Personally I would like ti have out the temp lower, but most people will be comfortable I am sure. I was also introduced to the The Wellbeing Group (TWG) range of tea which the hotel use. Lovely and better than my normal Twinnings brand. Certainly would stay again.

title: Compliment
desc: Thank you Ronald for the friendly and warm service! It makes our stay a pleasant one. üòä The staff at Level 65 was also great! It will be great if there is a set menu breakfast and a mini buffet for suite guests.

title: Customer service needed to improve
desc: The pillows are too soft. The aircond is too cold and hard to adjust. The room is rundown. The hotel lobby is always full of people and noisy. It doesn't give you a 5 star hotel vibe. Prefer to have a proper check in counter instead of kiosk. Customer service can be better when dealing with clients.

title: Glad to have returned to the Stamford for this trip.
desc: We‚Äôve been staying at the Swissotel the Stamford since 2009. We haven‚Äôt been to Singapore in a while but decided on booking here for this recent trip. Glad to note that the hotel has kept up the high standards we‚Äôve been accustomed to. Sleeping quality was great, ample sized rooms and good breakfast choices.

title: Truely wonderful experience at Swissotel The Stamford Singapore
desc: Great location with many shopping and dinning options. The staff are excellent warm welcoming and very helpful. We were treated like royalty from the start of our stay until we left. Our room was so beautiful with lots of little extras that really enhanced our stay. The bed was very comfortable. Breakfast was lovely ,it‚Äôs very busy but the staff are really well organised. The food for breakfast was delicious. Would definitely return to the Stamford on future trips. Recommending to family and friends.

title: Great location, rooms, and amenities
desc: It‚Äôs been quite a while since we stayed here and the hotel has had a significant refurb since. It‚Äôs modern and sleek. Checkin and checkout is modern, fast, and efficient. The rooms are nicely furnished and the bed is great. Breakfast venue is nice and airy and they do have a gluten free corner - it‚Äôs not much but at least it‚Äôs something for us coeliacs. The location of course is perfect with many shops and supermarket underneath, plus the mrt station.

title: Best view of Marina Bay!
desc: Check-in was a breeze. Room is spacious with the best view of Marina Bay. Hotel was quite busy due to national day rehearsals whem we arrived but Staff were still very accomodating and hospitable particularly receptionist Yi Jie. She accomodated us very well.

title: Celebrating Anniversary with kids together
desc: Very Grateful to Swissotel The Stamford Hotel for being their Hospitality. Through voucher reservation, I mention for Anniversary and hope for a Double beds if available. There's a fast reply and Management was wonderful to wish us a "Happy Occasion cake", which I'm not expecting. Hotel location is at center of Shopping/Tourism spots. Best Top hotel to stay-in. Thank you very much!

title: Very service oriented and pleasant staff
desc: Had a wonderful stay. Nice views from the bedroom balcony. Breakfast at the Asian Cafe was great and even made more pleasant by the service of waiter Arnel! He was so customer satisfaction oriented and a wonderful conversationalist! The only downside was the fact that the toilet had no bidet.

title: No complaint
desc: Best pillows I've slept on in hotels! Usually ill the first night to familiarise myself with the pillows and bedding. In this case, I passed out, it was that comfy! The room also has the most intuitive lighting system, ambient yet bright enough for everything you need to do from work to play.

title: Swiss efficiency
desc: We can tell Swissotel Singapore is different, judging by the rather sparse foyer and self-check-in screens, but we are reassured when a charming lady offers to check us in manually. The adjoining spectacular TWG Tea Salon offsets the foyer. Our excellent room has a restrained d√©cor hinting of travel in earlier times, if the hanging luggage-style straps on the bedheads are anything to go by. Beds are very comfortable, and we have an excellent harbour view. We admired that Swissotel is very environmentally conscious, with strict cleaning protocols. We choose local eating places for atmosphere, but the Stamford Brasserie has a great pub ambience, and we enjoyed the knockout Skai Bar on the 70th floor- a must. The stylish Clove Restaurant has everything we need to kick-start the

title: Very good hotel to spend vacation .
desc: The hotel is great in an excellent location. The hotel is located in Raffles City near City Hall MRT station. This makes it very easy to move around the city using either the green line EW or the red line NS.

title: Holiday and celebrate my birthday
desc: Have stayed at the Swissotel many times and have always had a great experience there. As it was my birthday Cheary, Zai and Eddy Tan organised in our room with a Happy Birthday banner on our bed and a bottle of wine on the table and a birthday cake which was presented to me at the L65 Lounge. We spent our evenings at the L65 Lounge which has excellent food and drinks and the service by the staff are second to none. Cheary and Zai are both very attentive to make sure your glass is filled and that we had a great experience there which we had every night. The views from the L65 Lounge are excellent. We stayed in a club room and had the harbour views and views of the marina and the Gardens by the Bay. We also had breakfast in the L65 Lounge each morning with a great

title: Wonderful Towel art!
desc: Thank you for warm welcome with little rabbit! It was an incredible towel art with a message card and very much impressive for my stay. Thank you for all the staffs of the hotel for my pleasant stay.

title: Feedback and hopefully will improve
desc: The staff is friendly and like family only level 65. The lobby staff some of them not so friendly and attitude and look down of people. The room sometime the tv got some problems. The only things in the room I don't like is when out of the room every will off.

title: Ok but‚Ä¶
desc: When dealing with foreigners the hotel staff needs to be a bit more flexible Impossible to eat in the hotel past 930pm is not ok , mostly when coming from the otherside of the world. We are in 2023 the hotel needs to have a place that serves food until mid night at least. And not room service The room service menu is also very bad

title: Short Break
desc: Very good signature suite and L65 lounge, nice breakfast and view of the bay. Only downside is no complementary carpark as the building is under CapitaLand. Check in and out is smooth. Recommended for stay if you want to visit Singapore

title: Amazing stay!
desc: Thank you to the amazing team at the Swissotel! We last visited in 2020 and again were so impressed with the amenities, the cleanliness and most importantly the wonderful staff. We had a special stay in the Executive Suites and enjoyed the amazing buffet breakfast and evening drinks. Special thanks to Cheary for friendliness and always smiling demeanor on Level 65 and all the exceptional Level 65 team who excel at making you feel very important. Thank you to housekeeping staff for the wonderful surprise for my birthday - Yue Yuan and Shu Xen. Memories made to last a lifetime.

title: Poor experience. Probably my last stay at the hotel .
desc: No complimentary carpark coupon. What a shock from a 5 stars hotel..The parking for a 2D1N stay is hefty, more than SGD$50 bucks for weekend stay. Cannot imagine if I park more than 1N. Slow in room dining service. No smile from hotel staff Long queue to breakfast and the queue is at shopping area where other shoppers can see. Not a good exoerience.

title: Awesome view. Will come back
desc: Awesome view. Book the hotel to enjoy NDP show n fireworks. Had the best view in the comfort of the room. Is conveniently located. Even though the roads were blocked you can access the mrt at your doorstep. The executive lounge was good. It has a 360 view. The spread of food was good.

title: Home Sweet Home - the one and only
desc: What a marvellous and welcome chance to stay again at Swiss√¥tel The Stamford, in Singapore - the heart of the most unique place world wide - with its professional and heartfelt team! Even just for a short but very relaxing stop-over while travelling to Australia. Dear William Haandrikman, dear Robert Strasser, dear Norman Leong and dear Eddy Tan - you and your team manage Heaven on the earth, which is our personal home sweet home, we‚Äôre looking forward to visiting again and again. Thank you very much for that unique feeling!

title: Amazing rooms and views
desc: Birthday staycation, complete with complimentary cake delivered to the room. Service was impeccable from beginning to the end. The rooms were spacious and pleasant. Views were outstanding! Would definitely return! Thank you so much for this experience

title: Improved service = Wonderful Experience/Stay!
desc: Since the previous bad experience, the hotel did what the promised to improve the standard and I felt extremely welcomed compared to the last time! Staff were so much nicer and friendly! Service Good!

title: Thank you Rhea level 65
desc: Thank you to the amazing team at the Swissotel! We visited yesterday, and once again, we were so impressed with the amenities. Special thanks to Rhea for her friendliness and always smiling demeanor on Level 65. Also, a big shout-out to the exceptional Level 65 team who excel at making you feel very important.

title: Great Lounge Service
desc: Thanks so much to the team at the executive lounge. Enjoyed great service especially from Zai Cheary. Going the extra mile to provide service and taking particular attention to me and my family. Thank you so much..

title: Worst check-out experience
desc: Was asked to make a deposit payment of $100 on day of check-in. At check-out, was still asked to make the full payment. Staff (Xiao Hui) who attended to me insisted that the deposit was a hold amount only and no payment was made when I checked it. This despite the fact that I showed her proof of a sms notification from the bank that a charge of $100 was made on my card as well as the charge showing up on the transaction history in my mobile app. She insisted that no amount was charge as the transaction is showing ‚Äúpending‚Äù. Either she is ignorant or simply can‚Äôt understand how credit card works. If it is just a hold amount, then no charge should be put through. She insisted that I make the full amount and should the $100 be a double charge, then the hotel will refund to my

title: Very happy to stay at Swissotel Stamford Hotel Singapore
desc: Rooms are very big and sleep very well. The staffs are warmly welcome. Conveniently located in the heart of Singapore, Swiss√¥tel The Stamford is a 5-star hotel that boasts a prime Singapore location amid the diversions of the Raffles City shopping complex and just 20 minutes away from Singapore Changi International Airport.

title: Fantastic Property, Service with Personal Attention at all Times
desc: Wonderful stay especially due to the very professional service of the attentive staff! My family and I spent a few nights at the Swissotel Stamford and had two rooms with access to the executive floor as part of our room category. In the executive lounge on the 65th floor, especially Zai always made sure we felt at home at all times, with his efficient and yet most personal and friendly service, regardless of the time of day, and no matter how small or big our requests were. Always with a smile, and always with ease. The property is fantastic: location, view, amenities, and access to transportation. It is however the people there like Zai who make all the difference for us, especially when traveling as family - we were truly able to spend quality time with our three

title: Chelsea provided the best customer service experience during my stay from 24-26 July.
desc: Chelsea provided a great customer experience where she pays attention to my needs in detail and I felt that she is genuinely helpful and serving people from her heart. May her supervisor sees this. üôèüôèüôè

title: Always a Great Stay
desc: Always a great stay. Everything you could ask for... spacious room, good amenities, fantastic location, sumptuous breakfast and good spread of gourmet options. Even better with Accor Live membership. I keep coming back here and will continue to do so!

title: Review
desc: The self check which was suppose to be fast, I felt it was quite a mess. When I stepped in to the lobby, there was a desk filled with computers, there were guests from overseas look lost too and needed assistance for the check in. Quite a few wasn't sure which to q and some computers were off. Next, we were disappointed by the water pressure from the bathroom. It took almost 30 min to fill up the bathtub. (Not sure was it because of sustainability). The room was also quite dusty. The surprise cake was good for my birthday. The view was nice. Overall, for paying a x amount of money for the stay with such standard I find it hard to accept. Much improvement can be done.

title: Great Hotel in Singapore
desc: This hotel was right next to the Singapore Gran Prix track. The hotel had fantastic views of Marina Bay, and the rooms were great. There is a shopping mall with direct access from the hotel foyer, 1st and 2nd floors. It is a great place to visit, the staff were very friendly and welcoming. One of the few hotels that we have stayed in that provided a balcony. Raffles is at the rear of the hotel, and a short walk to Sim Lim Square - a great place for Computers and electronics.

title: I enjoy staying here
desc: Nice hotel with excellent location. You can take MRT direct to City . The hotel link to the mall . The room is big with standing shower , the hotel care about enviroment and sustainability hotel . good to support it.

title: Stop Over after a NYC - Europe Holiday
desc: We stayed for the first time at the Swissotel the Stamford in July 2023 on our way back from Europe. The room we stayed in was an executive suite located on the 60th floor with access to the Executive Lounge. The Room was excellent with views of the Marina as well as MBS and a lot of iconic places around the waterfront in Singapore. An added benefit of our stay was to watch the rehearsal of the National Day Parade for 2023 which for us wa on 29 July 2023. A word of warning, window seats are sniffled very early, so plan if that‚Äôs your go. Our room also had an excellent view proceedings as well. Can I add that we were the subject of some excellent service from Rhea, Renan and all the L65 Team. ICAN recommend the Swissotel the Stamford as a great place to stay in Singapore. We

title: Good stay
desc: Wonderful weekend at Swissotel The Stamford. The team at this hotel is outstanding. Fast and friendly service at all the touch points in the hotel which is always great. The hotel was quite full with some events over the weekend, but still excellent service and thank you very much for the complimentary upgrade. The suite was marvelous. See you again soon!

title: Unforgettable Stayca!
desc: It's my first time at the hotel and it has surpassed my expectations. Firstly, check in was very smooth even though it was the national day rehearsal day. Secondly, the Swiss Harbour room we booked was wonderful. It's huge, clean and inviting. I was half-expecting outdated furnishings since the hotel has been around for a long time. But seems like the outdated one is me. It is modern and the super King bed made me fall asleep so quickly. Thirdly, the balcony has a see-through glass panel, allowing us to have a perfect view of the Padang even when inside the room since it can get chilly outside at times. Checking-out was extremely efficient with a press of a few buttons on the email we received just before check-out. One last thing to add is that we left a bag in the room

title: One of the Greatest Hotel View in Singapore
desc: Great hotel with the greatest view in Singapore, looking directly at the Marina Bay. The staff are friendly. The check in process is cool and sophisticated, with a wide touch screen. The room was amazing and completed with all the amenities that you need.

title: Excellent Service from Guest Services ( Fernando)
desc: Very Good Assistance from Fernando ( guest services). Thank you so much for all the kindness and Service par excellence! I will come back with my Family because I am assured of a hassle-free Stay! From assisting with the transfers to last minute accommodation on the schedule changes to resto recommendations- Fernando can make things happen!

title: Such a comfortable hotel with terrific facilities.
desc: The bed was so comfortable including the pillows. It was great to have access to the balcony and the services were fantastic. The breakfast options were delicious and loved having the tea shop in the foyer and a Starbucks in the building.

title: Excellent, good situated hotel!
desc: We‚Äôve been there for 4 Nights. One night at the 62 Level. We had access to the Executive Lounge. Very nice and comfortable. Mr. Cheary was very polite and helpful, he explains us everything about the lounge. At the checking in we didn‚Äôt get much information about that. The hotel is very good, clean. The value is not that good I imagined. A little bit too expensive for what you get. Maybe is because of the place. Is good situated. We would return that anytime. Thank you!

title: Great first-time stay experience at Swissotel the Stamford
desc: First-time stay at the Swissotel The Stamford. Overall, a very pleasant experience, however there are a few points which I hope hotel management would take note of and address: 1. A/C temp is inconsistent, often middle of night or very early morning it gets very warm and not able to sleep even after setting to min 21C and top fan speed of 3. Only 5am onwards it would get colder - not sure why this is 2. Improve your wifi speeds, the wifi is stable but it's only 25Mbps, whereas other hotels are up to 100Mbps. 3. Breakfast at Clove would be great if we can get booth seating around centre of the facility instead of shunted to the sides on small tables. 4. Needs more variety of breakfast at Clove, the chicken rendang and yellow rice were served once only during the 9 nights we

title: Excellent service and great location
desc: Went on a weekend trip to Singapore with my mom and stayed at the Swissotel the Stamford. We were delighted that they allow us to check in so early and the location and facilities of the hotel were excellent especially the Level 65 lounge and the City Hall mrt station which can be easily accessed through the Raffles City Mall. This is very convenient when you are traveling with older people having seamless connection from hotel to shopping and public transport. The hotel staff are also very helpful and friendly.

title: our home away from home
desc: this was our first stay at swissotel the stamford in quite a while, because of the intervening covid years words can‚Äôt adequately express how lovely it was to be back again ‚Äì all at once, it felt like we werent away from one of our favourite spaces in the world for that long it is always a joy and comfort to stay here, a lush experience made even more special by the warmth and care of all the staff we had the pleasure to encounter throughout our stay here our hotel room was classy, clean and cosy, and the beds were extremely comfortable and sleep-inducing. and the colourful and enchanting views and vistas were the icing on the cake of our 4 night stay. not counting the excellent fare we had at The Clove and at The Eight, of course we had a bit of an aircon hiccup on our

title: Swissotel family stay
desc: We spent 4 nights at the Swissotel at the end of our Thailand / Singapore 2 week holiday. The location of the Swissotel is great being above the City Hall train station. It made it very easy to get anywhere efficiently. The Raffles City shopping centre is below hotel also and large food court and plenty of typical Mall shops. The Swissotel is a very large hotel and so you don‚Äôt tend to get much of a personal touch. But as a Platinum Accor member, we were able to use the Club Lounge on Level 65 for Buffett breakfast and evening nibblies. You could also help yourself to soft drinks etc throughout the day for free. Ronald was the club lounge host. He was super friendly and professional and personable. He remembered our names every time we arrived. Over the entire two week of

title: Easy stay in Singapore
desc: Central location, efficient offering. All staff interactions were friendly and any questions quickly dealt with. Family of four in a king harbour view and a double room. Location is great to walk out to most Singapore attractions and you can MRT from the bottom of the building for most others. Hotel rooms are a good size for Singapore, super clean and not fussy. Wifi was excellent and amenities in room were all that we required. Being able to go down to the food hall at the end of the day when you had no energy left was a really big bonus. And the view out to Marina Bay Sands, the ocean and Indonesia were great. Added bonus of watching the preparations for the National Day celebrations from our balcony.

title: Relaxing Stay, Amazing View!
desc: The room was spacious, and with such an amazing view. We had such a blast watching the NDP rehearsal and fireworks from our room! The room was well furnished, and even room service food was so speedy and delicious. Definitely going back again !

title: Great stay
desc: Only grumble was aircon in room was warm. Otherwise great stay. The staff at the club lounge on level 65 were fabulous, especially Cheary and Ronald. Food was the best we have ever had. Much better than other hotels club lounges. Easy check in and great location Debbie C

title: one of the best in singapore
desc: one of the best value in Singapore , too bad now hotel in Singapore is getting more expensive but anyhow great hotel with great services, amazing staff got upgraded into harbour view and everything is nice, the bed,shower, location, and experience. thank you

title: Great experience at swissotel and Prego at Fairmont
desc: I was staying at Swissotel but went to the sister hotel Fairmont for breakfast buffet at Prego. George was taking care of my section and he came with this beautiful and warm smile to greet at my table. Offered the best coffee for my day and was very attentive checking in during my visit. Not sure if it is the right platform to praise his profession and great work here. If not, please help passing my appreciation to George for me and he shall be recognised. My stay at Swissotel was amzaing. Great location. Comfy bed. Amazing view. Just one thing about the air conditioning in room. Not sure if it is not working properly. Nothing is changed and could not feel the air coming out even i made changes on the switch panel.

title: Comfortable
desc: The best choice of hotels in Singapore Very good experience in room service and location. It is convenient for transportation and shopping mall. Especially room cleaning . Thanks for keeping room tidy and clean every day .

title: Well located
desc: Staying at this hotel during the first visit was a great experience, since the location was very strategic and the room was a double (quite large) bed. My children were very happy. Unfortunately, we ran out of rooms with harbour view. Hope next time we can get a room with Harbour view.

title: Great hotel choice
desc: I love the location of Swissotel! Raffles city is directly connected, Bugis is within short walking distance, as well as many other interesting places. Checkin and checkout is quite quick and can be done online. Breakfast is quite busy though as the hotel had high occupancy. Would like to stay here again.

title: Worst experience of my life
desc: I had the worst experience I've ever had in my life at this hotel - despite being an accor member. These folks are a bunch of scammers, creating rules as they go and even pointing to non-existent "terms and conditions". They acknowledged their platform was terrible and turned us down from their hotel - we had booked a night to celebrate our marriage anniversary today. Thoroughly disgusted with this hotel and it's the scam that is "Accor plus"

title: Best views
desc: Luxurious, huge room, stunning views. Walk through to mulit story shopping complex with food hall that provides a huge variety of foods. Good location right by metro, walking distance to Bay, but vey humid for walking. $6 taxi ride to orchard road. Everyone very courteous and kind. We had a lovely stay.

title: Spectacular view of NDP23
desc: Room 4554 had spectacular view of NDP23 and Fireworks. Also the hotel booking and checking out was of no fuss. I should say Swissotel Stamford lived up to it classification of a 5 star hotel. My five times stay and never once disappointed.

title: Very thoughtful caring supportive polite kind team lead by Ms Eddy Tan. I really appreciate their friendship and service
desc: We enjoy very much to spend time at the swissotel, the team Ms Eddy always make us feel like home . So comfortable to being here . Thank you for well trained staff. We have been repeatedly back to swissotel many times. And definitely will plan to be back again . Thank you and blessed

title: Great location
desc: The hotel services are average which I understand as they are catering, mostly for your family business clientele. Unfortunately we stayed on the 65th or fourth floor in the lift lobby just had a very unpleasant odour the entire time we were there. Breakfast provided where just a standard affair, nothing special or extraordinary but the location is excellent

title: Clean, quiet rooms near Singapore convention centre
desc: Very quiet, very clean rooms in central location close to transport and sights. Good facilities, including extensive breakfast selection. Checkn and checkout were rapid and efficient. Highly recommended.

title: Excellent service and rooms with the best views!
desc: We recently had our wedding here and everything was amazing from when we checked in until the day we checked out! The staff were all very friendly, attentive and service oriented. Cello, Aidil, Rhea and her team at the level 65 lounge, we can‚Äôt thank you guys enough! They paid very close attention to our needs and tried their very best to deliver! Overall, very satisfied with our choice and we will certainly be back!

title: Excellent location
desc: My 2nd time at Swissotel. Perfect location right next to MRT, and as someone who loves walking/running, the location is within walking/jogging distance to Marina Bay, Bugis and Boat Quay. Hotel room is nice, executive lounge very big with friendly staff. Check in and checkout was flawless. I didnt give it a 5 though, because the aircond was very warm, despite putting it to the lowest temperature and highest fan speed. Need to fix this.

title: Another Amazing trip
desc: We stayed for 4 nights 27th august. Had a amazing stay and found all the staff to be so friendly. Rhea and the other staff in the club lounge looked after us so well that we felt very spoilt. The hotel is so close to the MRT and shopping centres. Thankyou to all the hotel staff for making our stay very memorable. Anne and Michael

title: Disappointing
desc: The hotel provided great service until the last night when the staff did not bother to turn down my bed etc which they had done every other night. I was leaving the next morning Disappointing for a hotel of this standard

title: Spectacular View
desc: Spectacular view, helpful staff, spacious room, easily accessible property however no toilet bidet. :( nonetheless, my family had a wonderful stay, we love the marina bay view, it is amazing and truly beautiful.

title: Great room and location
desc: Great room. Very comfy bedding and lightings were adjusted very well. Love the balcony and the view at high level. Thank you team! Especially for preparing the birthday cake for the kids. They love it!

title: The best experience of my life
desc: Did my proposal in Swissotel. The best experience for me and my wife. A memory that last a lifetime. To anyone who is planning to stay at this hotel for holiday or special events. I will strongly recommend Swissotel. Indeed the best hotel and spa in Singapore!! Cheers:)

title: Great Harbour view hotel
desc: View n location. Bed n pillows were great. Very clean. Breakfast was good. They understand hygiene. The cold cuts ham salmon were placed in a transparent refrigerator. Top notch coz most hotels just place it in open for bacteria to grow. Nespresso machine in room Free WiFi n drinking filtered water from the tap

title: Average wouldnt reccomend
desc: Hard beds ..slippery shower.. wine cooler fridge very average..terrible air /con..tv cut out constantly..great room service..friendly people everywhere..great brekky..great verandah view ..level 10 ..stay further out great trains..cheaper

title: Nice hotel, poor service
desc: I stayed at this hotel for 3 nights in August 2023 as the first stop in my honeymoon tour of South East Asia. Initial impressions were good. However, that soon changed. Positives ************ The hotel is in a good location. 10-15 min walk to Marina Bay with all the attractions and restaurants. The MTR subway is in the complex along with a shopping mall with many shops/cafes. The room was of a large size with a good-sized bed and bathroom with a bay view. The only downside was no minibar. Negatives ************* Service at this hotel is really poor for a supposly 5* hotel. I was constantly waiting to be served throughout the hotel, with the worst culprits being the stamford batassrie on the ground floor and the skai bar, which was the worst of the lot. At the skai bar, I was

title: Nice stay and environment friendly
desc: We stayed in Swissotel for three nights. It was great for family. The hotel was very full but check-in and check-out can be done on the computers by our own, which was very efficient and smooth. Hotel room was clean and very environment friendly. We brought our own water bottles and the room has drinkable filtered water, so we could fill in our bottles with the drinkable water every day before we went out. The room does not provide bottled water, this is to avoid plastic rubbish. In Singapore, you can find a lot of places providing drinkable water so remember to bring your own bottles to save the environment. Breakfast in Clove was great, lots of choices including western and eastern food. You can cook your own noodles. Lastly, the location of the hotel is good. There is

title: Fantastic Stay!
desc: We were placed on the 58th level - the room has wonderful panoramic view of the city and sea. It was clean and spacious. Good food and drinks were served on the Club Floor. Not forgetting too, great staff service üëç

title: Great location, attentive staff. Beautiful room.
desc: Have stayed here previously and highly recommend it. This is a sleek modern hotel with direct access to the underground complex in Singapore. Breakfast here is special--huge, diverse buffet--although a bit pricey.

title: Bad service, but good facillities
desc: We were not impressed by the service at this place, in the skai bar everything took ages and the food tasted bad, liked how it was connected to a mall and everything was quite close and easy to get to, the pool was decent it had a shallow pool and a deep pool and the drinks were tasty. The room cleaners were quite poor at getting to clean the rooms, once a cleaner came to our room asking if we needed to get both of our rooms cleaned, we said four o'clock wood be good but when we got back at four only one room was cleaned. I do not strongly recommend this hotel, but if you like a buisness trip hotel then this is perfect for you

title: Pleasant short staycation
desc: Clean, nice and spacious room with a nice view. Check in and check out process was a breeze, and I get to keep the deactivated room access card (nicely designed access card) after check out as a souvenir.

title: Extremely satisfied!
desc: We had an amazing time in the hotel. The room was super clean! Location is also very good. The members of the hotel staff are commendable. We particularly liked the personalized service that we experienced. I highly recommend staying in this hotel.

title: Looking forward to the stay soon!
desc: Usually I don't provide review but I would to to say thank you Mr Norman Leong (Swissotel Singapore reservation team) I was considering and hesitating to make the room reservation because of the inflated room rate due to the public holiday. However after speaking with Norman I have decided to splurge on the hotel stay at Swissotel Singapore. He is very friendly, patient with many of my enquiries, puttint himself into the guest position hoping the most enjoyment of the money spent, very thoughtful of how I may arrange the care with my old folks parents/difficulties with the parking lot/having meals on the public holiday and managing the expectation, providing much information and advice. Big Thank You Norman for the arrangement of the room request, positive attitude, the

title: Nice Stay at Swissotel Singapore
desc: Thanks the ROOM SERVICE TEAM for the complementary for us, so surprise and very amazing.. the room big and clean.. The view also beautiful.. very happy can back here again after a long long time.. üôÇ

title: Worth the trip!!!
desc: Great location, well maintained, loved the view!!!!!! We have visited the hotel several times and I must say we are very happy with the service!!!! The room was spacious for my young boys to run around and we love the amenities provided. I have many good reviews about this hotel and their food served is of good quality!

title: Great stay and very convenient.
desc: Easy check in and out. But extra bed came in late at night and we had to wait from the time we checked in. Other than that, the stay was super. Convenient to everywhere. Wasy to get your grabs etc. Malls so convenient.

title: Unforgettable stay
desc: Had an amazing stay at Swissotel for our 6th wedding anniversary. From the warm welcome to the thoughtful anniversary surprises in our room‚Äîa bottle of wine and a cake. The executive lounge was fantastic, with breathtaking views and an excellent place to chill. The staff went above and beyond to make our stay special. Everyone was friendly, attentive, and professional, making us feel like family. Only qualms was that the pillows were a tad too soft for me. Only realised about their pillow menu the next morning! Overall, Swissotel made our anniversary truly magical with their exceptional service and attention to detail. We're looking forward to coming back in the future.

title: Excellent Hotel with great service and great lovation
desc: A good hotel, clean and eco friendly. Comfortable bed. Good location. Harbour view room is the best though a bit costly. Central location and at City Hall mrt. There are shopping mall attached to it and lots of food too.

title: A bit disappointing for the price.
desc: No thrill hotel with no thrill service. Very limited staff. You pay for the location right at the core of Singapore. Rooms are clean beds are comfy. Fir the rest no mini bar and cost reduction signs everywhere... "filtered tap water soap dispenser... not a 5 star hotel. Merely a 4 most probably a 3.

title: Great central spot in Singapore
desc: Great spot for being central to all the places to see. Great spots for numerous street food stalls. Very tasty and not at all expensive. Train service a few minutes away. A map and a bit of time studying the underground train system is a good idea before you leave the hotel

title: Enjoying Singapore‚Äôs 58th NDP from our room in Swissotel the Stamford.
desc: The gorgeous harbour view from our room and spacious balcony gave us a memorable experience of watching Singapore‚Äôs 58th National Day celebration as well as the fireworks display in comfort and convenience as a family.

title: Great location, amazing concierge staff.
desc: The sky bar had an amazing view, and the Swissotel was located right next to a mall, a great restaurant area (Chijmes), every public and tourist transit option you could want, as well as being walking distance from Clarke's Quay and the Marina Bay area. Staff was helpful, including when we'd already checked out but forgotten something important in our room, and someione helped us out. I especially want to thank the concierge staff. An older gentleman and a young lady had answers for all my questions (including some hard ones: someone in our family is a pretty particular tourist) and helped us find great options on short notice, for eating and activities.

title: Unsystematic, unorganized and chaotic check in experience.
desc: When we arrived at the hotel were assisted to do a self check-in. A female staff was guiding us on how to do it, and we were asked to do a 100$ ‚Äúsafety‚Äù deposit. The initial room were assigned to in 36 or 38th fl (cant remember the exact room number) has Marina bay view but there luggages inside. I contacted the front desk about the situation, and was asked to go back to the lobby. They blamed the system about the mix up, so were moved to a different room on 28 fl. However just when were about to settle down, another guest with a duplicate keycard, who also booked a family room, opened the door with both of us shocked with confusion. I already felt unsafe for our belongings and awful experience, both of us had to complain at the front desk. Eventually my family was moved to 68th

title: Perfect Location
desc: Right above MRT station, some bus stop makes it perfectly located hotel. If you're lucky, you might have a harbour view. My room is directly facing War Memorial landmark. Walking distance to Merlion. As a muslim, the crew directly notice that I need a halal breakfast. This hotel have it, and provide advice on the Restaurant that suit me. Seems that Fairmont and Swissotel are sharing breakfast area.

title: Room clean , staff friendly
desc: Room clean , good location and Ms Eddy enthusiastic to help me and my family have a great holiday . She make us feel like home . Thank you Ms Eddy . We're looking forward to coming back in the future .

title: An outstanding hotel in the heart of Singapore
desc: From the moment we arrived at this outstanding hotel in Singapore, we knew we were in for a wonderful stay. We were warmly welcomed at the early hour of 6:39 am by Akio, who seamlessly checked our reservation. As we were far too early to obtain access to our room, Akio assured us that she would assist us in every way to be comfortable as we waited for our room. As platinum Accor members, she offered us access passes to enjoy waiting in the astonishing lounge overlooking Singapore on the 65th floor. Also access to the pool should we wish. We hadn‚Äôt expected any of this kindness and care so we‚Äôre even more amazed when Renan in the lounge advised us our room was ready at 9:00 am. After a long flight from London this level of care and understanding was commendable and above and

title: Great Stay near to Merlion and Marina bay sands.
desc: Great stay here, the staff is very helpful. I would request to increase Indian food varieties in veg. They have currency exchange system, and they also provide cash change as well. Which is great. I had a great experience.

title: Great hotel with great location
desc: Kudos to the hotel for its sustainability efforts! Hotel is located very near everything. Staff were courteous. Rooms were large and well lit. Breakfast food selection and variety could be improved though as it was quite limited.

title: Stamford Singapore
desc: Hotel is in a great location, facilities are great. Excellent lounges to relax and work. Comfy rooms, quiet and clean. Breakfast has many choices although the breakfast area can become a little busy sometimes. Staff are all very helpful.

title: Great place to stay
desc: The room was spacious, easy access to everything u would need Staff were extremely helpful and lovely I did have issues with the television and they were very quick to send a tech within 5 minutes even though I called through at 11pm amazing service

title: Fantastic stay
desc: It is my 2nd home, home away from home What can say more? The hotel is central next the main MRT station, shopping malls and close to many great restaurants and other hotels easy accessible for any exploration of Singapore With a great view to the sea side or city

title: Will never come here again
desc: Been here few times and overall experience was great, but not this time. The room needed better maintenance. And the express check-in and check-out seems is providing convenience but actually is less flexible. When I requested reception (and support contact point) to make a change on invoice, they were like it is what it is‚Ä¶ Overall, not worth the money. Think will never come here again.

title: Great location, Amazing staff
desc: When booking accomodation for Singapore we made a choice based on price and the photos of the rooms. When we arrived we realised how lucky we got with location. Hotel is walking distance to Marina Bay Sands and other major attractions. Access to transport is simple, with an MRT station right under the hotel. Underground malls link hotel to other stations and shopping centres to even on the hottest or wettest days you can still get around easily. Hotel staff were amazing and made our stay extra special. Our room was upgraded and had special touches added as we were staying for our honeymoon. All staff we had the pleasure of speaking with made us feel very welcome and comfortable. Could not recommend any higher!! We are already planning to stay again on our next Singapore trip

title: Our favorite hotel
desc: Super location, very nice room (with a huge! king bed), great service, ok breakfast buffet, fast elevators, small fridge in room (which happened to be important to me). Walking distance (~1 mile) to Gardens By The Bay and lots of interesting stuff closer including major hub metro stop right in the building and two big, varied, nice shopping malls also right in same building.

title: Great stay
desc: Great hotel, breakfast, and service. Located above a shopping mall. Very clean. Best location. Would like to thank He Fang for the cute towel animals and clean room. Totally recommended for business or pleasure.

title: Great Stay!
desc: - Great location: The hotel's location is nothing short of perfect. Situated in the heart of the city, it provided easy access to all the major tourist attractions. Whether I wanted to explore the historic landmarks, indulge in some retail therapy, or savor the local cuisine, everything was just a stone's throw away. It made my sightseeing adventures incredibly convenient and stress-free. - Fast Check-in & Check-out: Arriving at the hotel after a long journey, I was delighted to find a user-friendly kiosk waiting for me. With just a few taps on the screen, I had my room key in hand, ready to start my stay. It was incredibly intuitive and took only a matter of minutes to complete. The same efficiency extended to the self-checkout kiosk when it was time to depart. The convenience

title: Amazing Stay in Singapore
desc: We had the most fabulous stay here over the weekend. We had a suite upgrade and the room was amazing.. Level 28 Harbour Suite.. and the views were awesome. The position is central to everything.. just across from Raffles.. with a beautiful shopping mall as part of the complex. We couldn‚Äôt fault the service and the breakfast buffet is the best I‚Äôve ever seen. I wouldn‚Äôt stay anywhere else in Singapore.

title: Room with a view!
desc: Lovely hotel in a great location easy access to shopping, transport etc. We upgraded to a room with a view and boy what a view! Staff were super helpful and professional would 100% stay here again when in Singapore without a doubt! Breakfast variety was excellent and delicious.

title: Great view
desc: Great view over Marina Bay, comfy beds, spotless clean room, great choice of restaurants and other facilities. The breakfast at the Clove was excellent, the lobby had a nice design and amazing flowers, all in all it was a very nice experience.

title: A great hotel with excellent services
desc: The hotel has an excellent location and offers an amazing view from its roof top/bar. Beautifully decorated rooms making you feel at home. The staff is very friendly and willing to help you at any moment.

title: A modern luxury hotel
desc: According to many if the hotel has a lavish lobby and royal rooms and many restaurants it IS CALLED A 5 star. I sincerely disagree. I believe if the staff is courteous and concerned about the guest in the most respectful manner only then can a hotel gain more importance. Thence the only downfall based on my last sentence is that this hotel has a staff which is not attentive to the needs of the guests. Everything else was superb in every possible way. The tennis court at the 11th or 17th flooor if I am not mistaken are very well maintained . Food services are good. Hotel is directly connected to a mall.a fantastic location nonetheless.

title: Great location
desc: We spent a couple of day here before our cruise and the stay was terrific. The buffet breakfast was fantastic with so much to choose from. I am gluten free and they had a dedicated area including toaster and bread (which was really good!). the food is refreshed regularly in the buffet so I was able to select from the dishes without a high risk of cross contamination. my fellow travellers loved the wide variety available every breakfast. With the hotel being located over the City Hall train station and a big shopping complex we were able to shop and travel with ease. We have booked to stay again next January.

title: Sky-High Comfort With Unparalleled Views in Downtown Singapore
desc: In March 2019, I checked into the Crest Suite at Swissotel the Stamford, one of the tallest hotels in Southeast Asia looming 73 storeys tall in the civic district in downtown Singapore. One part of the Raffles City integrated development which also comprises Raffles City Shopping Centre and Fairmont Singapore, the massive 1,252-room business hotel is served by three MRT lines (including City Hall MRT Station), 20 minutes from Changi Airport and located close to destinations such as Raffles Hotel Singapore, Esplanade Theatres, Marina Square and Suntec City. SWISSOTEL THE STAMFORD With its towering structure and distinctive facade courtesy of late architect I.M. Pei, the recently-renovated business hotel pairs cool tones and contemporary sophistication with Swiss flourishes in

title: Loved every second of my stay
desc: Had been here from 31st March to 4th April and it was such a pleasant experience. The room I stayed was on Floor 37 and the views of the city from there is simply amazing. However since i was there for a company event the food that was served was mostly for a group and so it had its ups and downs which could be understood considering we were a large group so no complaints there. The room was absolutely fantastic. Since it was a first time for me to find so much of automation in the room it was quite nice. There's mood lighting in the room and the bathroom was squeaky clean. I have to tell you I loved my stay there and felt that the hospitality inspite of the size of our group was simply exceptional. Keep it up Swissotel!! Towards the last day of my stay I had a chance to try

title: near mrt, great hotel but something is missing..
desc: the hotel is next to the mall an mrt, even though its a 5 star hotel but i feel something is of, but i don't know what is. just stay here for free for 1 night. and thats it. i don't like the way they do the checked in.

title: Swissotel - The Best !!!
desc: Excellent hotel. Best location for sightseeing in Singapore. Luxurious, clean, well maintained , friendly and helpful staff. Easy check in and check out. Fantastic spread of breakfast. Access from the hotel to the mall next door. Walking distance to the Merlion Park. If you book the rooms on higher floors with a view of the bay then you can see the Marina Bay, Merlion statue at the Merlion Park, Gardens of the Bay and the Singapore flyer from your room. The changing lights of the Gardens can be seen and enjoyed sitting in your room!! There are lots of cabs waiting just as you exit the hotel and theres no difficulty getting around the city. Raffles metro station is also nearby if you want to go by the metro. All in all its one of the best hotels to stay in Singapore. And we

title: My favorite place!
desc: I have stayed at this hotel many times - last time after renovation in May 2019. Rooms are stylish and super clean. View from upper floors on Singapore Bay is marvelous. The new Club Lounge is fantastic as well as restaurants and breakfast service. A luxury place in the middle of this most beautyful city. What I appreciate most is the outstanding service team. A very minor complaint that we had addressed with regards to pool area under refurbishment has been compensated a thousand times by the most friendly duty manager Ivan Tee. Swissotel The Stamford: My favorite place to be!

title: Very Nice with a great view of the marina
desc: The Hotel Looks so Busy at the Lobby, Seld Check-in Available, Connected to a Mall, has a great view for of the Marina, the rooms is nice, Connecting rooms available for Families, the Size of the room is very nice, and the Balcony is a great thing at Night

title: three nights in Singapore
desc: very good hotel in the middle of the city and even if humid and hot - still everything within a walkable distance. breakfast was fantastic with plenty of choices that would satisfy the most picky one.

title: Comfortable, modern hotel.
desc: I‚Äôve stayed here a couple of times on business and it‚Äôs absolutely fine for that. The location is good if you‚Äôre needing to be around Beach Road area and there‚Äôs plenty of restaurants around the hotel. It‚Äôs connected to a shopping mall with plenty of shops.

title: Comfortable and good facilities
desc: We stayed two nights in a Premier King room to break our trip on the way to the UK. I really can't fault the hotel and the staff were very helpful and friendly. It is in a convenient location and connected to a Mall. Breakfasts are busy with plenty of room and choice of food. We also had access to the Business lounge which was useful. We tried the Skai bar one night for a pre dinner drink and enjoyed the view from the 70th floor. We have stayed in many hotels in Singapore and this hotel has been one of the best overall.

title: Reliable and consistent
desc: The fact that this place is usually sold out is no surprise, I‚Äôve visited this hotel many times over the years and it always feels brand new. All of the restaurants and bars are great at what they do and the hotel somehow manages to provide a personal touch despite its size and number of guests. The staff are well trained and always happy to engage in conversation and offer help and advice. In terms of the rooms, there is a lot of competition in Singapore and for the money you could probably find more luxury, but in terms of the overall package, this is always a safe and reliable choice.

title: Great hotel, great location
desc: Swissotel The Stamford must be one of the best hotels I have ever stayed. Great room (I stayed at the updated Swiss room), magnificent view from the balcony and good location. The only things I would improve are the crowded breakfast room and long line at check in (lots of airlines use this hotel for their staff). Highly recommended for everyone.

title: Another fantastic day at the best hotel in Singapore!
desc: We returned again to the wonderful Swissotel Stamford for 5 nights during which time we had a fantastic stay and just as always it did not disappoint. Right right from the start the new automated check in system,which we have not tried before,was absolutely flawless and a member of staff was immediately on hand to help us with the process.Whilst I still prefer the human contact element of a check-in desk and contrary to what others have said on here I must say that it was surprisingly a quick and very straightforward process. The renovations to the entire hotel are now all complete with the remaining floors all updated the lobby area looking modernised but still retaining a homely charm the Clove restaurant (formerly the Swiss Caf√©) which looks great after a complete make over

title: Perfect for exploring
desc: We travel with 3 small kids. This was our 3 rd stay at this hotel and this time we were upgraded to Harbour view room. Absolutely gorgeous view!
