We stayed in double double room and it was perfect for our family. Rooms are very comfortable with really good beds and luxury bathroom. Breakfast and lunches are vary varied with both local, infian, chinese and european selections. Hotel has several superb restaurants. As well as connecting hotel Fairmont. Hotel is within walking distance from historical center and if you want to explore Marina Bay - In thebasement of the hotel there is subway station and it takes only few minutes to get there. Hotel is great both for business and families.

title: Excellent hotel in Singapore
desc: The location is perfect, it‚Äôs so convenient for shopping, very friendly and welcoming staff, cozy room, clean and tidy, what a perfect place for spending an afternoon at the executive lounge, delicious breakfast, surely this is my next choice in Singapore.

title: Location, Location, Location
desc: This hotel is located minutes from the MRT, very convenient. Lots of restaurants and food courts in the complex. Robinson and other stores in the attached shopping mall. You don't have to worry about hot weather or rain. Every place is accessible without having to walk outdoors. But if you chose to go out to venture, you can easily walk to the Suntec shopping center and parks nearby. The rooms are all renovated recently and very comfortable. Some rooms, like mine, do not have a desk, so if you are doing business and need working space, make sure to check with hotel to find the right kind of room. Also there is beautiful view of the city if you get the rooms on the higher floors. Highly recommend this place.

title: Staycation
desc: Front Office Staff was very friendly with the check in process.Stayed at the Swiss Harbour View Room. Super Spacious room, newly renovated and the view was so super awesome!We got the 2 double beds so the kids don't have to squeeze.The pool was abit crowded though because its combine together with the Fairmont Hotel. But overall great experience & will definitely be back again.

title: Good location and friendly staff
desc: Stayed with my boyfriend last week at this amazing hotel. Very good location, the room is amazing and I love how modernised it is. Not to forget about the spectacular view from our room! It definitely worth the price I‚Äôm paying for! The executive lounge is wonderful, all the staff here are so friendly and they called us by our name, which make me feel very welcomed (: Special thanks to Mr Adikin who checked me in efficiently. He gave us many tourist information and recommendations on where to visit in Singapore. Not to forget Ms Shu Hui for the warm welcome and good attitude towards us when we visited the lounge. Their service towards the guest is higher than expectation and I look forward to come back next time for our stay again!

title: Location and consistent
desc: Excellent location, great service and well priced. For business or pleasure, highly recommended. Located within a shopping complex, close to Raffles Hotel and next to the MTR, this is a stand out. While the pool area needs some TLC, it‚Äôs minor in comparison to all other aspects.

title: Hands down to this hotel
desc: What can you fault ? We were amazed with the lobby as we entered the hotel. Receptionist were superb, professional and friendly (god I felt like prince Charles!). Although we walked in to our hotel room and the maintenance team was still in there working, we were quickly given another room without waiting any longer. Spacious room and beautifully done. We were given chocolate and fruit platter because of the stuff up during check in but hey who doesnt make mistake? We thoroughly loved our stay here. From the friendly concierge to room attended and even to the maintenance guys who were in our room during check in, they were all so polite and so humble. We checked out and they even come and say sorry again. We are already planning to come back!

title: Helpful Service Staff
desc: I dropped my diamond ring on the 27th of August at Robinsons Raffles City and only realised it at 10pm when the mall was closed. Managed to get the help of hotel security Mr Ambrose who helped to trace and alert the Robinson's staff about the ring. Would like to extend special thanks to Mr Soh Kee Guan (duty manager) and kind soul Serene (Robinson's staff) who found and kept my ring. My fiance and I cannot thank you all enough for all your prompt assistance and honesty. :)

title: Very nice for a long weekend in Singapore
desc: We stayed with our 2 children, the room wasn't huge for 4 people but perfectly adequate. We had a great view of the harbour and Marina Bay Sands. The check in process seemed unduly complex - it was supposed to be automated but wasn't as slick as expected. Once in our room, it was fine and we had a great stay. Breakfast was lovely, lots of choice and very tasty.

title: Special occasion
desc: A large but efficiently run hotel. Close to all Singapore tourist venues and excellent shopping malls. Staff polite and helpful at all times. Rooms are spacious with excellent view. Swimming pool easy to access with towels and loungers available if required. Was worth the expense.

title: New renovated room and club lounge
desc: Stayover at the stamford for staycation with family to celebrate birthday. The new renovated room were awesome and with a new fresh look. The new renovated room is real design for friendly user. Even stay in the lower floor have a spectacular view. Came to the club lounge in the evening to check out the place. Thats was massive club lounge i ever see. Service was amazing and the food quality was great. The club manager Ivan very proactive. I believe he love his job so much. Other staff at the club lounge were very attentive as well. If i ever come back for next staycation i will definetly choose Swissotel The Stamford. Good job guys and thanks for the amazing service

title: messy management=nightmare
desc: We stayed in the hotel in August for two nights. I used my Australian credit card which is linked to Booking.com to book the hotel. It states clearly on the booking confirmation that the hotel will handle the payment. When we checked in, a staff helped us because there was something wrong with their self checkin system. He took us to the inside area where the group checkin counter located and checked in for us. I specifically asked him to use my Mum's credit card to pay the hotel fee, because if they charge the fee from my Australian credit card, a high international transaction fee will incur. He said yes and took my Mum's card. A few days after our stay, I found that the hotel fee has been charged from my Australian credit card and an extra international transaction fee

title: Top hotel
desc: The Stamford is definitely my favorite hotel in Singapore. The room design is flawless with attention to details such as the the lights control allowing you to reach the bathroom at night safely and without searching for any switches. All automatic. The view is breath taking (was at 61st floor btw). Breakfast is also one of the best I had the opportunity to experiment. Cant wait to go back.

title: Great staff and great business lounge
desc: Miriam and the rest of the staff continuously go above and beyond to ensure all our needs are met. The hotel is centrally located with plenty of amenities around whether it be shopping or dinning. Automated checkin with staff support also a great feature.

title: Awesome view
desc: Stayed only 1 night, we had 2 rooms for our family and they were clean and comfortable and air con was nice and cold, view was to die for, breaky was great. Check in was easy same with check out, will stay again.

title: Comfortable renovated rooms
desc: Was positively surprised by the newly renovated, comfortable and spacious rooms with a view on the Marina Bay. Willow Stream spa, and tennis courts are also a big plus vs. other hotels. Despite the size of the hotel, we were not too inconvenienced by the crowd. However, we were a bit disappointed as we checked in late that food options are limited to room service at 11pm. Would definitely come back.

title: Fabulous location, beautiful room
desc: We stayed for 7 nights in a Skyline Suite. This suite was on level 63 and an uninterrupted view of Marina Bay which was absolutely stunning. This suite has an extra walk in wardrobe, a second toilet and an extra desk area. 2 balconies a separate bath, shower and toilet. The executive club on level 65 served breakfast, evening drinks and canap√©s. Breakfast was good, egg station where a chef would make your omelette or eggs anyway you like. Bacon and other hot food was never hot but still enjoyed. Fruits, cereals, toast, yoghurt were all available as well. Evening drinks, there was no bubbly at all and only a choice of 1 white and 1 red which was very surprising for a hotel of this quality. This was a huge disappointment. There were basic spirits and 1 beer on tap. There was no

title: Flawless service, amazing views, perfect room
desc: I stayed here for nearly a week on business and was so delighted with this hotel that I didn't want to leave. In any of my journeys, I have rarely encountered such attentive and capable staff. From my early check-in, to room service to house keeping, I was made to feel like I was the only guest at the hotel. My room was enormous with a big comfy bed, lovely bathroom, a couch and sweeping views of the ocean and Marina Bay Sands. I was able to watch the National Day Parade from my balcony. Attention to detail was such that when I got up in the night to use the loo, low level accent lighting automatically came on to light my way, and dimmed again once I was in bed. I'm not much of a buffet fan, but the breakfast buffet blew my mind. In the big, naturally-lit dining room,

title: Great location and great service
desc: We stayed here for 10 nights and enjoyed the fairytale view every night. The rooms are spacious and modern. With facilities as usual for a 5 star hotel. The breakfast buffet is extensive and of good quality. Downside for people with a longer stay, there is no cupboard space. You really have to live out of your suitcase here. Tip for management: a few shelves in the "empty" cupboard next to the ironing board can solve this problem.

title: Great view in the central SG
desc: This once the tallest hotel really offers a great view of the city from your room either the bay or the city itself. It takes a bit of time to get in and get out of the building because the elevator is slow, it‚Äôs a bit of walk to the underground station and there are usually a queue for taxi. The room was clean and spacious. Its minimalist style was also practical. They don‚Äôt have a desk but table with power outlet conveniently placed by the sofa.

title: Perfect Birthday Treat!
desc: I booked a trip to Singapore for my Husbands 30th Birthday and after deliberating for months on what hotel to choose, I am so glad I picked this one! I emailed the staff in advance to advise this was a special occasion and they gave us a room overlooking the Marina & Marina Bay Sands, the view was absolutely spectacular! On arrival the hotel staff were friendly and welcoming. I had an issue with my bank card at the front desk and they didn‚Äôt pester me to get it resolved, I was given the keys to my room and told to come back down at my convenience. I was able to sort this within the hour but the flexibility of your staff and customer service was second to none. The rooms were modern, clean, tidy and there were fresh slippers/toiletries left each day. The hotel location is amazing

title: Rather average and not 5 Star.
desc: We arrived, very jetlagged, to find a self service check-in....just like McDonalds. Fortunately there was a lady wandering around this area who could help. Our luggage had already been taken by the porter. When the porter brought our luggage we had no Singapore cash (having arrived straight from the airport) to tip him. He made it quite obvious that he was not impressed, muttering under his breathe as he left. Our room, for 3 people only had 2 towels. Even cheaper hotels usually have spare towels. The coffee in the coffee machaine was deplorable, and they had 3 capsules of 'coffee cream' and a few sachets of powdered creamer....which you usually only find in cheap motels. Disgusting stuff. The bathroom was not all that clean, with orange mould on the side of the shower entrance

title: Hotel with a royal touch with absolutely impeccable service.
desc: Good morning all, I would like to express my thanks and appreciation for the service and care we received once again at Swissotel the Stamford from 28/9/19 to 6/10/19. As you are aware my wife joined me on this trip, and I wanted it to be perfect. The wine, and chocolates you placed in their suite were gorgeous and delicious, and the view was spectacular. The room that you set up for us was perfect, and we were all very impressed. Your staff did not disappoint us, treated us like royalty and their service was absolutely impeccable. Every staff member with whom we came in contact was attentive and kind including John and Kuna catering managers. We had a wonderful eight days, and I have recommended Swissotel the Stamford to all of my colleagues, friends and family. Thank

title: Iconic place, best views of the city, comfortable and spacious rooms
desc: Its a very large property with 1000+ rooms, still the check-in/ out was very fast and convenient. The location is very ideal to roam around the city. The rooms are spacious and comfortable, music system was a good companion. Really enjoyed the stay - especially the night views of the city from the rooms are marvellous, the pool area was nice, my kid enjoyed the kids pool. There are facilities for tennis, gym etc. The breakfast spreads are very good but considering the size of the hotel, seems the area is not sufficient to hold the guests sometimes. Better to be there early otherwise may land-up in long queues and loose your time.

title: F1 Grand Prix favorite for last 10 years
desc: In late 2010 I wrote a review (pasted below) describing why this hotel was a great choice for the Formula 1 race weekend. I've revisited the race for the last 10 years now, so here's a small update: Swissotel is still my race weekend choice, by far. * The renovated rooms are fantastic, with large high-def screens (finally!) * Minibar kept empty is a very welcome touch, I tend to prefer sourcing my own drinks and snacks at the basement supermarket * New L65 Club lounge on 65th floor is a wonderful, relaxing space, with kind friendly staff (Sok Ling impressed us all with her hospitality spirit) * New Brasserie space is also very nicely done, great to have for casual drinks * The staff continues to serve the guests with prompt professionalism, despite the massive crush of

title: Great views and location
desc: This used to be the tallest hotel in South East Asia with 76 floors. Excellent location, next to raffles and the cricket Padang. Many rooms with a view of the harbor and the Marina Bay Sands hotel. Great for watching the light shows. Good mall under the hotel with large food court, many shops. Near subway. Good efficient and friendly staff. Will go back next time. Also the location of the annual vertical marathon of Singapore. Run up 76 floors to the helipad for a photo and stunning views.

title: Consistently great hotel
desc: We have been staying at Swissotel for over 20 years now. The location is great with the City hall MRT and Raffles city shopping centre underneath (food court on the third floor is great for cheap eats). This time we stayed in a suite which had been recently refurbished. Many thanks to Eddy who ensure my kids had some coloring materials and a child's table and chairs to play on. The breakfast at the restaurants can be busy...we preferred the lounge access which came with the suites. Unfortunately children are not allowed for the canap√©s and drinks in the evening in the lounge. I was surprised at the OPEN bar during lounge time. Many thanks to Eddy and her team for such an enjoyable stay!

title: Much better since the upgrade of the lobby
desc: Pretty much my go-to venue when in Singapore. Great location next to MRT and shops. Easy to get everywhere. Busy hotel but the new lobby is a great improvement. Reasonably priced, rooms are modern smart and functional.

title: Swissotel Singapore
desc: A very comfortable and well positioned hotel. Staff were extremely efficient and check in and check out were both streamlined. The room was right up to standard with all facilities working and in good condition. The hotel is located right next to the MRT making travel very easy. Next door to the hotel is the Raffles Centre with its shops and restaurants. Breakfast at the hotel was included in the price and there was a very comprehensive choice of dishes. The hotel staff were friendly and very helpful. All in all, a very pleasant stay at a quality hotel.

title: Great service and views at the The Stamford Singapore
desc: The service was exceptional - was able to get an early check in and check out - thank you - it made a huge difference when flying in at 6am and leaving a few day later at 9pm. Rhea was so so lovely - knew our coffee and tea orders after one day and genuinely wanted our stay to be the best it could be. Only negative was that the executive lounge was booked out for a private function for 2 of the days so we had to go the the Fairmont lounge instead. Great views from the lounge and loved watching the laser light show at night.

title: Ideally located with excellent transport links
desc: A 3 night stopover in Singapore en route to Malaysia. A bit of an odd start to proceedings as my cousin (who was just dropping us off) ran over a traffic cone at the lobby! He was then belittled by the concierge which I thought was a little unnecessary as no one got hurt, and he was travelling at a snail's pace - customer service obviously wasn't one of the concierge's strengths. Check-in was a more complicated affair than it had to be - the last thing I needed after travelling for more than 12 hours. Guests have to check-in themselves using the computers located in the main lobby, although there are members of staff advising guests what to do. Guests have to get their photo taken (similar to customs when entering the country) and enter an email address to complete check-in. In

title: Enjoyable Stay!
desc: Booked 2 rooms with 3 nights stay at the Hotel. Transfer from airport to Hotel was easy and quick (less than 30 mins) and stopped right outside the lobby. Check- in was very quick and easy and the staff was very helpful. Very impressed with the rooms. They were spacious and cosy, with a great view of the marina bay area. Lots of TV programmes to choose from and beds were comfy. Breakfast was on the 2nd level and the spread was good. Lots of good food! Location is superb! Shopping mall below the Hotels with plenty of shops and eateries. The subway is just below the shopping mall, easy access to many places and even to the airport!. Also have lots of shops n eateries near the Hotel. My guests and I are very impressed with the Hotel - the location, the rooms , the

title: 10/10 We wouldn't hesitate to return
desc: Six of us (2 mums & 4 kids aged 4, 6, 8 & 10) stayed on the 52nd floor of Swissotel The Stamford for 5 nights and we thoroughly enjoyed our stay from start to finish! Although check-in was a little different to what I expected (think slick informal check in desk that you walk up to and self-check in), staff were on hand to assist and we got our adjoining rooms as per request prompt with our luggage. The rooms themselves were large, comfortable, had great city views and spotless. The Nespresso machine and TWS teas on offer were put to good use! Breakfast was probably the best part of our hotel stay and although we would have liked Sunday breakfast to run later than it did, food was of high quality and with a lot of variety throughout our 5 mornings. The take-away coffee cups

title: Wedding lunch with amazing view
desc: Attended a wedding lunch here at the SKAI suite and had a wonderful experience. The venue is located on 69th storey of the hotel and the space where the solemnization ceronmony was held had a phenomenal view of Singapore. They have cakes and sweets prepared for the guests during the reception while we waited for everyone to arrive and they taste great. After the ceremony, we proceeded to the wedding banquet at the other side and we enjoyed the food as well.

title: Amazing Hotel.
desc: What a fantastic hotel! Our whole experience here was superb, the room overlooking the harbour was perfect, comfortable, clean just spot on. The staff are very attentive and friendly, the breakfast caters for everyone, we‚Äôd highly recommend this beautiful hotel and will definitely stay again when in Singapore. Here are some pics of the amazing view from our balcony.

title: Very good location and very spacious room
desc: Went and stayed there for 2 nights. Really impress with the check in and check out process, very speedy and very simple. The room itself is spacious, you won't feel cramped inside the room. The location also very good and strategic, you can reach the hotel using MRT from the airport, because the station is right under the hotel. I would recommend this hotel and definitely return to stay here when I'm in Singapore

title: Thanks for helping find a phone.
desc: My father made a mistake to drop his phone on Grab. Entire photo of his journey might be loss and my father doesnot speak English well. He asked someone(I dont know who was exactly, perhaps one of Swissotel service team). He was helping my father to find it kindly.

title: My Home
desc: Staying at the Swissotel Stamford has always been a wonderful experience. My family and I have been staying at this hotel even way back when it was still called the Westin Stamford. I have always made it my home whenever I visit. We choose to stay at the Stamford simply because of the great service the hotel gives and the utmost convenience of its prime location. Being located right at the heart of the city (City Hall), the hotel sits on top of the MRT station which makes it accessible to all points in Singapore. Getting to other key points in Singapore can be readily reached either by walking or taking the train. The hotel is located at Raffles City, a shopping center that features a wide array of luxury stores, restaurants and other retail stores. The hotel has its own

title: Love the Swissotel Stamford
desc: We have stayed at the Swissotel Stamford many times because it‚Äôs so central to everything and the service is second to none. We would stay nowhere else while in Singapore . The view is outstanding, and it seems everything is at your doorstep

title: Birthday Staycation
desc: Booked a room at this hotel for my partner birthday. Overall everything were good. Service is good even i requested for early check in and i reached abt 1+pm no room were available so i have to came back at 3pm that fine for me as the hotel link to shopping centre and eatries. Room was ok had a great view at night just that abit down side of their cleaniness. I can see dust on the table and they dont have bidet in the toilet that make alil uncomfortable.

title: Great Service
desc: Had a great 2 night stopover visit here. Lovely room, great location and excellent customer service, as well as lots of food options. Sara, the concierge, was on hand the whole time to help us with organising a tour and some other matters. Can highly recommend.

title: hmm very sorry to give u only 1 rating
desc: i stayed this hotel many times. always i was happy when i stayed at this hotel. but now i will tell u something. after check out i need to change my cloths and shower. i asked spa about it but they rejected it. even one old man followed me and told me to not take shower. i was very upset. normally great hotel service is different from normal hotel. even follow rule, they should give me something special moment. but they did like a only one star hotel. great service is from wonderful consideration of excellent thinking. just following rule makes very unhappy moments. i really loved this hotel service. but not this time!!! please think over and over. i hope so.

title: 3D2N Staycation
desc: This is our first time staying here. Check-in was smooth because we were assisted eventually so we could complete the process faster. The room has a weird layout as the TV was at the bed side and toilet was rather small. Balcony was narrow so one had to be extra careful. There were a few smokers at the pool area. However, having our room on the 53rd floor means you get an amazing view of the harbour. We could catch the Supertree Light show and the MBS light show from our balcony. Night view was so pretty. And the sunrise was right in front of our window! The staff were all friendly.

title: Swissotel 2019
desc: Hotel is located in the centre of the city with convenient access to all malls, restaurants and attractions. Experienced a comfortable stay but still there were problems with their service level and room standard.

title: Unreliable AccorHotels app
desc: Hi, I'm trying to reach out to the hotel manager of Swissotel The Stamford Singapore, as I had submitted a complaint via the Swissotel global website but no response was received. I am an AccorPlus member and my reservation (HNLLCRKV) was booked using the AccorHotels app for Lunar New Year 2020, two-night stay. An acknowledgement email was sent to me stating that my booking can be cancelled up to 2 days prior to arrival under Cancellation Policy. For info, I had made a conscious effort to ensure that I book a room that can be cancelled. However, when I reached out to the reservations team to cancel my booking, the reply was that my booking cannot be cancelled due to a "system glitch", and that my booking is non-refundable. The hotel gave me a one-time change of date option.

title: AMAZING HOTEL
desc: This hotel is amazing we stayed on the 54th floor looking straight at the Marina Bay sands and Garden's By The Bay the light show every night was awesome to watch from our room.The room was exceptional really clean great comfortable bed big tv excellent breakfast and the bar and restaurant on the 70th floor were mind blowing. Loved this hotel and will definatly be returning üëçüòÅ

title: Great place to base yourself on your Singapore stopover.
desc: The Swissotel was just what we needed for our 3 day stopover on the way home from Europe. In hindsight we should have made it 4 or 5 to see more sights in our relaxed way of doing this. The rooms are a well proportioned. There are loads of restaurants to choose from being the food court on level 2 and the Brasserie on ground level to the finer dining restaurants as well as the lovely bar on level 70 with its great views. It‚Äôs right next door to historic Raffles and close to public transport as well as a $5-8 taxi from the night gardens, marina bay sands. Worth the spend!

title: Great place to stay!
desc: This hotel is well located right next to the train station. It's easy to catch the train from Changi International Airport to this hotel. It is also attached to a Mall which is very convenient. Staff are very helpful and friendly. The room is well equipped, the only inconvenience was the shower over the bath, but it is a great location with awesome views over Singapore - lovely place and we will definitely stay here again!

title: Mesmerising views
desc: Great location for MRT and opposite Raffles hotel. Dining experiences at your doorstep with Chjimes across the road. Adjoining The Fairmont Hotel with Raffles City Shopping Plaza in between. Self checkin and Checkout provides a seamless transition and help always at hand if needed. This is our ‚Äògo to‚Äô hotel.

title: Amazing Experience
desc: Recommend by our travel agent we booked in for 4 nights. We arrived and were offered a upgrade, which we took little knowing of the benefits it entailed. We felt so privileged and welcome at our stay. We had 2 outstanding staff members help us. Rhea on floor 65 and Venessa at the concierge desk, many thanks for looking after us.

title: Amazing hotel and staff, wonderful stay
desc: Brilliant location right in Marina Bay with subway access next to hotel. Excellent views and rooms. Watched the marina bay light show at night from our room. Very friendly and professional staff. Overall, exceeded all expectations. Would highly recommend to anyone. Will stay here again when back in Singapore.

title: An Immense Thank You
desc: The Swissotel concierge Desiree went out of her way to help us locating our missing luggage. After spending a day talking to the airline, SATS, SFO and MNL airports with no result, I'm glad that I spoke with the concierge and she managed to locate the luggage (stranded in another country) in 2 hours and even offered to have the luggage delivered to our room. Other than the amazing view and convenient location I love that we have people we can trust and depend on at this hotel.

title: Still a great hotel, now even better
desc: We've stayed here every time that we've stayed in Singapore and have no plans to stay anywhere else while in Singapore in the future. This occasion was a rest/stopover after 7 weeks in France & the UK where we stayed in numerous different hotels of various levels of quality/age. Since our last stay 2 years ago they have completed extensive renovations to rooms, lifts and the various bars, eateries etc. Our room, this time was on the 36th floor and was a corner room with two balconies and two different views over Singapore which is always interesting. The room was clean, very comfortable and nicely updated. The new lighting control system is a bit tricky to get used to but the automatic lights under the bed and in the bathroom make it much easier to see your way around in the

title: Great stay
desc: Although it was just an overnight stay at this hotel but we were impressed with the hotel‚Äôs ambience and service. Check in and check out was speedy with self service facility. The room and view from 62nd floor was superb. Location of the hotel is very strategic with all public transportations, shops and eateries are within walking distance. Thanks to Felicia and Travis for their helpful assistance. Definitely will be back for next stays.

title: Great place to stay
desc: Terrific Hotel and well placed to visit Singapore. There are plenty of places to eat in the hotel and the staff are great! Bar Rouge is a must as the view is amazing. The Italian restaurant Prego is my pick for somewhere to eat. And if you like High Tea they do a great job in Anti:Dote

title: Great Hotel for the F1 Grand Prix
desc: We stayed here during the F1 Grand Prix. We had requested a room with a balcony that overlooked the circuit and we had an excellent room on the 45th floor. We had views of a significant part of the track - we actually had tickets for the F1 at turn Twenty Three and the views from the hotel were probably better than our actual track tickets! The room was clean and functional and housekeeping staff were very good. Check in was very professional, we arrived in a hotel organised limo from the airport and when we arrived at the hotel we were taken immediately to the room and checked in there - so much easier than queuing at reception. The only negative with the hotel was that there are two bars on the 70th floor but they don't open until about 5 or 6pm - seems crazy to have such a

title: Decent hotel with good food and good service
desc: Annual F 1 trip combined with business meetings always at Stamford, their ne self check-in quite nice, as well as check-out, with immediate assistance once running into questions.Miss Eddy Tan and her staff a constant good component of the hotel even after change of owners, now part of the Accor group. The hotel in conviniently located to MRT and shopping malls and taxi no problem even during F1.

title: Heineken Pub
desc: In our way to F1 we crash into this excellent place. The Stamford Brasserie is a very nice place where you can drink and eat following high quality standards and affordable prices considering in Singapore everything cost

title: Many thanks to hotel management team!
desc: I want to share my experience of staying this hotel. I had stayed one night this hotel with my family. The room was in perfect condition and the bed was so comfortable. My family really enjoyed to staying this hotel. But just one thing happened. When I packed my luggage to check out, I couldn‚Äôt find my diamond earrings. I was in hurry so I couldn‚Äôt spend enough time to find them. So I just informed hotel management team to double check the room. After a while, Mr.Raja and Mr.Sedek from the Security Department called me twice to search the room again for me and keep checking I found them or not. Luckily I found my earrings from my luggage after I got home. I really impressed that how sincere this hotel‚Äôs management team is. I really thank Mr.Raja and Mr.Sedek from the Security

title: Excellent!!!
desc: Excellent in every way! From booking to checking in and all the way through. The room was lovely and a good size and the views of the river, the harbor, the Marina Bay Sands and everything around it were spectacular!! The staff was friendly and accommodating. We had a wonderful stay and will definitely stay again. Thank you to everyone that made it possible.

title: First visit to Singapore
desc: We were recommended the Swissotel the Stamford by friends and were so happy with the choice. Very central location with great access to all of Singapore attractions. The room was spacious and very well appointed. Pod coffee machine, beautiful TWG tea and great bathroom ammenities. We‚Äôre were lucky enough to be on the 53rd floor with great views to Marina Bay Sands. The concierge staff were very helpful. We enjoyed the pool and bar, the bar on the 70th floor had great views of the city at night. We would recommend this hotel to anyone wanting accommodation in Singapore.

title: Concierge Staff - Ronald
desc: Highly impressed by the attitude and help Swissotel Stamfors Hotel's concierge staff Ronald rendered to the guest staying at the hotel. We can never ever forget him for all the efforts and time he took to help our guest who lost his passport.

title: $8 for bucket of ice
desc: Have been all over the world in all manner of hotels. This is a 5 star hotel that charges for a bucket of ice, the only hotel in earth to do so. The cost is negligible, but the grubby money grab is simply disgraceful.

title: Always a fantastic stay!
desc: Whenever staying in Singapore, we stay with the Swissotel The Stamford. Their staff are friendly and attentive to our needs. The executive lounge was the perfect way to start and finish the day. Offering a nice selection of food and drinks. The views from the rooms are nothing short of incredible. Always a pleasure.

title: Amazing!!!
desc: We recently stayed at the Swissotel Stamford and we weren‚Äôt disappointed. Hotel staff - amazing Room - we got the marina view and this doesn‚Äôt disappoint. The view is spectacular. If you can, definitely book this Location - amazing so central to everything Raffles bar is just next door. Singapore slings aren‚Äôt cheap here but its an experience. The hotel is located above Raffles city plaza with so many foods on offer you won‚Äôt be disappointed. We went to the supermarket downstairs to get supplies (beer / wine and nibbles) and found these to be comparable to duty free prices. We downloaded the grab app before we left which is similar to Uber in Australia and found the taxi service easy and friendly to use. We only used taxi‚Äôs as we were travelling with a 4 yr old and 77

title: Amazing views
desc: Service impeccable. Views incredible. We stayed on 28th floor facing the river and city scape. Nothing in front but amazing sights. Grand Prix circuit visible from our balcony. Night views to die for. Yes, an open balcony from our room! Can‚Äôt fault this hotel. Thank you.

title: Great central hotel but very busy
desc: Really enjoyed our stay at the Stamford however incredibly busy hotel. Very central and is connected to raffles centre and another hotel. Check in was a little chaotic with the self serve however plenty of staff around to assist. Asked for a late check due to a late flight we had and staff were very accommodating (at a charge). Only real complaint I had was around taxis. We waited over 25 minutes for a taxi to night safari and after almost getting into a fight with other patrons of the hotel who weren‚Äôt waiting at the appropriate waiting area the doorman told us to go to the hotel around the corner to get a cab as they don‚Äôt come to the Swiss√¥tel as often. Saw other hotels flagging taxis down for their customers which would have been nice given the amount of staff on. Brasserie

title: Couldn't fault it!
desc: Location was perfect for exploring Singapore and travelling with an almost 2 yr old. We didn't want to be walking for hours so this was great, the shopping mall and MRT stop directly under the hotel made it super convenient. The rooms were fabulous! We stayed in a Premier King Harbour View and the 'King' was huge, more than enough room for 2 adults and a toddler to sleep comfortably without touching each other, we did intend to get a cot but found it easier this way with a jetlagged little one. I'm not great with heights and of course we ended up on the 33rd floor, but the view was stunning. Looking right out over Marina Bay Sands and the city, and it was incredibly quiet for being in the centre of the city. Rooms looked exactly as they do on the hotels website. Service here

title: High quality facilities and service
desc: Been to hotel as delegate for a conference. Enjoyed the buffet lunch and tea with snacks. Very high quality hospitality and facilities. Observed the quality of 3 conference rooms and was delighted with all around experience.

title: Great relaxing stay!
desc: I stayed in the Executive Harbor View Room and the view from the balcony was fantastic. We were able to see the Marina Bay Sands‚Äô light show nightly. The Executive Lounge offered really good breakfast options in the morning to get you started in your day. Check-in were done with self-serve computers but there were staff that came to assist. The location was close to everything that we wanted to visit. I would definitely stay at this hotel again!

title: trip in SINGAPORE
desc: nice room with a fantastic view specially on night the hotel is based near CIITY HALL STATION sky bar view shower in bath room nice breakfast internet connection air conditioning balcon fridge king size bed

title: Lovely four night visit
desc: We were in an Executive room with Club Lounge access as part of a package. The room was airy and light with good facilities, we were very comfortable. My only criticism is the shower is in the bath, a common practice with hotels much to my disgust. We had a problem with book in on line and the concierge, Youssef, was very helpful, he went way beyond the norm. I was most impressed with his kindness. His hotel is in a great position, on the train line, lovely breakfast and easy walk to China Town where we always enjoy strolling looking for bargains. This was our second visit and we will be back again.

title: The hotel is not clean
desc: I have stayed in this hotel for four times , but this time I feel very disappointed . My room is not clean because the duvet cover has yellow large spot and the next day the housekeeper didn‚Äôt change it until I called the guest service and when the housekeeper came to change , she looked quite unwilling to change. Furthermore, I stayed for five days and the housekeeper didn‚Äôt fill the bath gel and I got tired to call guest service , so I bought the bath gel from the convenient store. The hotel had 25% off for the restaurant in the hotel , but now they don‚Äôt have discount at all.

title: Exceptional Hotel
desc: An excellent hotel - exceptional accommodation, service and staff. The room was spacious and well presented, comfortable beds, large screen TV, coffee machine and walk in shower in the bathroom. Staff were exceptional and the service provided in the executive floor was excellent. Would highly recommend this hotel to anyone visiting Singapore.

title: Amazing views
desc: We booked a "Swiss harbour view king plus" room and were impressed with the view. Even more amazing once the sun went down. Ended up on the 51st floor. We were expecting a problem checking in based on earlier reviews however we found it quite easy. A staff member was roaming around self check in desk and was readily available. Room was comfortable, modern and comfortable. Swimming pool offered good opening hours and tennis courts were great. We enjoyed our stay however were dissapointed with Hotel after check out. We have only just received our $200 checkin deposit now some 30+ days after leaving. We spoke with hotel on numerous occasions after our departure and they placed the blame on our bank. Our bank strongly disputes this. In all we enjoyed our stay.

title: up on the 45th FLOOR !!
desc: our view was PHENOMENAL!! we were up on the 45th floor facing the MerLion Park and the Marina bay Sands Hotel. its like Vegas lights from up there.... the hotel is gorgeous, clean, modern, perfect for couples or families! very very Friendly at check in..... If you have points to spare, use them here. AND do this with a spectacular Breakfast included with a view: a must!

title: The Stamford Singapore a fantastic hotel
desc: This hotel is one of the best in Singapore. It has been recently refurbished and the harbour view from the club rooms (from level 60th) is the best in Singapore. The location of the hotel at City Hall, next to Marina Bay is great with a dynamic shopping mall and an extensive choice of excellent restaurant. Last but not least the staff is very kind, efficient and professional. They make their best effort to satisfy all your needs. Stay at the Club level and for sure you will come back.

title: Great city stay
desc: The hotel is great, located above the MTR and Raffles City shopping complex. We watched the rugby in the bar, the staff were fantastic, reserving a table and looking after us, we could not have asked for more.

title: Great location and hotel!
desc: Right in the middle of Singapore! Great location with connections through the mall underneath the hotel to MRT and other malls. Attentive and helpful staff. Rooms are huge! And modern. The balcony was locked and I asked them to unlock it and it was no problem. Big comfortable beds and coffee machine. I really enjoyed staying here and would definitely stay again. Only downside was they wanted to hold a huge amount on my credit card ‚Äúin case I ordered room service‚Äù. I understand it‚Äôs common practice but they wanted $400! I just refused and they said ok. Weird. Apart from that no complaints at all.

title: Stunning Suite and the best service we have ever had!
desc: Im not one to usually review but Swissotel The Stamford takes service to another level. Every one of the staff we came across not only went out of their way to make our stay as easy and special as possible but do so in a friendly and caring manor. It is the best and most enjoyable service we have had in any 5 star hotel worldwide. The Crest suite was amazing! Its huge, homely and has the most amazing views across to Marina Bay Sands. At the end of the day there was no better feeling than coming back to that suite via the Club Lounge for a glass of wine and nibble. The location is fantastic and checking in and out a breeze. Book via their website early and secure amazing value for money. Swissotel The Stamford is exceptional, if you are thinking about staying here just do it!

title: Room with a great view
desc: This hotel is well located in the city handy to Subway and sights. Our room was on a high floor with Club privileges which was great ! The hotel has 12 restaurants in house and basement you have other eateries very well priced and good International food, all major shops in the complex so you do not have to go out in the heat

title: Staff service above all others!!
desc: Staying a the Swissotel The Stanford was an exceptional experience. In particular, the staff went above and beyond to make our stay memorable, from arranging early check-in to making sure the room and facilities were top class. Special thanks and mention should go to Eddy and her team on Level 65, who provided for our ever need. Having heard we were flying out late, Eddy also arranged for late check-out. We will definitely be staying again whenever in Singapore.

title: Great Staff, Great Service, Great Location
desc: Wonderful hotel, from the lobby up to the sensational executive lounge, where the views are matched by the ambience and the attentive service of the lounge staff. Sensational views over Marina Bay and beyond from the room, Great location, central and easy to get anywhere by MRT, bus or taxi. We'll be back !

title: Great hotel in good location, and not horribly expensive
desc: We just spent four nights there and couldn‚Äôt fault the hotel in any way. It is in the Raffles City complex with all its shops and restaurants, and the hotel has a number of its own good restaurants with prices to suit most budgets. The hotel is huge and understandably vibrant and rather busy. The buffet style breakfast was also very good with a massive selection of choices including an egg cooking station, any way you want them (the omelettes were superb). Staff and management were all very friendly and extremely helpful - a ‚Äúnothing is too much trouble‚Äù ethos. Our room, a Harbour View King Plus on the 45th floor with a stunning view, was fantastic. It cost almost 1,900 Singapore dollars for the four nights including breakfast (approx ¬£1,000) but, for Singapore, that‚Äôs not at

title: Refurbishment success
desc: Always enjoy staying here, for the excellent location and variety of facilities and F&B options. The not-so-hidden secret is the superb executive rooms facilities on floor 65. Always greeted with a great welcome with spectacular views over Marina Bay, my particular thanks go to the service staff on this floor, Adikin and Hse Hui, who go that extra mile to make you feel right at home, after a busy day‚Äôs business.

title: Great Hotel in Good quality & Service !
desc: rooms are clean and each room has a great views. all staffs are so kind and they are ready to support guests any time, I feel. Also good location near by City Hall station and could go to Convention ( at MBS ) using this MRT very much easily. Good !!!!

title: Superb Experience!
desc: Our 2-night stay at the LEVL 66 CREST suite was awesome!!! My husband and my kids loved it! My 50th b-day and my daughter's University degree graduation will always be memorable. We received welcome greetings of wine and chocolates! And we have access to Level66 lounge for breakfast and lite refreshments at early evenings. Crest suite is so spacious @87sqm - big bedroom with 70inch smart tv and nice view of the city - huge bathroom with a nice bath tub - large living room with another 70inch smart tv We shall return and choose SWISSOTEL!!

title: Great view and location
desc: I‚Äôm stay in this hotel for one night. For checking is self service and my room at 36floor with spectacular view over the marina bay sands hotel. For this hotel is near from raffles city mall and bus stations. You can walk from this hotel to bus station and take bus number 36 to changi airport

title: Absolutely Amazing
desc: We stayed for 5 nights and absolutely loved it. Most memorable moments. Friendly staff and management. Renan, Edie and Prashant big thanks to you All. Our rooms were spacious with the harbour view to die forüòç fell in love!! Breakfast was delicious, variety to choose from. Just a shame it wasn‚Äôt halal. Location was great, everything close by. A must when in Singapore Gardens by the bay, marina sands bay, merlion park all close by Swisshotel. We also got a taxi to Sentosa island where we enjoyed the birdseye view cablecars. Cannot wait to book Swisshotel stamford Singapore again soon!

title: Great Stay in Singapore
desc: Celebrated graduation with friends during the last weekend. The arrangement from pre arrival to arrivals and departures was amazing with special thanks to Eddy, YC, Michelle, Miriam, Sue, XiaoHui, Ivan Tee, Alexander Liang, Renan, Yi Jie, Jessie Lim, Ashley, Peili, Stella, Roman, Ronald and Chelsea. All of them make a special moment to the graduation celebration a special one and forever stay as a memorable moment. Wonderful training and services skill each an individual associate you have out there and definitely deserve a bravo to their services attention to us during the stay. We all love the amenities your team have provided and special attention provided. Keep it up guys!!! See you around soon!!!

title: Comfortable Staycation in the heart of everything !
desc: Great stay in the heart of town with an excellent Birdseye view of the Marina Bay! Lounge excess was fabulous offering a cosy ambience & plenty of options for both brekkie and dinner. Housekeeping was thoughtful too ! Access to bathtub however may be stressful for elderly else üëçüèºüëçüèºüëçüèº

title: The breakfast service made this stay very special
desc: Stayed at this hotel last week in a harbour facing view room for the week - terrific view & sparkling clean room. Great location. However, it was the breakfast service by Selve and the team at Alligator Pear that really made this trip special. The service was exemplary. Also the ma√Ætre d‚Äô at Clove was super and the level of breakfast service at both these venues within the hotel really lifted this trip from good to excellent. Thank you.

title: Superb view
desc: The location of the hotel is great. The view from the room was spectacular; Marina Bay Sands, Ferris wheel, sea,... A rich breakfast, though sometimes a long queue for breakfast. Nice pool area and gym. Several shopping malls in the same building or next to the hotel. Lovely TWG tea shop at the hotel. Raffles hotel and famous Singapore sling cocktails in Long bar are on the other side of street. Walking distance to Clarke Quay.

title: A good hotel but a few negative experiences
desc: We have been 2 times before in this hotel. The big plus is that the hotel is centrally located at a MRT station and a mall. And because of his height it offers spectacular views. The rooms are refurbished and look very good. We booked a Crest Suite. The room offers everything a spoilt traveller would like: automatic curtains, two toilets, one of them with a shower & dry function, the functioning of the lightning is state of the art and the beds are really really comfy and big. The rooms comes with access to the L65 lounge. The staff is very friendly, however, sometimes we had the idea the staff is a bit over-intstructed to be friendly. Besides that, the rules are applied more strict. We booked a standard room on the day of our check out, just because we had a late evening

title: Stay at the Swissotel The Stamford!
desc: After many years stayed at the Swissotel The Stamford in an Executive Room with Club benefits. Provided with a room on the 61st floor the views over Singapore city were fantastic. Room was very comfortable and had everything you would require and the club lounge on the 65th level is up there with the best with unbeatable uninterrupted views over the Marina Bay area nd harbour. The staff in the lounge all provided exceptional friendly service and the "snacks" and drinks perfect to enhance your holiday. And just below the hotel is Raffles City full of restaurants, eateries and shops. Congratulations Swissotel The Stamford - exceptional in every way!

title: More than big brother watching here
desc: A fantastic hotel in the heart of Singapore spoiled by their overreach in personal details. The first time I have ever had a scan for facial recognition purposes. Surely the fact that I had pre-booked, gave them my passport, and credit card, and was standing in front of them on the date of my booking is evidence enough that I am who I said I was. Then to add insult, the very public self check in leaves all of your personal details in full view of anyone walking past. Name, email, phone number and date of birth. Whatever happened to our right for privacy. I cannot believe any board would sign off on such an invasion of ones personal details/space in 2019. Swissotel chain are off my visiting list.

title: Homecoming
desc: We have been staying in this hotel for 20 years whenever we‚Äôre in Singapore and it feels like coming home each time. The staff/guest relation managers at Club level are always friendly, helpful, efficient and makes us feel welcome. And of course, we‚Äôre coming back again next year.

title: Great stay
desc: We stayed a couple of nights at Swissotel The Stamford and we enjoyed our stay. Size of the room is quite big, great breakfast, fantastic views, professional staff, 5-star service, perfect location (right above City Hall MRT station). The only thing I didnt really like was the swimming pool, which it is shared with Fairmont Hotel and it was under renovation. Nonethless, I shall keep the 5 stars as our stay was perfect.

title: Breath taking view
desc: We stayed here for 4 nights on the 63rd floor of this amazing hotel. Spectacular view over the Marina Sands Hotel. Checking in self service is technically very advanced, but had some help from very friendly staff. Breakfast is a feast!

title: Get more from Singapore !
desc: This property is a great way to get more value from your time in the Lion City. We were promptly met at the airport by the luxe hotel car service. Upon our arrival I realized the Swissotel was in a great location. As a base of operation for business or pleasure you are already in the middle of the action. Transportation can easily be arranged or walk in any direction to places of interest- all from your hotel. First class treatment awaits the moment you step into the inviting lobby. We were not disappointed. No lines to check in- our Swissotel representative escorted us to our room verified our satisfaction and quickly handled all the check in formalities. Within minutes of entering the Swissotel we were on holiday ! Our room was spacious and laid out perfectly always cleaned

title: Marvelous experience ever at the modern hotel with warm heart
desc: We stayed the Swissotel the Stamford as our 32th marriage anniversary. It was so great that the hotel prepared wine and chocolate present, when we entered the room. We enjoyed the marvelous view from the 65th floor lounge, pool etc. All club staffs were so kind to remember us with great smile, when we go to the club lounge. (stay was combined wit club lounge use). Managers of hotels (club lounge) were excellent to provide great concern for us, providing us with the extension of our staying hours. We thank Heaven for that we encountered this marvelous hotel and it staffs. Thank you again.

title: Great hotel to stay
desc: This hotel is great. One side overlooks the harbour the other over part of the city. Good gym excellent pools both for laps and seperate area for general use. Seperate pool for kids. Great steam and sauna room as well. Food is great, watched rugby by the bar staff happy to reserve seats for you As well. Good location with mtr in basement as well as local food shops

title: Excellent location, staff, room - there is no reason to stay anywhere else in Singapore
desc: I've visited Singapore many times and have stayed at many hotels, but the last few stays have been at the Stamford, and I honestly don't think I will go back to any of the other hotels. The rooms are well designed and have lots of plugs for charging electronics. The bed is very comfortable, and the lighting system at the bedside to turn on and off all the lights with one button is convenient. There are lots of options for food, but if you get the Executive Room, you have access to a beautiful lounge on the 65th floor that has a wonderful view and fantastic staff. Access to the mall next door is also very convenient in case you just want to get something from the food court. The concierge staff and bellmen are also wonderful and so welcoming, ensuring you get to your

title: Good hotel but very expensive
desc: Swissotel had a beautiful and comfortable room. The room had a magnificent view which cannot be denied even by the harshest of critics. It was well maintained with a very professional and courteous staff. My bad experience came with the breakfast that was served. It was ridiculously distasteful and felt like as if the previous day's meal was heated up and thrown in onto the plate. I was very hungry and had to leave for work urgently, but it took 40 minutes to deliver that kind of horrible breakfast. It was downright appalling for the kind of money which is about 400 SGP per day and the food obviously was on the expensive side as well. I never dared to order food again and instead took the pain to go out every night after a tiring day of work. To conclude, if you love just

title: Excellent service, room and view.
desc: I have booked a night stay at Premier Deluxe. Upon checked-in, Aiko, the lady who assisted me at the counter has kindly upgraded my room to a suite. Check-in was a breeze. When we went up to our room at level 42, we were totally blown away by the state of the room. Meticulously curated. Every piece of furniture has been carefully thought through. Functional and classy. The suite comes with 2 balconies facing city. It is a lovely lovely view. In all, i will definitely come back again and this time, i am going to stay longer.

title: swissotel birthday celebration
desc: When I first stepped into the room , I was been welcomed by the nicely placed decorations and the sweet treats given! They even wrote a birthday card and it's really nice! The signature room is huge and the view is gorgeous with the 2 balcony opening up the entire city view . Would definitely return again and will recommend this awesome place to my friends

title: Amazing team!!!!
desc: Cannot reccomend highly enough, we started in a twin double room, but realised sleeping with a 9yr old and a 6ft plus adult in one bed was too small, so we upgraded to a signature room, the amazing Anita organised this in minutes with no trouble at all, she also organised locks on the balcony doors and a single bed to the room for our son, if staying with children would recommend the signature room as it has more room. Beds are super comfy, pillows are feather, bathroom has a raindrop shower, with full size and great quality, full size bathroom products in pump bottles means you don't have to worry about small bottle refills each day. MRT and shopping mall with huge variety of food available is just below, love how all the hotels join to the shopping malls here you don't need

title: Updated and Excellent
desc: Just finished a three day stay here after being away for about 4 years. They've totally remodeled and overhauled the hotel. It's bright, contemporary, has all the hotel comforts in and out of the hotel room that a discerning traveler is looking for. I visit here for business, but could easily see myself making this hotel a great destination for a pleasure visit.

title: Outstanding Security Team
desc: I stay at the Swissotel frequently for work and recently I left a personal item in my room after checking out. After contacting security, Khalid went above and beyond to ensure this item was returned to me in Australia. Khalid's professionalism and eagerness to help me were outstanding. I am extremely grateful that the Swissotel has such wonderful security staff. Many thanks üòä

title: Great hotel and well located
desc: Went there for a business trip so I did not have to pay for anything. You can get a beautiful view of the Sands casino hotel from some of the rooms (mine was 62nd floor). The beds are good, there's a shopping centre with a nice food court and a couple of shops plus many bars and restaurants in the hotel (and the one next door). The only issue was that the restaurant I went to for breakfast had a queue every morning for some reason. Great hotel overall.

title: Location
desc: Fabulous hotel and excellent staff. Easy to reach from airport using the MRT. The view from our room was amazing, and room also very comfortable. Staff helpful and good communicators. Location was key factor in selection and proved to be worth the money.

title: good location
desc: we had a family trip. location was great. walking distance to harbour. but check in process was bad. can‚Äôt find my reservation and keep went back to first screen. took me almost 30 min to finish check in with help. :-( it seems not ready for self check in. harbour view was spectacular. strongly recommend to get a harbour view room is you can get. everything else except check in service were great. Pool was great. Haven‚Äôt got a chance to use tennis court but seems like they have a lesson. easy to access MRT. title: A good choice
desc: Location and surroundings Hotel is located very close to the CityHall MRT station so it is very convenient if you are coming directly from airport. It‚Äôs super easy to find lot of eateries near the hotel.Chijmes is located just 100m from hotel. Merlion is located maybe 250m from hotel. Marina bay and gardens by the bay are just walkable distance away. Check-in: We booked the hotel from Accor website but to my surprise I couldn‚Äôt check in using the automatic kiosk machine. Later a staff assisted us the check in and it took almost 30 mins to check in including the time we wasted at kiosk. I‚Äôm not sure if I was the only one faced this issue while check in if not management should rework something on their automatic kiosks. Views and Room: Rooms were really large and my family had

title: One of Asia's finest views
desc: Just had a few days stay in this superb hotel. They've just opened a new circular exec lounge 65 floors up, which has fantastic panorama over the whole of Singapore. Somewhat bigger than the previous lounge but has the same homely feeling and a great and very hardworking team. Delighted in having tasty asian curry for breakfast on some days, but always a great choice. Singaporean friendliness at it's best...rubs off on the guests too. Seventh stay here and a highlight of my worldwide business hotel stays.

title: Scenic View, beautiful interior, convenient location, helpful staff brought by affordable price
desc: Coming back there for the first time in 4 years, I was surprised this hotel was renovated beautifully. Check-in was done by unmanned tablets therefore there wasn't congestion. I enjoyed iconic marina bay view and new interior in the room. There was supermarket in basement floor. Which made me access to convenient life and wonderful experience easily.

title: Great but
desc: I already put on survey. Why this box ask me again? This is another item to be improved. Please improve bathroom and machine invoice. No bidet is also poor point. Bath tub was not big enough to having shower. Or it should have wall to protect the floor dry.

title: Not very Welcoming, but Great Room and view
desc: The Room And View were lovely, balcony well utilised. The doormen and outside staff were very good at their job, ready to help and friendly. The check in staff member was not very knowledgeable. We also did not feel very welcome or that both of us being Gold Accor members was worth anything, we were not welcomed back and when i offered my Accor Gold card the staff member said oh thats ok its already on file , so she was aware. We asked if there were upgrades available ( a Gold member bonus) were told No but we could pay an extra $120 a night for executive. We already had paid extra for the better harbour view room including breakfast, so declined. We asked if there was a room available for early check in (another Gold bonus) We were told No but the executive room was

title: Optimal Location and Service for your visit to Singapore
desc: We arrived at a very busy time but the staff were helpful and accommodating. Lovely place to walk around the city from. The facilities were top of the line, and personally I found the coffee on the ground floor fantastic!

title: Great hotel, well located
desc: Good stay at the Swiss√¥tel in Singapore. It was my second time there while on a 5-day business trip. Good service, rooms are clean with very comfortable beds and spacious bathrooms. Well located above the metro/subway station and just besides the Raffles City Mall. They are still renovating the pool area but you can enjoy it anyway. Improvements: no desk to work in the room, you only have a round table and I am not a fan of doing my own check-in/check-out on the computer. Never tried the restaurants but the bar on top is pretty cool. I will book again for my next trip to Singapore.

title: Extremely comfortable stay
desc: Extremely comfortable stay. Hotel staff accomodated me for early check-in which was very helpful. Post-checkout could access their gym, spa area which helped me in killing time judiciously. Green policy adopted at hotel was refreshing.

title: Great experience
desc: Great hotel with great location Good variety of food and beverages during breakfast Lucky our rooms were upgraded to rooms with better view from the balcony. Thanks to the young man who escorted us upon checking in

title: Awesome hotel but improve cleaningness
desc: My bed was smelly vomit like in one corner. Later i have found spots on the sheet in places i did not use. I reported this in the morning and i got tea and a notebook in appologize. The waitress during breafast rushed me with eating, while others could still eat. She did not take dirthy dishes too.

title: Wonderful 3 night stay
desc: Service, staff , rooms and view were all amazing. The buffet breakfast was one of the best I have ever experienced.The variety of foods and beverages on offer were amazing , covering all nationalities. The whole experience from when we stepped out from the taxi until we left the hotel 3 days later was definitely to be recommended. Would certainly love to return to this hotel.

title: overall satisfactory
desc: I had dificulty of the auto check -in / check-out. Better to know that when I have the booking confirmation from the hotel, otherwsie, I felt a bit lost when I get down to the hotel espcially I arrived very late due to the flight delayed

title: Great hotel and a perfect location
desc: Very happy with the stay. Great Location to go for a run around the Marina By and to hang out at the river area. Great Atmosph√§re as usual. Room was at Harbour side with a great view. Just perfect as during previous visits as well.

title: Great view
desc: Perfect location with an amazing view from the room. The lobby is very modern, and we have a very nice 2 days here. Was party business partly holiday. This hotel is perfect for both, Easy check in-out.

title: Sng
desc: Located just above City Hall MRT. Lots of Shopping and Dinning nearby. Staff there is very friendly, Helped us in the checked in and out and helped to access with free WIFI. Room is nice clean and big.Just nice for a family of 4 person.

title: Hotel was fine in good location
desc: The hotel had a quick check in and out. The room was very nice, with great views of the harbour and the bed very comfy. Given the price of the hotel, the outdoor pool area was pretty disappointing and the worse of our whole trip. The gym was a nice size though. For the price it is a real shame breakfast isn't included too. Good location to walk to places.

title: Fabulous service
desc: The hotel is perfectly located with some minutes walk to the Bay Area and the famous Orchard district; the service, business lounge, entrance of mall, amenities are all excellent. The breakfast was really one of my favorites.

title: Outstanding service, comfort could be improved
desc: Top marks for service and location. My only complaints are the bed is hard as stone, and doesn't offer a top sheet. The sheet is needed because the thermostat is limited so you cannot set it below 21C (around 70F), so with only a down comforter it becomes too hot to sleep easily. It wouldn't stop me from staying or recommending the hotel - just more of a buyer beware. Other than that, rooms are huge and connection to a mall and MRT station makes it super convenient to get, or get to, anything you need in Singapore.

title: amazing and exciting stay
desc: best of all during my stay in Singapore, lots of fun and it is really cozy and fashion hotel. definitely will be back the swimming pool is comfortable and lots of fun for kids breakfast is amazing bright , shining place. reception is cool and friendly and check out is simple and speedy.

title: Convenient Location and good buffet breakfast
desc: Hotel situated above MRT station and linked to Raffle City Shopping Centre. Depending on where your room is located, you can get a good view of some of Singapore's landmark (like Marina Bay Sands). The buffet breakfast is a good start to the day with plenty to choose from (hot and cold). The hotel shares a few facilities with adjacent hotel (Fairmont) such as Spa treatment, Pool etc. If you are looking to have more than two person in a room (3 adults or 2 adults + children), I recommend you ask for a room that can fit the additional roll away bed without having to rearrange all the furniture.

title: Short vacay
desc: Really satisfy with this hotel.. Excellent service : check in and check out are very simple.. and the staff very helpfull.. Very clean.. They gave me a room with spectacular view even at 7th.. above my expectation.. Only a short walk to Raffles Hospital.. And easy to get everything u need : mal, restaurants and shops.. Love it.. We'll be back here soon..

title: Sensational Swissotel The Stamford
desc: Our first time at a Swissotel hotel and we thoroughly enjoyed our time there. From arrival to departure all staff were polite, well trained and customer service focused. We stayed in a Signature King room and found the room modern, spacious and extremely clean. Housekeeping service was great and delivered on the expectations of a five star hotel. Upgraded room was much appreciated and recognition of my Accor Platinum status truly appreciated. All staff in Executive Lounge are great ambassadors for this hotel. We will return.

title: Exceptional stay
desc: Enjoyed a magnificent Crest Suite with a phenomenal view of Marina Bay Sands. Check in and out on level 65 was seamless and the Crest / Exec Lounges felt like a hotel within a hotel - the ideal feel. Great service from housekeeping and doorman Dahrma who greeted us with a smile and always seemed to be on the job 6am to midnight.

title: Modern Luxury
desc: We stayed on the 60th floor with a club room experience. The views were amazing. The staff were wonderful in the lounge. The food options in the lounge were varied and excellent. The free wifi was fast. The pool was good but really for swimming more than lying beside. We were very well looked after in a modern hotel with great facilities and staff. would stay again. well located too.

title: Comfortable, good location, good service
desc: I chose the hotel for the location and it was ideal being next to the City Hall MRT station. It is a smart hotel, with a good gym. Service was good, especially on checkout. The room was quiet and the bed comfortable. The Nespresso machine and shower were a bit difficult to operate.

title: Fabulous
desc: Loved my stay here, perfect location to see so many sights, shop, dine.. lovely room, even had a balcony! Fabulous.. although the auto-check in was a bit impersonal, not a fan of that I‚Äôm afraid. The lounge was also excellent, superb breakfast!

title: Great Location with excellent views
desc: We were on the 29th floor and the room was a good sized room and overlooked the city as well as the harbor. It is my favorite hotel in Singapore as it is connected to a shopping center, and if one went downstairs you could take the train all over Singapore. It is only a 26 mins taxi ride from the airport, and you could walk in air-condition comfort to Suntec City or Marina Bay shopping center for food or shopping.

title: Great hotel! We will be back
desc: We stayed at Swissotel for a 6 day holiday. We thoroughly enjoyed our time and the staff and breakfast were above expectations. The room very and house keeping did a great job. We will be back to this place

title: Great Location & Rooms, Lacking Personal Touch
desc: This hotel is in the middle of it all. It's so well placed for getting around Singapore and is close to everything you need. The rooms are renovated, and are very nice. The bathroom is large and modern and the shower is great! I love the modern lighting system in the room that provides for a range of 'moods.' The rooms are big and the beds comfortable. So clearly there is a lot to love! However, we found the hotel lacked 'soul.' If its a big, efficient business hotel you are after, this is perfect. As a tourist, there was limited opportunity created to interact with staff in the in the lobby, or even hotel guests in general because the place is so big and busy. Also, even though requesting a high floor, we were placed on level 11 out of 70 odd floors, and looking towards the

title: A quiet, ideally-positioned and immaculate hotel.
desc: A great hotel experience. Ignore the negative comments about checking in; there is always a helpful staff member on hand to assist with any difficulties. Although we would not normally dine in house, we found three superb restaurants here. The rooms are quiet and the views are spectacular. The staff are helpful and obliging. The access immediately beneath the hotel to the Raffles City Mall and the MRT are icing on the cake. Impossible to fault.

title: Bad experience at check-in; hotel was decent
desc: Hotel staff does not make you feel welcome at all. The hotel seemed to not extend any flexibility towards guests since a guest making a booking at a 5 star expects good behavior and some flexibility at the minimum. However, the hotel and its rooms are good and have splendid views of the Marina Bay Sands Hotel. Location of the hotel is also very good as it is connected with all major malls in the area and the metro. Breakfast has a good spread, however, the restaurant hosting bfast is a little too crowded with tables placed way too close to each other. Overall, a decent hotel for stay. Expect some unexpected behavior from the staff and not feel welcome at the hotel. It may be due to the fact that it is a prime location hotel and a lot of people are staying at the hotel at all

title: Singapore stay
desc: Lovely hotel, well situated. Rooms very clean and comfortable. Excellent choice at breakfast. Lovely swimming pool area. Near to Raffles Hotel and Raffles City Shopping Mall. Staff very attentive. Would definitely stay again.

title: Nice location but poorly run
desc: The checkin set up is awkward and leaves guests looking lost and confused in the lobby. When checked in we were told we definitely didn‚Äôt have breakfast included in our suite despite paying for it.... turns out we did have breakfast included. We asked for a late checkout and it was never followed up. I just went to have a shower but the water to the hotel cut off which means I‚Äôm standing with a head full of shampoo and no way of washing it out. I tried to get some water into the tub but it‚Äôs yellow in colour. Nice location but a poorly run hotel. I‚Äôd stay elsewhere next time

title: Amazing stay
desc: Amazing view of Marina Bay. Amazing contemporary and modern-looking room. Not dated. Amazing location, next to City Hall MRT and next to Raffles City mall. The check in experience could be improved however, as the gentleman who attended to me had a tired look and wasn't smiling. He was professional but would be nice if he showed a bit of warmth and cheerful. Check out was good. Gym was big and had many equipments. Overall. The room with a view was the highlight of my stay.

title: Bravo Swissotel The Stamford Singapore üëçüëç
desc: Really amazing hospitality for our stay. We stay this hotel for many times already and get better and better up to date Services and hospitality. Starting check in until check out feel very comfordable. Thanks alot for eveythings.

title: Amazing stay - fabulous views
desc: Perfect hotel, in every sense. From check in to stay, to location, views, service, clean, check out. JC at the check in desk was fabulous. A credit to Swissotel. I will be staying here again, for sure.

title: Excellent hotel & good location
desc: Hotel even better now after renovation. Location is very good at City Hall, near by Marina Bay. City Hall MRT station at the same location. Direct underground lines to the Airport as well as to Orchard Road. New improved Premier Lounge at 65 level with excellent crew; makes real difference!

title: Horrible Serviced
desc: I have feeling on the breakfast like motel or hostel restaurant both environment and serviced. Waiter and waitress are unprofessional, even the F&B manager acted like food court serviced. Internet is like China country side, on and off coninually. No water during morning....

title: Swissotel the Stamford SG
desc: I had an overnight stay here for a business trip and it has the best hotel room i had in SG. My fav in SG is Marriott Tangs hotel along Orchard road, but this Swissotel is now new favorite bec the room is bigger, it has the best harborview !! The room is neat, it has bathtub, and the beddings is so good!! I would like to spend a new year weekend here someday with my family, definitely highly recommeded.

title: Fabulous as usual
desc: Excellent throughout. The rooms are superbly appointed and the executive lounge is unbeatable. The staff are also wonderfully attentive. We were located on the 59th floor overlooking the Marina and Boat Quay, well recommended.

title: Right and excellent choice to stay in Singapore
desc: I can only say that there is no need for a lot of research to choose this hotel. I choose this hotel and I'm very happy with the choice and stay at this hotel and I would suggest you choose this hotel. Good staff, adequate facilities, restaurants and services, comfort in city travels, ease and speed on arrival and departure.

title: Poor Bookin and Dangerous Room Features
desc: When we first started coming here 11 years ago we were welcomed at the reception with use of our names and this made the Booking In experience very nice and special. Now there are no Orchids in Reception and Reception is a Self Checkin Booth like the impersonal ones at the Airport. My wife tripped over the Dangerous sticking out Legs of the addon at the end of the bed as shown in the photo. She has a Broken Right Patella (Knee) and so far we are out of pocket $3000 with no compensation from Swissotel. Travel Insurance wont pay as the expense was incurred in home Country. The Fall happened at 9PM in the evening of our last day and we were being picked up at 5 AM in the next morning for Flight Home so we Wheelchaired out of Hotel and at Airport. Management came up when we

title: Disappointing Start - Satisfying End
desc: Going into this trip, I had very high expectations of Swissotel The Stamford. But I was utterly disappointed during check-in. A few days before check-in, I communicated through email with the room reservation team regarding decorations for my wife's birthday.
