If I had to find a fault, I would suggest that the WiFi could be a little stronger, particularly at the poolside. But that's being picky! Overall, one of the most pleasant stays I have ever had and I look forward to my next visit in two years.

title: Always the best view in town
desc: I will always stay in this hotel when in Singapore, which is 3/4 times a year, but unfortunately every time is getting a bit worse. I really miss the old Swissotel. The furniture are placed badly, you are sitting back to the view ( crazy). The worst is the corner room, why is the table taking half of the room, who need this, especially whiteout the chairs. Your winner is the view, hire some good interior designers and have the best of it.

title: Incredible Extended Stay
desc: We first stayed for 3 days and were so pleased with our comfortable and clean room which had an incredible harbor view. When we returned after cruising, we were faced with an extended stay. One of us stayed at the hotel and one went to the hospital. Our fellow cruisers went home! What could have been an unhappy experience turned into a heartwarming time all due to the Swissotel staff who were caring, friendly and very helpful. They took care of us as we were basically confined to the Stamford 24/7. We were treated to new and delicious food, lots of ice and even laundry service. An unforgettable adventure,

title: Nice view great service
desc: Staff were friendly upon check in. Room was nice and view from the hotel was great. Breakfast was good as well as great evening cocktail at the club lounge. The Only shortfall is the carpark which room staying guest doesn‚Äôt have any complimentary parking facilities. Valet comes with a price tag of $30 which is not favourable for guest who drove.

title: Friendly and welcoming staff
desc: This hotel is spectacular. The rooms are gorgeous and luxurious. The food is wonderful. The staff is truly amazing -- they did surprise action to make sure you are happy. I highly recommend this hotel for everyone whom prefers a comfortable bed, fantastic view, big room, and sure, everyone hope to meet with amazing staff and I met 2!! Sophie and Cryil are amazed me. We got a special treat as early check in, showing us the Gorgeous Marina Bay View Suite and I feel sorry even the price and package are amazing but it's over our budget plan. He also very helpful and kind let us had our breakfast after check in instead of have it on last day as we going to leave the hotel at 7am. Even after he ended his shift, pass by the mall and found that we are lost and can't find where the

title: Amazing Starting of Honeymoon Trip
desc: We only had one night stay with Swissotel as the starting of our honeymoon and the Hotel Staff's service are really, really, really surpassed our expectations. As we only reserved an Executive Harbourview room which we expected we will need to wait until 3pm local time to get our room. Reception Ms, Sophie did work hard to get us a room now around 0650 however I believe these fantastic view room are always fully booked. After she discuss with her colleague a toned skin guy, she suggested me to upgrade to a premier harbour suite and I immediately decide to surprise my wife by upgrade with a really SURPRISING PROMOTIONAL rate given by them, not even 100 bucks US. Both of them are extremely friendly and helpful, even sent up 1 pair of adorable cow doll which my wife really like it

title: Good hotel, location and nice staff
desc: We stayed at the Swissotel The Stamford, Singapore on the back end of our Honeymoon. We landed in Singapore on an early morning flight and were really hoping for an early check in so that we could clean up, leave our bags and then go out exploring... and that was exactly what we got! As soon as our Cab pulled up to the hotel, we had staff opening our doors, taking our bags and leading us straight over to the very modern check in desk. We didn't even need to ask about check in, he had it all ready to go for us. The check in process was very quick and easy and before we knew it, we were in our room and our bags were delivered. We received all of the information that we needed also about restaurants, wifi, etc. Staff at the Concierge Desk were more than happy to chat to us later in

title: Compliments to Chelsea
desc: I became a member of the accorplus and through the help of Elise from the membership - Chelsea came my rescue Ôºàas the customer Service over the phone did not get back to me after 3 days) - with both the Swissotel The Stamford and link up with Samuel for the birthday surprise at the Fairmount Singapore. I would like to take this opportunity to thank her for the follow through request - my mum was so happy with the birthday surprise and aunt had a great stay with us when she joined us at the Swissotel. And for those who are travelling with elderly - the attached pix will be helpful - to arrange for the bathroom chair. Once again - Thank you for the wonderful service and experience staying with both properties for the first time - appreciate it.

title: Operations As Usual
desc: Despite Covid ‚Äì 19, hotel‚Äôs operations are running normal except temperature taking and questionnaires to be taken upon checking in club lounge. No more queues for morning breakfast and one can enjoy the swim and gym workout at any time with lesser guests. Indeed, a comfortable and eventful stay which was made possible by following staff. Front Office : Yung Chien and Alexander Liang Concierge : Eddy Club Lounge : Miriam, Elaine, Chelsea, Romulus, Sarah, Jessica, Shi Hui, Vanessa, and Chef Elaine. Reservations : Norman Leong Prego: Yoges, Danish and Chef Wong Chin Yee and Sarah. Housekeeping : Poh Siew

title: Perfect location, stunning views
desc: Loved this hotel, close to MRT, buses, shopping & eateries! Our upgraded room had amazing harbour front views, very comfortable bed, nice bathroom & lots of extras. Nothing nicer than coming ‚Äúhome‚Äù to our room after long tiring days! Breakfasts were excellent. Beautiful pool area. Friendly & helpful staff. Highly recommend .

title: Mar 2020 staycation
desc: Gotten a room facing the Marina Bay and pandang. Nice view as per usual. Just a side note. Would be good if the hotel management shows a bit more appreciation for a Accor diamond member staying in-house (that drives). At the bare minimum, provides complimentary parking, whether it‚Äôs a free valet or given a daily parking voucher for the entire stay. On the whole, it‚Äôs still a pleasant stay minus the car parking issue.

title: Great stay
desc: Had an amazing stay at Swissotel. Make sure you get a harbour view room, definitely worth it. They gave us a special present, cake, as we were there celebrating a birthday. Close enough to Marina Bay and attractions near by. Very clean and comfortable. Got breakfast included, probs the best buffet brekky we‚Äôve had. Lots of choice, fresh and delicious. Would recommend to stay here and would choose to stay here if we came back!

title: The Best Hotel in Singapore
desc: This was our 1st time stay at the "Swissotel the Stamford", and as it was our 50th wedding anniversary, we were treated like royalty.. We had a room with a balcony on the 55th floor, with majestic views all over Marina Bay... We were also greeted on our arrival with a decorated cake and champagne as we opened our room. We chose to eat within the hotel restaurants over the 3 nights and found all of the service and staff exceptional.... Our room had every accessory that you would ever need...

title: 1st time at Swissotel
desc: I was happy with my short stay at the Swissotel. What I liked: room size and layout, lighting and sensor activated night light, comfortable bed, central location, connected to Raffles city, breakfast buffet spread, service. I give the bathroom a B though because of the open style shower stall so water splashes out. I would definitely recommend this hotel for both business and non business visitors.

title: Nice and Clean hotel on the strategic location
desc: Hotel was nice and clean. Easy to go anywhere due to the strategic location.. Good Breakfast, variety of the food was excellent and plenty to choose from. Easy access to the mall and close to the MRT.

title: 5 stars greeting
desc: Since arriving I was greeted with a warm welcome. I travel overseas quite often. Swissotel Stamford service‚Äôs always set a very high benchmark for others to follow. The location links with MRT and shopping mall the view from the room with balcony are hard to match in any 5 stars hotel in Singapore. I definitely will like to come back again..

title: A place that make you feel more than welcome.
desc: Firstly, the best asset of the hotel is the staff. Especially the staff at level 65. Miriam, Devynna (if I get the name right) and Adikin are superb and friendly. No matter how busy they are, they still put on their smile and fulfill all of the guests‚Äô requests. Check in is smooth at level 65 as we have have booked the signature suite room. We were upgraded to the nice vitality room. The room is equipped with some simple exercise equipments that somehow forced us to work a little ‚Äúharder‚Äù in keeping ourselves in shape during our stay there. It was a pleasant and great stay for us and surprisingly even with covid 19, the hotel is rather full. I guess this shows how good the Swissotel reputation is in the industry. Thank you for the great hospitality and looking forward to

title: Location, location, location!
desc: Due to our cruise cancellation our three night stay here turned into twelve nights. We thoroughly enjoyed our time at the Swissotel on Stamford. Despite previous posts, we found the check in process to be simple, we were helped by a staff member and our bags were taken up to our room by another very friendly man. Our room was on the 38th floor, it was spacious and very comfortable, although the beds seemed smaller than double beds. Our view over the city was breathtaking. The pool area was pleasant and there were never any issues finding a sun lounge. The best thing about this hotel is the location, so many attractions are a short walking distance away. There are two MRT stations very close and there is a large shopping mall underneath. The only reason I didn't give the hotel 5

title: Skyline Suite
desc: we stayed in the Skyline suite at the swissotel stamford on the 19th feb for 3 nights. the room was incredible, absolutely blown away by how nice the room was, the view from the 2 balcony's were also amazing. we also had club facilities which gives you food and drinks during happy hour which was really good. we got early access to our room which was lovely, staff were all very friendly and approachable. over all i will 100% recommend this Hotel

title: An outstanding stay
desc: My husband and I stayed for 4 ngts there. We had booked an executive floor room which included club benefits. This holiday is to celebrate our wedding anniversary we were upgraded to a harbour view room which we were so grateful for the view was stunning we never got tired of looking at the view. The staff in the lounge do an amazing job from reception to the cooks at breakfast all friendly nothing was to hard or a bother. The food in the lounge changed every ngt there was a variety of sushi cheeses calamari gnocchi, tortellini, chicken dishes and many more. Breakfast eggs cooked poached omelette fried, samon varity of breads cheeses, and many other dishes. We were also given the best chocolate mousse cake and a bottle of wine. All the staff from the doorman to the

title: Not perfect but damn close!
desc: This was the last hotel in a long list as we travelled from Spain via London to Australia and back. It may have been the last but, on balance, it was the best. But first the negatives, albeit minor. The so-called self-service check-in and out is chaotic and off-putting as you arrive. It neither engenders a warm welcome on arrival nor a warm, happy feeling of being a valued guest on departure. It's not self-serve but you're expected to do it yourself under a member of staff's watchful eye. After a long journey, rather than being expected to work under supervision, I like to be welcomed by a pleasant receptionist behind her desk, doing it for me whilst, ideally, I sip a complimentary drink in the bar. Not here. Another weird thing was the concierge service. When we asked

title: High rooms with Marina Bay views
desc: The view from the rooms is fabulous, night or day and even better if you go to the Level 65 Lounge, amazing, Whether relaxing over breakfast or lounging during the day and at night drinks and snacks while watching the ever changing view over the bay and out to the sea beyond the Sands all while being pampered and spoiled by the friendly and fabulous staff. Thanks guys I had an awesome time.

title: Perfect 10
desc: Greeted by a friendly and smiley hotel staff who helped me with the electronic check in. The check in was so swift and impressive. Even the bell hop delivered my belongings with a warm smile and a big bow. The room is thoughtfully designed and the harbour view from the room was breath taking. It was then I realised how beautiful Singapore is. Drinks at the Skai lounge was relaxing with a nice ambience and magnificent View. Breakfast at the Clove was awesome too. Spread was good and service was efficient. Overall, it was a perfect 10 stay and I will go back to the hotel again for my next stay without doubts.

title: Lovely Hotel in great location
desc: We were transferred to the Stamford when our cruise was cancelled, all the staff at the hotel were so friendly and helpful.. They and the Hotel made it a special short stay under difficult circiirmstances. We had lovley views from our room of Marina Bay, The hotel is a short walk from Boat and Clarke Quay's which has some nice bars to sit out and have a drink, City Hall MRT station was on hand to get around also, We would definately recommend the hotel, we enjoyed a lovely meal also in Wooloomooloo Steakhouse with the hotel also. All in Thank you for a lovely stay!

title: First Class Hotel
desc: A cut above most of hotels in this category. Everywhere was perfectly clean. All of the staff were helpful and professional. The breakfast was first class with many choices. My only reservation was the price of the food in the hotel restaurants. With the competition for food outlets in Singapore, I'm surprised that any of the guests at the hotel dine in their restaurants. Adjacent to the hotel is Raffles City. There are restaurants on the ground floor that cater for every possible taste at a fraction of the hotel prices. After saying this, I suppose if you stay at a 4-5 star hotel you should expect to pay prices that reflect the status. In a nutshell, it is a first class hotel with first services. By all means enjoy the ambience, the welcome and the breakfast. However, unless

title: Always an amazing stay
desc: Swissotel The Stamford is our go-to for our staycations and celebrations. Rooms are always very well kept, clean and offers amazing views. Staff are very attentive, courteous and pleasant. They make sure that you're taken care of and you have everything that you need during your stay. They also provide a personalized experience which is a big plus for us. Adikin and the rest of the Exec Lounge staff are all so wonderful. One thing to note though is that the Executive Lounge has been renovated from our last visit. It's now spacious with more comfortable seats and way better overall look and feel. We're now contemplating when we'll be back.

title: Great hotel, great location, staff and management a fantastic advertisement for the hospitality industry and Accor brand
desc: Excellent room at hotel overlooking Singapore harbour great assistance by management on short notice after cruise problems. Nothing a problem for staff and professionally run hotel. Hotel executive level something to be undertaken.

title: Repeat experience
desc: I've stayed at the Stamford a few times before on business but this was the first time I'd been back since it's refurbishment and it has got even better. It's stylish and has a great range of facilities. One day I'll stay longer for a holiday.

title: Great View and Good Location
desc: We spent a night on Valentine's Day. Wife was very pleased with the room decoration I pre-order and she loves the harbor view. The kids loving the pool too. Staffs were helpful. Overall experence is satisfactory.

title: View üëç Location üëç Breakfast ü§¶‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è
desc: Gorgeous views (if overlooking the harbor), perfect location, dezent rooms but busy, loud breakfast, sometimes with annoyingly long lines till you get a table and in our experience something was always empty and it took ages until it was refilled (if at all} - e.g. bagels were really hard to get, sometimes just one self-service coffee station would work (for 100s of guests)

title: Great Location and overall pleasant Stay
desc: This is my first time to stay at Swissotel and stayed for 22 nights. The location is perfect, City Hall MRT and Raffles City Shopping is just a few steps away. The breakfast area is at Clove on level 2. The selection was very good and included live egg station, different varieties of bread, fruits, pancakes and you could also get local food like kaya toast and everything was well presented. The staff were friendly and helpful. Most impressed to meet Mr. Guna and Ms. Cherry in the Clove restaurant. Mr.Guna is professional and passionate and I think he is one of the manager at the Clove restaurant. I have noticed him supporting his team when guests makes unnecessary issues. Ms. Cherry is amazing and noticed she is always interacting with guests and happy in her job. In-room

title: Loved the harbour view!
desc: Stayed in a harbour view king room on 51st floor for 2 nights. It was well worth paying the extra for the view - it was stunning. The hotel felt like a real luxury on the way home after backpacking around Australia/New Zealand for 6 weeks. I had breakfast included in my room rate - there was a massive variety of food which was all fresh out when I went to the restaurant. I‚Äôm not sure I would pay extra specially to have the breakfast, but this is not a fault of the hotel, more that there are so many quick and cheap options nearby. Pool was also excellent. It was really easy to get the MRT from the airport and again to get to/from Marina Bay Sands and Gardens by the Bay. Taxi to the airport early-ish Saturday morning was around $25.

title: I think this is the best hotel I‚Äôve stayed at
desc: and I‚Äôve stayed in a lot of hotels. The rooms are immaculate with huge beds. Fantastic views too of Singapore. The shower is just..... like wow! You are actually glad this place is so hot & humid that you have to get at least 2 showers a day. Great bars & restaurants, again with superb views & not too crazy prices for an up market hotel. The little stuff also helps like, no plastic straws, no bottles of products in the bathrooms, just really nice refilled dispensers with top notch products. The way all these places need to be moving to. Stay here it‚Äôs fab

title: Singapore Happy Hours
desc: Excellent service throughout the hotel staff were very friendly and helpful, we would certainly stay again at this hotel. Location exceptional close to everything, metro station, bars restaurants, Raffles City, bus services, close by as well and Boat Quay and Clark Quay within 15 minutes walking distance. The Hotel Room was large and clean and serviced daily to a high standard. We would recommend this Hotel without hesitation and will certainly be staying there agaim hopefull inn the not too distant future.

title: SwissHotel in Singapore
desc: we did not stay long but the reception was very warm and friendly The rooms are superb with great amenities Had the best mushroom soup ever at the restaurant next to the lobby. Well worth it and would stay again

title: Well located and good stay
desc: Well located and a good stay very close from many shopping malls and the staff are very nice and Hotle is a very clean and very nice view, I am sure will come back again. Many thanks for hospitals and really very wonderful stay

title: Ms Beatrice
desc: Staff are approachable, friendly and very helpful. Only let down they forgot abt my extra towel but never the less... Swissotel Spore is my choice of stay! Excellent! Keep up the good job! Will be looking forward to my next stay!

title: Great weekend at Swisshotel The Stamford
desc: Spent a weekend from the 15th-17th Feb, despite all the bad news going around with the virus issue. The staff at the Swisshotel The Stamford took it to their best to deliver an impressive and impeccable weekend. Impressed with the level of service despite the manpower crunch and they really took every opportunity to be accommodating to us guest. Will definitely recommend this hotel without a doubt. Kudos to the service team making the weekend stay a memorable one. FB

title: Panoramic Views of Marina Bay Sands
desc: Best panoramic views of the Marina Bay Sands and skyline. Rooms are clean and modern, but nothing special. Hotel is large and connected to a mall. Pool area is good enough for a pleasurable day nap or reading break. We stayed here for the views and not much else and was satisfied with our stay. Breakfast was a mob scene but well run and cleanliness maintained, considering. Lots of food options and good enough.

title: Excellent hotel in prime location
desc: Highly recommend this hotel. Could not find fault with location or facilities. Quiet location and spotless facilities. Wonderful view of Singapore from our 23rd floor room. Would definitely stay here again.

title: Fantastic hotel
desc: The rooms are spacious and very comfortable. The location is great and access to the shopping centre attached is so handy. The facilities at the spa are awesome, sauna, steam room and cold plunge pool are devine.

title: Excellent view and location
desc: Stayed here in February 13-15 Hotel is highly technology. Room Swiss harbour view is excellent can see all favorite place that is a land mark of Singapore Merlion park and Marina bay sand etc. Hotel located in the popular view close to MRT city hall and Robinson department store. Recommended you all to get new experience at Swiss harbour view room.

title: A great stay in a room with a fantastic view
desc: Book a room on high floors. It will cost you a little bit but the view during the day and during the night is unpayable. Service is excellent on all levels. Try their restaurants and get even a reduction. Connected to malls is very easy to walk even when raining

title: 6 Day getaway
desc: This is a beautiful hotel, the rooms are large and very clean, we were lucky to have an ocean view room looking at the Marina Bay Hotel. The hotel was a perfect location for our time in Singapore, we were able to walk to all the attractions we wanted to visit. You are surrounded by quality shops and eateries, the complementary breakfast was a wonderful arrangement of foods from around the world, we actually tried new foods. We booked the High Tea which is served at a restaurant on the 70th floor, we can recommend this as a must do, the views are amazing and the high tea is beautiful.

title: Stopover on way to New Zealand
desc: Stayed 3 nights ,we had a lovely room overlooking the pool, which was very clean and had a very comfortable bed.The location was very good and we walked to most of the popular attractions, we enjoyed our visit very much .

title: luxury collection
desc: Our stay at the Swissotel The Stamford Singapore was splendid. The hotel is a luxury treat to guests. Rooms were spacious and tidy. View from the balcony is spectacular. Breakast buffet was delicious, lots of varieties to choose from. The free wifi works great. Swimming pool was so refreshing. The location of the hotel is so good because it is in the heart of the city. The staffs were friendly and very professional.

title: Perfect hotel, perfect location
desc: Great location, clean rooms, nice design, stunning harbour view! The stuff was really friendly and polite. Lovely and clean swimming pool. Really nice breakfast with many options! Generally we loved staying there and I highly recommend it!

title: An Excellent Experience
desc: Very well run property in a great part of Singapore. There are underground indoor connections to wide range shopping and eating places. The service was efficient and professional. Some great views from the rooms as well

title: Swissotel Singapore - excellent location, service, and hotel
desc: The hotel has an incredible location and the rooms are big and comfortable with great views. It is connected to the Raffles Center with great stores, next also to the Fairmont hotel, and a block from the Raffles hotel and the original Singapore Sling (which is worth the 41 Singapore dollars for the experience). It is two blocks from ChiJmes (lots of great restaurants and a beautiful old monastery that is now an events' hall), and the Catholic Cathedral. There is also a subway (MRT) station - City Hall, right next to the hotel. The pool area is very nice and with great views of the city. The restaurants and the bar are also great and with spectacular views of Singapore.

title: Elevated Experience on Level 65
desc: I've stayed in multiple Accor properties in Singapore, but nothing compares to the Swissotel The Stamford. The amazing staff at level 65 will ensure that your stay here will be nothing short but flawless, from the time you checked in to the very moment you check out. The personalised service and remembering my preferences is outstanding. Awesome views from the room and the lounge, especially at night ( looking at the Marina Bay)! Aside from the view, the suite was wonderful. Spacious and thoughtfully designed. Futuristic controls and overside bathtub. The absolute best part of our stay was meeting the staff of the Club Lounge. Divyya, the Club Lounge level Assistant manager and Stella, both are above professional. Both my boyfriend and I can say without any doubt that both

title: Comfortable stay in a Modern hotel, Very nice decor and staff
desc: Stayed for one night, but would choose to stay longer at this modern hotel for my next stay. Staff are friendly and helpful, room is very comfortable with windows floor to ceiling. Upon arrival you are welcome by door man and helpful concierge. Truly a good experience! Definitely recommend.

title: Swissotel Stamford Singapore
desc: What an excellent hotel. From start to finish we were made to feel welcome. Check in was very smooth and our cases, taken when we got out of the taxi, were already on their way to our room. I wasn‚Äôt too happy with the view from our room and called guest services to see what could be done - a few moments later a knock on the door and we were offered another room with a far better view. The room was very spacious and probably had the best pillows I have ever used - just so comfy. Bed was huge and also very comfortable indeed. Plenty of hanging space and why don‚Äôt other hotels have their room safes in a drawer opening upwards? We used the executive lounge on 65 and were given a very personal welcome every time we visited - superb views and such a relaxing atmosphere. Staff

title: Excellent service
desc: Good location. Service Excellent for lobby staffs, very friendly and knowledgeable. Restaurant and bar have nice view too. Nice hotel. Nice staffs. Nice restaurant. Nice bar. Reasonable price. Good for single traveller and family.

title: Great Location, Quality Rooms
desc: We stayed in a Premier Harbour View Room for five nights at the beginning of February at the end of a holiday in Thailand. We chose this hotel for its convenient location. We love to explore Singapore on foot and so, being above the MRT station of City Hall enables us to reach everywhere on the island to start our sightseeing. The room itself (20th floor) had magnificent views - endlessly changing skies and action to stare out at when taking a break to chill. We did have a glitch with the air conditioning (it was impossible to change the temperature), which was reported and, to which, repairs were attempted. When the issue recurred, we were immediately offered another room but I couldn't face packing and moving so we stayed put for the final two nights and managed to find a

title: Luxury and location
desc: Location made it easy to get around Views of the harbour are fantastic Staff in the club lounge were professional polite and caring Rooms clean and spacious A great place Upgrade to club room if you can

title: Very nice hotel, great facilities & location
desc: Stayed here for 4 nights as my wife had a business meeting in Singapore. This property is part of the City Hall development so it's kind of in the midst of town, but not quite. Convenient for public transport foe the City Hall MRT station is a short walk with the Esplanade station a little further, but via covered walkways. Also there is a massive food court in the basement of the property and there are numerous up-market eats within short walking distance. Small but important pointer for the Hotel management. We stayed in room 4663 and the hot/cold water for the shower is plumbed the incorrect way round. Dangerous if you have kids of people with disability.

title: Magnificent views
desc: A lovely place to stay. The staff are great, very friendly and helpful. The views over Marina Bay and the harbour were wonderful. The food was very tasty. There was a wide selection for breakfast. The rooms were spacious and well appointed.

title: Staycation
desc: Stayed over the weekend 14 to 16 February with family. The room is clean and spacious. Staff from front desk, housekeeping and concierge are friendly and attentive. Good breakfast spread at the Clove. Good location. Overall will stay again.

title: A Place staying worth
desc: Very beautiful view of harbour, friendly staff, centrallt located, all amenties near by it's worth staying there. Beautifully designed rooms with perferct rooms service with immediate attention and to do positive attitude.

title: Disappointed Stay as Housekeeping took long hours to clean the room
desc: Stayed for 3N and every day Housekeeping took hours to clean the room. Understand that hotel will be getting their staff to go on leave in view of low occupancy during these period but hotel should still manage their manpower as this issue was not present in another hotel during this period as well. Regardless what time we went out for breakfast (8 plus, 9 plus or 10 plus) our room will only be available after 3pm! This is way too long! Didn't expect such standard in a 5 stars hotel.

title: Location and view.
desc: Very comfortable and the best view over the harbour from our 55th floor room. Awesome location, handy for shopping and places to eat. The bar downstairs is one of the best around. No problem recommending this place.

title: 5 Star Anniversary
desc: Stay a night here at Swissotel during my anniversary and it was perfect from check in to check out. Elsa (I might have gotten the name wrong but its along the same line) who checked us in was really lovely to wish us happy anniversary, offered us a room to check in at 1pm and even extended a late check out till 3pm that day. Room was spacious and nicely equipped. A large double bed (Hollywood Twin), a 55inch TV, coffee machine and etc were all available and the view from the room was spectacular. Upon returning to the room later that afternoon, we recieve a complimentary cake and anniversary greeting card from the Duty Manager, Roman Trubitsyn. Thanks for that! Overall, the service was exceptional and I had enjoy this short 1 night stay and will definitely be back! While the

title: Lovely hotel, excellent customer care.
desc: I stayed at this hotel between end of Feb to early March 2020. The staff were very attentive and efficient. Anti bacterial gel was provided in all general area for example at the lift, and in the breakfast room. The reception area was refurbished and looks amazing. There's a new cafe in the lounge, an amazing tea place with all types of tea, pastries and good food. It is a gem. The rooms were refurbished too, but I feel like the colours used especially in the hotel corridors are to dull and sad. Plus the corridors had a damp smell, not sure if it was due to a water leakage under the carpeting. They might have to check that out. All in all I enjoyed my stay, forward to visiting soon, hopefully.

title: Fabulous Hotel
desc: This hotel never fails to impress. The staff are exceptional. The hotel rooms are spacious and comfortable and the Executive Club on Level 65 is fabulous. We are treated like old friends when we return to"The Stamford" and always look forward to staying there. The location is perfect too!

title: Great hotel for tourists not for locals
desc: Guests who drives are discouraged from booking this room as there isnt any complimentary parking. Recommend to stay at other hotel within the vicinity as it is cheaper and has parking lot for hotel guests.

title: Birthday Staycation
desc: Instead of going overseas for the birthday celebration, we choose to stay home and have a birthday staycation instead. Everything was perfect - a personalised birthday card and cake was sent to the room after we checked in. Birthday dinner at Mikuni ended with a surprise birthday dessert. We will not hesitate to take another staycation at Swissotel The Stamford again.

title: Abit ex without the tub.
desc: It's a nice and comfortable hotel to stay, but abit disappointed with no tub now. Check-in and check out was easy. Near to many shopping areas and good food. Traveling around was convenient, do note that the car parking is not cheap.

title: Wonderful Experience
desc: We only had one night and the Hotel really surpassed our expectations. As we only had one night we upgraded to suite this was at a premium but the views from 66th Floor was priceless. The suite was wonderful, location just great and staff very kind and welcoming. Breakfast on 1st level had everything anyone could possibly want.

title: Simply Stunning
desc: Hi just recently returned from a 10 night stay at The Swissotel Stamford. Singapore being on my bucket list. So carefully researched and done my homework in choosing this particular hotel. I know some people would say well a hotel is just somewhere to get your head down. Trust me this hotel adds to your overall experience of this fabulous city. After a tiresome 14hr flight from the UK (Not to mention total travelling time) we arrived to be met and great by friendly smiling staff who ensured our check in was super smooth. We were then transported to the 55th floor and shown to our room.Upon entering our super clean spacious modern room I opened the curtains to reveal an absolutely stunning view of the harbour /marina and vistas across the city. From that point on those curtains

title: 1 night stay at Swissotel the Stamford
desc: It's been a long time since I stayed in the hotel and they had a massive renovation in terms of the room. Very modern and looks new. Location is fantastic (right above City Hall MRT station which is central and connects both the East-West and North-South lines). Great view of Marina Bay Sands area (if possible, book a Harbour view room and request for room series 53 for the best view). Was plesantly upgraded to an Executive room with Lounge access. Lounge is spacious and food had a good variety. The lounge even serves Champagne Laurent-Perrier (if i'm not mistaken) during the daily 530-730pm Happy hour. Truly value for money and slightly less expensive compared to Fairmont hotel next door. Will definitely be back!

title: One Night stay with family after function
desc: We had an awesome experience despite one night stay after a long function that ended late the night. The next morning had a great breakfast at Level 65 lounge that was attended by friendly staffs like Adikin Wong who supported numerous family request for photos across the scenic Singapore view. Thank you and will be back.

title: Amazing hotel spotless beautiful staff
desc: Spotless hotel with beautiful views and exceptional staff. Hop on hop of bus stops outside with all major attractions accessible within a 15 to 20 minute ride including the gardens Kimi on the concierge desk was amazing highly recommend this hotel

title: Nice and comfortable
desc: Hi my family n I love staycation. Today is our first time staying at Swisstol The Stamford. From booking of stay to check in .. the experience is good. Staff are friendly and helpful. Room is clean and with splendid view. They gave us a COVID 19 survival kit too ... it‚Äôs so interesting .. comes with wipes , sanitizer , instant noodle and hot demand toilet paper üòÖ I‚Äôm happy and satisfied with it ... My family and I will come back again soon ^_^

title: Nice hotel
desc: Good location Near Mrt Big room Super view Nice bed Swimming pool good Fitness center ok One building with raffles city dan fairmont hotel. If u accor member get more discount dan facility. New renovated room...

title: Lovely view and spacious comfortable room
desc: I love the view, beautiful sea and city (MBS & Flyer view) and it looks mesmerizing at night. Room is spacious for a Premier room. There‚Äôs a sofa with work desk and swivel chair that can seat 3 people comfortably. The toilet is spacious although the flush for the WC didn‚Äôt work. It was quickly rectified by technician at night when I was back in my room. I enjoyed the Nespresso and TWG tea provided in room and during the day when I was out, house keeping staff came in and topped up the coffee capsules and left some Toblerone chocolates by the bed. The room furniture and bathroom fittings look and feel new. Bed feels clean although pillow is too soft for me. I did not check if a pillow menu was available before turning in. One thing that I thought could be improved was the print

title: Comfort. Luxury. Strategic Location
desc: Swissotel The Stamford Singapore is strategically located in the heart of Singapore with the MRT train station and other major transportation nodes at its doorstep. You need to try the comfort of the finest in Swiss hospitality, and Swissotel The Stamford is one of the tallest hotels in Southeast asia. Having an advantage of a prime location and its reputation, it is worth it to stay in Swissotel The Stamford to enjoy the world-class stay, dining, and entertainment. Design : 9 Cleanliness : 9 Service : 10 Facilities : 10 Location : 9 Food : 10 WiFi : 9 Health Protocol : 9 Price : 8 ‚≠êÔ∏è Total Score : 9.2 / 10 Over all, it is worth to stay at this hotel. enjoy!

title: Centrally located for business or pleasure
desc: Hotel right in middle of town close to markets, business, sites, train stations shops. It has many restaurants and bars, and a huge food court underneath. Perfect for business or pleasure and allows easy access to Singapore city

title: Late review, great stay during my SHN
desc: Fortunate to be assigned in Swissotel during my 14-day of SHN from December 26-January 9. Room was perfect and amenities was great, food was good although it took time for items to be delivered its understandable as it was the peak of SHN and there was a lot of guests. Thank you to all the staff working during this time of pandemic. Hope to come back once it open for staycation.

title: Days before Xmas
desc: Good location, good hotel, cleanliness of the room is marginal and the room service food is legalised theft. Other than that, good hotel and friendly staff that is very apologetic for all the shortcomings.

title: Could be great, but some silly annoying things
desc: the balcony is great, the curtains are blackout, the water pressure is good, Nespresso machine etc. but there are some issues: 1. you have to have working internet - mine drops out 20x a day at least 2. dont put a sensor above the bed that when you roll over in the night it switches all the lights on - the high tech solution was some duct tape 3. great rain shower, however the water ends up soaking the bathroom floor in a flood - the solution I figured out is to put the flannel as a barrier at the end of the shower screen.

title: Best thing about the stay was the view ‚Äì one of the best in Singapore!
desc: We served our SHN at Swissotel the Stamford which was a mixed bag in terms of experiences. Service (3 to 4-star) Check-in wasn‚Äôt particularly friendly - not really what we would expect of a 5-star establishment, but I suppose we were not the ‚Äòusual‚Äô profile of clients which the hotel is used to. Staff were very quick to deliver goods received externally to the room, which was much appreciated. They also tended to respond quickly to requests for additional toiletries, tea/ coffee supplies, and other requests. For instance, we had asked for cleaning supplies and the vacuum cleaner on a number of occasions so we could keep the room clean and these were supplied with no issues. While reception staff were helpful when we have phoned, attention to detail is poor. For instance,

title: Fabulous Hotel
desc: Awesome stay right across from Raffles Hotel - great views of the bay from our terrace and so central to everything we wanted to see. Also had direct access to the adjoining shopping mall and all air conditioned

title: Had a wonderful stay
desc: Service was good especially at the club lounges. Did a staycaytion and had a good time over 2 days. The pool was good for photo taking but really not much else. It wasn't too crowded though because of good safe distancing measures. Also found time to go to the gym, which has a good view of the bay. The breakfast place and club lounges are worth a go, and they have a good variety of food and drinks available.

title: 21 Days of SHN. I Don't Want To Leave!
desc: In May 2021, I spent 21 days as part of my SHN (Stay Home Notice) at Swisshotel The Stamford. The entire experience was very pleasant and organized. When the airport shuttle dropped me, a group of experienced staff members in full PPE helped guide me to check in, where I showed my paperwork, and selected the following day's meals. The room that I was given was extremely generous, with a balcony view of Marina Bay Sands and the CBD. I had a king sized bed, fridge, Nespresso machine, kettle, many towels and toiletries present. This is likely the nicest hotel room that I will stay in for a long time. All food orders are handled conveniently through a google form via QR code. There is also a highly active and friendly FB community of fellowing SHNers that I joined. We shared tips,

title: Excellent Hotel!
desc: Im so glad that i stayed here to serve the SHN room 905 to be exact! All is wonderful the room is clean kudos to Housekeeping for that. A balcony room with a nice view, Request was send promptly and fast. I will miss to stay here and i would like to say Thank you Swisshotel for making my stay comfortable and memorable üëèüèªüëèüèªüëèüèª

title: 14 days
desc: So I did my 14 day quarantine at this hotel. This hotel is incidentally where my high school prom was held, so it felt somewhat nostalgic to be back after all these years. I genuinely enjoyed my quarantine - the room was large and lovely and there was a balcony. It felt wonderful to be able to step onto the balcony and feel the hot and humid Singapore air (!) I requested vegan food and the staff tried their best to accommodate. Some meals were a hit while some were a miss (e.g. cold oatmeal with no toppings/a few slices of dry bread with jam). I loved the balanced Indian meals and the veganised local dishes (sweet and sour mock meat and even Omni meat). The customer service I experienced was great - staff were prompt at attending to my requests. The massive amounts of plastic

title: Amazing stay
desc: I was given the Hoyel for my quarantine stay on my return from Paris. Could not have asked for a better room. It was large with a balcony which I needed for my exercise. The work desk was perfect and could get allot done. The staff were fantastic and ensure I was comfortable through my entire stay. The bay view which I had was one Ai will never forget. Once COVID is over and regular tourism starts, I would highly recommend that visitors book this hotel on Singapore.

title: Impeccable service
desc: Just want to thanks Swissotel for doing a good job of caring for SHN guests! Good job! The service was impeccable and the room lovely. I enjoyed the food and the variety was good. Quality was also high. The service staff so polite and kind ! Kudos to all of you and special thanks to Eddy Tan who is senior manager that went beyond to make my visit a lovely restful and enjoyable quarantine! I even had the wonderful opportunity to watch the national day celebrations live! Majulah Singapore

title: Service with a heart - Renan
desc: I was sent to this hotel for my SHN by immigration, even though I needed medical attention at the hospital and had with me a doctor's medical letter. I was in pain with a knee injury and it was distressing that I was at first sent to my room (in a wheelchair) to begin my SHN. However, things became a lot better when I received a call from duty manager, Renan. Everyone I had met since I landed back home -- from airport immigration to hotel front desk -- were just simply doing their job and ticking off check-boxes. They were 'efficient'. But lacking in empathy and the human touch. Renan was different. He understood my predicament and made every effort to get me to the hospital so that I could get the medical attention I need. When one is served an SHN order, seeing a doctor is

title: Nice stay
desc: I had to spend 10 days self isolation in this hotel on arrival to Singapore. Extremly friendly staff made my stay easier. Great room with an even better view, highly reccommended. All the meals were served hot and on time. Highly reccommended.

title: Hotel Stayhome Notice
desc: Should I say we served SHN or had staycation. Our hotel allocated for SHN was Swissotel Stamford and we had such a relaxing stay, almost like a staycation. Staying at level 62, with awesome views, excellent staff service, they never missed to amaze us. We could ask for toasted bread, coffee, water, Milk without any additional charges. They would call us daily and check on how we are doing if everything was ok. Seriously never ever felt we were serving SHN. Kudos staff for taking good care of us. Thanks and salute all your world class service. I must call out smooth checkin and checkout as well. Once again thank you very much

title: Great Hotel with beautiful view
desc: Room big and clean. Beautiful MBS View from my room. Great service from staff. Executive lounge in 65th floor have great view too. Executive lounge serve every 5 to 7 everyday. Rhea and Ronald in lounge good in service. Many various breakfast too. They serve fresh fruit with standar ripe everyday which another hotel can't do this.

title: Birthday Retreat
desc: Kudos 1. Friendly and hospitality staffs! 2. Smooth and safe check in process! 3. Nice and comfy room! 4. Awesome lounge with nice drinks n food also the views! Will definitely re-visit again! Patrick

title: Living up to Swissotels Standard
desc: Stayed for a night in the premium harbour front view with lounge access. Room is up to date no signs on wear and tear and everything functions well with intuitive smart lighting options, view from the balcony is amazing with turn down service provided. No lack of electrical charging ports, the smart Samsung TV is a bonus addition with smart share and swivelable mount. Breakfast and evening cocktails at the lounge was simply pleasant, not crowded plenty of spaces to choose from with attentive staff like Zai serving us. He pays attention, and takes initiative to offer us assistances while giving us the privacy we require at times. The hotel and its amenities are amazing, but the hospitable services from Zai makes it perfect. Thank you for the lovely stay and experience.

title: Happy Return to the Swissotel The Stamford!
desc: After several years of painful travel restrictions, it was a delight to return to the Swissotel The Stamford. I have been staying in this hotel since 2004, and it was wonderful to see the renovations and updates of this urban oasis in Singapore. The hotel staff was helpful and accommodating - especially the excellent service of Ms Eddy Tan's team on the Executive Floor. A great place to stay in Singapore!

title: Nice, comfortable hotel
desc: Stayed with family. Very modern, well equipped rooms. Great location close to major sights. Service good. Pool/gym area and breakfast restaurant were a bit tired. On top of shopping mall with great food court. Nice place but felt a bit corporate for a holiday

title: Good staff, nice view
desc: We are very happy to stay at swissotel, hopefully we can come back soon. Good staff, nice view, strategic location, close to mrt station, good breakfast & lots of food choices. we love the hospitality

title: Business-like stay with no warmth or welcome...
desc: Came in and joined the queue... waited till my turn, got to the front desk and checked in - and that was the most extent of human interaction I received from the hotel. Security was very gruff-like and was more obsessed with us being vaccinated vs smiles or feelings of welcome. Usually, we could use our Accor benefits for breakfast. However, the hotel was full house so they exercised the option NOT to take us in as they are running full. I went to Front Desk to lodge a complaint but was told she cannot do anything as it was different departments - 'Hey... guests just see you as ONE hotel!' She did eventually apologise but only after I became heated up. The hotel had forgotten about service since they became a COVID hotel for a long time and became 'top down' like the government.

title: Good stay
desc: The place was clean and tidy. I stayed in the premium room with the harbour view which has a very nice view of the Merlion and Esplanade. They have a very well equipped gym. It is in a very good location, you can easily walk to MBS, Singapore Flyer, Suntec, Bugis and it is a few MRT stops from town.

title: Good Stay but Service Standards Can be Improved
desc: The + points: 1. Overall nice and big room overlooking the MBS area; 2. Friendly staff; 3. Nice spread of breakfast; 4. There are free balloons making, face painting, and rides to keep the children entertained. Cons: 1. Room service was slow. It took more than an hour to deliver extra towels and pillows. However, I understand this is a big hotel and it could be under-staffed. Since more tourists are coming to Singapore, it should start to hire more staff. 2. Process flow/understanding for the staff should be better improved - Complimentary welcome drinks: I was told by the check-in staff that I can just walk in to the 2 restaurants and quote my room number for my complimentary drinks. However, on the 2nd day when I wanted to redeem the complimentary drinks, I was told by

title: Beautiful Scenery and Cozy Room
desc: Received warm and polite services throughout my 3D2N stay. Booked the Premier Harbor View King, the view from the room was breathtaking. Love the clean and sleek furnish of the room, my favorite piece was the rocking sofa. the front desk was extremely helpful, especially when our car is a foreign plate without the IU Unit for parking, we were assured with clear instructions on the entry and exit of the carpark. Great to mention on their environmental effort, when the balcony door is open in the room, the aircon will be switch off automatically. I'm impressed with the technology. Thank You Swissotel Stamford. We hope to be back soon!

title: Swiss Hospitality At Swissotel The Stamford
desc: Most enjoyable stay at this remarkable Swissotel by Accor, under the close and warm care of DGR Eddy Tan and her entire team on Club floor (#65) as well as the Front Office Concierge Ian Pereira, Arman and their boys. Trip was made all the more memorable by the seamless attention shown us at four of their eight F&B outlets, this time, up on Skai (#69), Prego, Mikuni and House of W√®i Excellent food and super good service attention; couldn't ask for more. Thank you, ADFB Jie Ming, RM Leonardo, RM Paolo, RM Elaine Seng and RM Fion Foo.

title: Spacious, comfortable and clean rooms in a well location hotel with great service
desc: The hotel is very well located near the center of the commercial and cultural districts. Spacious and comfortable rooms. Excellent reception and concierge service. Good value for money. Would definitely recommend to anyone that wish to stay in this part of the city.

title: Unimpressive and Disappointing stay / Would not return!
desc: Unimpressive and Disappointing stay / Would not return! It was my husband‚Äôs and my first visit to Swissotel Stamford on the 22 April to 25 April 2022 to celebrate his 49th birthday. I had made a booking one-month in advance for a 3D2N stay via Expedia app for a Premier Harbour view room (although sadly there was no pool access entitled) for a good deal of $753.30. I had also specially requested for a complimentary cake and room decoration for the birthday celebration. We were delighted to receive a confirmation reply from a Swissotel staff on the 19 April via email that there will be a complimentary cake sent in to our room upon our check-in although Swissotel is unable to assist to decorate the room. However, our excitement came to a nought as soon as we arrived at the hotel

title: Excellent Experience For Our Anniversary Staycation
desc: Was looking around to get a booking for our anniversary staycation and finally decided on swissotel after our good experience with Fairmount and I must say Swissotel didn't disappoint as well. Checking in was a breeze! We spend merely a couple of minutes at the check in reception and we were off to our rooms. (I must say one of the smoothest check in we have had in our staycation experience!) Our room was spacious and the view was phenomenal! Next up was a quick bite and happy hour at the lounge, greeted by Zhiqi and Romulus who provided excellent services during our time there in the louge. We must say we were pleasantly surprised by the services they and their crew provided despite the crowd at that hour, another great experience! Last stop was to go out for retail therapy

title: Excellent stay
desc: My family had an excellent stay,location is very convenient as the hotel is connected to a few shopping mall and the MRT is just right around the corner, staff are very helpful compliment to Venessa and the team for their great service and will return to stay when ever we visit Singapore.

title: Best locality with plenty of good food
desc: Excellent hotel with the nicely touched room, and comfortable bed, simply love it. Everything is almost perfect except the light switches have limited control, should have a 3rd option, that is in between relaxed and fully lighted. The location is the best among most hotels, MRT connecting to various lines is just right beneath. As it is within Raffles city mall, you can find tonnes of good food simply everywhere. The only con is the swimming pools and gyms, look a bit worn out.

title: Great Service at the Exe Lounge
desc: Stay here during April22 for our Anniversary stay and given a room that facing the habour which is amazing. Large room, great amenities and also comfortable bed. The service at the lounge exceed the expectation. They will greet you by your name which is a big suprise to me. The setting and the environment at the lounge are the shout out. Me and my patner having a great time at the lounge during the evening cocktail. Their breakfast was awesome although have limited choice but is good enough. Thank you Ivan and his team for the great service. KUDOS and definetly will return.

title: Spore's best located hotel
desc: Stayed 3 nights at Swissotel and was warmly welcomed to check-in at Executive Lounge L65. The views were stunning almost as good as Skai restaurant. Special mentioned to Priscilla Osman for taking care of our little grandson who will be returning to celebrate his 3rd birthday end May.

title: Enjoy your stay at this hotel
desc: It has been a pleasure to know and choose this hotel for our vacation this time in Singapore. The hotel is very good, the room and the staff. Specially thanks to Bryan Keh at the registration and Desiree Ong at the concierge... they are very efficient and helpful also nice and friendly. Room service is very good.. everything is excellent. We will come backüòòüòòüëçüëçüëç

title: Amazing stay at Swissotel the Stamford!
desc: A huge shout out to Eddy, Ronald and the team at the lounge - they went above and beyond in every way and made me feel so welcome. The harbour view king room is beautifully appointed and was extremely comfortable and spacious. My only suggestion would be that the TV screen share system is updated to allow for iPhone compatibility. Can‚Äôt wait to stay here again!

title: Staycation
desc: Had a stay over the long weekend for a staycation with family. The club lounge was on level 65 with stunning view all round. Facilities are very new. Breakfast and evening canapes were included and the food were nice.

title: Well located, friendly staff members, but there are a few places to consider
desc: Room: Stayed in 2471, where all sockets except one were not functioning properly but we were tired so did not request to change room. The sockets were mostly loose and we woke up to realise devices weren‚Äôt charged much, intermittently had connection. Maintenance team should check all rooms more frequently as these problems would ruin the experience of many. Especially the bedside socket, the frame kept falling off. Balcony door seals can be improved as sound of the traffic can be heard. Balcony had a dead lizard throughout our stay, housekeeping should mop/wash the balcony too as it was very dusty. Breakfast: Breakfast was at ballroom, long waiting time for a table (approx 15-20 mins). Alternative is at Prego, quick to get a table (approx 5 mins) but insufficient service

title: Great stay at a reasonably-priced 5-star hotel
desc: We can only comment about the room as we didn't have time to use any other facilities or outlets in the hotel - ie was only a very short stay for us. We cannot fault the room at all - well-designed & came with all features as desired. I travel extensively due to my work & stay at many different hotels - so Swissotel Stamford will be placed amongst my top picks, as long as the room prices are maintained!

title: BEST VALENTINE EVER
desc: I had the privilege of visiting Singapore a few years and I went there for Valentine‚Äôs Day. Food was great, service was excellent and the views were out of this world. It was definitely worth every penny that was spent. I would definitely love to go back again

title: No drawers for storage, and the new renovation is a huge waste of space.
desc: At check in we were delightfully greeted by the team , back open after 2 years closed. As as some of the first guests we were looking forward to seeing the room. Extremely small bathroom, similar to a travel lodge. Not good for most people. Storage in the room is extremely poor, many will stop in Singapore as part of a trip and there is no room for bags. No drawers, just hanging space ! Not good for frequent travellers. Overall it was like a puzzle to work out how to organize, and had we have not been so tired , we would have moved hotel. I have stayed in many hotels in Singapore and although location is superb. It‚Äôs very hard to recommend this Accor property. Conrad and Pan Pacific are far more comfortable choices imo .

title: MILLION DOLLAR VIEW, GREAT ID, BEAUTIFUL LARGE SPACIOUS ROOM, GOOD LOCATION AND AWESOME TEAM
desc: I read someone complaining about the design but for someone who appreciate art over such trival matters, I congratulate the team for coming up with something different Hotel was closed for a 2 year renovation thus the room are new, designs is superb and customer experience is more than 5 star. Special mention to Andik and Abdul Hamid at the front desk. We arrived at 2am, tired, sleep and not in the best mood. Andik however welcome us with great smiles, cheerful personality. He even manage some jokes to make us laugh and make us forget our tiredness. Usually, I am the one who try to cheer the hotel front desk staffs as very often, they meet guests who are travelling and not the best of moods. Seeing we were Accor plus members for almost 2 decades, he upgraded us to the

title: Less than stellar
desc: The room has a lovely view. The sheets are nice. But there are some lapses for a five star, luxury hotel. The line to check in can look like Disneyland, with velvet ropes and an endless twisting queue. the hotel has 1250 rooms and should have a plan to deal with this so that checkin is speedy. We arrived late after a full day of travel. To get a roll away for our son took four requests and more than an hour. We were exhausted by the time it finally showed up. The AC in the rooms will not go below 70-degrees Farenheight/21-degrees Celsius, which is hot for sleeping under covers. No other hotel on this trip limited AC in this way. Also, the hotel does not do daily housekeeping to clean rooms and make beds. The excuse is that this policy is ‚Äúbecause of Covid.‚Äù All hotels on our

title: We had a wonderful stay!
desc: We stayed at the wonderful Crest Suite Room number 6458 with an amazing view! The room is spacious, clean, comfortable, with great amenities and powerful hair dryer! The club lounge is amazing huge! I enjoyed the breakfast and the evening cocktail at the lounge with the very attentive and helpful staff. Eddy and Zai made the stay experience must better too, we are happy to meet them during our stay! Overall we recommend to stay at this hotel, great location, affordable room rate, clean and comfortable!

title: Swissotel The Stamford
desc: A staycation that was not deliberate plan for, (16-17 April) but was postponed a few times due to govnt extended SHB dedicated facility. We decided to go car free for this stay, here we are by train. It is easy if you come from Changi Airport too. Arrived at hotel, for this stay. Maybe due to covid-19, check in were hidden a way. We received both impeccable services and also some who judge. But come on, we are humans right? :p Allow me to share those whom we met and interact with Front desk Mr Abdul Hamid, Ms Cess as we arrived early around 11am, we waited patiently in line with the crowd that were checking out. Hamid explains that we can get an earlier check-in but will be base on availability, not the room we have requested. He offer us the choice if we like for

title: THE BEST IN SINGAPORE
desc: Went to Singapore for our honeymoon and may I see, the BEST service we have ever received out of 15 countries we have visited. The staff here are so welcoming, bubbly and always happy to help. Shoutout to Desiree who consistently helped us during our honeymoon with advice on where to go and organising our dinners to places. All staff are extremely helpful. We were in room 4570 and the views from the room were stunning and super clean. This hotel is also 5-15 minutes away from everything and grab cars are always 1-3 minutes away from when you order them. Extremely recommend staying here when in singapore.

title: Compliment hotel front desk staff
desc: I would like to take this opportunity to compliment Andie Ismail on the outstanding customer service he provided to me on my family staycation . He was very friendly ,accommodating and professional when I approached the front desk for my hotel check in . Thank you and keep up the good job .

title: Excellent propery but check in lines were huge!
desc: Really enjoyed my first ever stay here. Beautiful room and amazing view. Super comfy bed and shower and bath were great. Executive Lounge was great for breakfast and evening cocktails - the service by Eddy there was excellent. The Skai Bar is a stunning place for a drink. However, the check in/out process was awful with huge lines. No priority desk for high level members (I'm Platinum). I asked if I could check in at the executive lounge but wasn't allowed. This needs to be sorted out. Other than that, an excellent hotel and I will definitely come back if the check in process improves.

title: Swiss hospitality in the heart of Singapore
desc: I got spectacular bayfront view at 59th floor, i let my room window curtain open in order not to miss this wonderful marina bay sand, Singapore flier, esplanade and Parliament building view from my room, excellent hospitality of 65th lounge team who helped me to fix my laptop connection problems and assist me in offering food and drink so i can work and have meeting with my partner and daughter along the days. Definitely will come back again when i visit Singapore.

title: Home Sweet Home
desc: The most adorable and lovely place to enjoy your stay in Singapore by getting the one and only ‚Äûhome sweet home‚Äú feeling has finally opened and can hardly wait for welcoming its guests. The heartfelt greetings to Marcus Hanna, Eddy Tan, Norman Leong, as well Rhea, Ronald and the entire Swissotel The Stamford team from the whole family, just being again and again your happy guests!!!

title: Best Location, Room very spacious for SG
desc: Location is best as it is beside City Hall MRT. Easily accessible and in the same vicinity as Raffles City Shopping Centre. Chijmes is also just around the corner. Walking distance to Suntec city too! Rooms are very spacious at 40sqm! That‚Äôs big for SG hotels. Staff are very friendly as well and accommodating.

title: Great Hospitality during our Stay at the Swissotel the Stamford Singapore
desc: It has been really nice staying at the Swissotel the Stamford over the past week. We‚Äôve stayed here several times during our trips to Singapore since many years ago. A very great place to stay in Singapore and excellent service as always. Last week my grandparents accidentally lost their bag and passports in Orchard and it was the night before our departure to our home country. They just realised it when we got back to the hotel in the late evening. We asked for help to the hotel staff to call many parties visited by our family earlier that day. The staff also helped us trace when the last time our grandparents brought the bag. Long story short, my grandparents finally found the bag and passports with all the helps from the Swissotel team. We would like to thank the staff so

title: Singapore is alive, Swissotel Stamford amazing, Eddy, Rhea & Ronald in the Club Lounge brilliant!!
desc: After a couple of years of lockdowns what could be better than a trip to Singapore. The Swissotel Stamford ticked all our boxes. Staying in an Executive Suite with Club Lounge access is a must. Eddy (Lounge Manager), Rhea, Ronald and team were amazing in the club lounge. Their friendly and welcoming service was second to none. The breakfasts and happy hours were awesome. If your looking for a central location, right next to the train station, shopping and access to all things tourist then this is the place I would have to say after the many years of travelling the world, that the welcoming we received and the fact that the staff couldn't be more helpful made our trip one of the most memorable. Singapore is well and truly alive, go on spoil yourself!!

title: Comfortable room with an amazing view at a great location
desc: The higher floors have an amazing view of Singapore. The suite was spacious and had 2 toilets. Comfortable beds and amenities. Service was excellent. The location is ideal because the hotel is part of a shopping complex and is linked to a train station. Staff are friendly and helpful. Andik helped me get a parking coupon, which saved me lots of money. The only negative experience was the wait to check in.

title: Family Staycation Weekend
desc: Had a great experience with the family and the location was good. the staffs were attentive and they have made our stay enjoyable. The breakfast had a good range of choices but I do still miss the options to enjoy other hotel restaurants within. An area for improvement, do provide family on staycation with complimentary carpark. We had stayed in Fairmount (same great experience) and they had offered us such gesture which encourage us to go back to them.

title: Wonderful stay in Swissotel the Stamford
desc: The staffs were super ready to welcome us, we didn't know that Swissotel was closed for quite some time, and we checked in on the first day of reopening. Very warm welcome from front office duty manager to restaurant manager. All the facilities were still in excellent condition and we enjoyed the beautiful views from our Swiss Harbour View room and dining on level 65 and 70.

title: Rest & Relax @ Swissotel
desc: Had a wonderful stay at Swissotel to celebrate two special occasions such as Mother's Day and my daughter's 21st birthday. Overall, check in process went smoothly and there was no issue in terms of the condition of the rooms. The view from the room facing the Marina Bay Sands was amazing and beautiful at night. Location wise, definitely convenient for us to head down to the malls within the area to shop and dine. Room service deployed staff was efficient and fast in satisfying our requests for towels and blankets. Would recommend Swissotel to friends and family because the room is spacious and the food options provided met our dietary needs eg. Halal.

title: Location! Location! Location!
desc: Great hotel with location, location, location! View from rooms was spectacular and having fresh air on the private balcony was reassuring during pandemic times. Air Conditioning needed to be cooler as it was too warm to sleep at night despite AC being on coldest setting.

title: Great location, brilliant views but large and impersonal
desc: To be honest I was disappointed overall - a large, corporate feeling hotel. Reception area is wholly inadequate, meaning often Q's to check in or check out. (6 desks often manned by 2 or 3 staff). Not enough space here. No mention was made of breakfast facility or cost when we checked in. Coffee shop on ground floor has restricted hours - Skai bar closed Mon-Wed but no sign at the lift entrance so you don't know that until you go up there ! The only bar option is next door at the Fairmont. Gym and spa area badly needs upgraded - simply not good enough for a 5 star hotel. Pool area not great with the bit that gets sun some of the day being the kids pool while the larger pool is in the shade all day. Room wasn't made up first night. Just not good enough and yet still

title: No free parking. Valet service not automatically offered. Had to check online under 1 of the reviews to discover.
desc: Location of the hotel is good- directly above cityhall MRT. Room service is good- room cleaning staff are patient, polite and professional. Area of improvement will be the "check in counter" service staff- we stayed for 2 nights over the weekdays. Asked about free parking and staff just said no because the carpark is under another management (but so is Marina Square and its 3 hotels under different management like Pan Pacific which gives free parking). Anyway, staff did not offer valet service (the valet parking is so NOT full), for both days that we checked whether there's free parking at the vicinity. In conclusion, just get pass the check in counter staff and process and the stay will be an enjoyable one.

title: Poor services, but nice views
desc: Booked Executive Club Room with lounge benefits. Would not recommend if you like top-notch service. The main enjoyment of stay is great view in balcony and lounge. Positive: Location of hotel is great! I personally liked the initial fast email and call response, which I felt they honest (special thanks to Gita for arranging early check-in). Room is big, clean and nice with a great view, especially if get allocated to those with UOB/River or Harbour view rooms, which can see almost to the end of the Singapore. Pool and facilities are good to use, and there is also a Table Tennis and small gym on Level 65 lounge which is interesting. Lounge at level 65 is relaxing, and have variety of food in Buffet style for both breakfast and evening cocktail session. Negative: The service is

title: Excellent location.
desc: Bright and spacious room, a variety of essential amenities provided. Friendly and helpful front desk staffs. Ease of checking in and checking out. Very efficient house keeping team. Excellent food and beverage outlets.

title: Excellent room view and service!
desc: Great room view, prompt service rendered, clean room and convenient location! Room abit small. Breakfast food quality can be improved. Personalized name remembered when called for service. Efficient service staff at all touch points.

title: Can't wait to make a return
desc: On Fri 20th May 2022, we had the luxury and definitely a privilege to have the (long overdue) opportunity to stay a night at the Swissotel Singapore. It was simply a joy to (just) walk through the all familiar and cozy lobby (which was closed to the general public for the past two years). From the moment we arrived at the driveway right up to the check-in experience, you know you have made the right decision to return "home" at the Swissotel. We wanted to check out the Club Lounge *Level 65, for future reference and we were so very pleased we did just that and Ronald was truly hospitable in showing us around the awe-inspiring & jaw-dropping view from the 65th level of the highest hotel in Singapore. One night was definitely way too short to kick back and make the best of the

title: Incredible stay
desc: Arrived swissotel the stamford from the airport around 12.30pm and surprisingly, the check in counter was quiet packed (not sure the counter was busy with check in or check out) and to my surprise, my room was ready and they let me in at 12.30 (without the need to beg the FO). Very good way to start my holiday! The check in process and staff were very friendly even though i must admit the check in process took quiet long. The room assigned was also faboulous, directly facing MBS which is a million dollar view room. As a Platinum member, i was upgraded to Executive room Harbour view which is incredible and i cant thank the team enough for assigning me with the room. The room is new, neat and very comfy and really feels at home. The executive lounge also provides very tasty

title: Breakfast is unpleasant
desc: Most of the time, breakfast is crowded. Front desk crew greets and asks for room number and check for available seats, then another crew will lead the way. This typically takes 1~3 minutes per guess/group. Imagine you are queued at the 5th or later, it can take up to 15 mins. For people like me on business trip, breakfast time is usually short and quick, this is really something to be improved.

title: Excellent hotel in the perfect location
desc: We couldn't fault the hotel in any way at all. We spent 3 nights here at the start of our honeymoon. The rooms were clean and spacious. We booked a harbour view room on a high floor, so the views were fabulous. The pool was clean and although it was small, we didnt find it busy when we used it. The staff were all very polite and helpful (even when we checked out at 3am). The location was great- attached to raffles city centre and within close proximity to some of thr tourist attractions. Would highly recommend this hotel.

title: well located,, very clean,, staff excellent and very polite,,,
desc: Excellent hotel outstanding view over the bay room always kept clean on a daily basics by housekeeping Breakfast ,,Lunch ,, Dinner all excellent Next time in Singapore it will be the Stamford Hotel for me

title: Good stay but noisy on the first night
desc: Overall is a good stay. But on first night, there was outdoor movie at the SRC and it was blasting at full volume till 11pm. It affected my family sleep (we stayed at 20th level). Pool was nice, and pool attendant (Joe) was attentive.

title: Excellent Hotel in Singapore
desc: Was disappointed that the Swissotel Merchant Court closed down, so I figured I would try this one out. Was not disappointed. Excellent views, excellent rooms, strategic locations, and excellent breakfast. Staff were warm, Polite, and professional.

title: Well located
desc: Well located and good stay. this is the convenient place that I can buy some things, and gift because the mall is in your hotel. But it should have some relax services (e.g. gyms, swimming pool, ...).

title: Work trip, excellent stay
desc: Excellent stay and food, hospitable staff and chefs. The front desk was professional, the location is central and ideal for business trip. We did develop allergies and the local food uses a lot of egg and fish paste, but when informed effort was made by the staff to accommodate our allergy and food intolerance to the best of their available resources. Thank you for that.

title: Great option
desc: It has excellent service and staff, a hotel with very good rooms with excellent views and very comfortable. A five-star service and impeccable facilities and very well located. They make you feel very good and try to make your stay very pleasant

title: Extremely bad experience
desc: r nights stay, spent 3 days talking to front desk about the payment they claimed i did not make, when in fact, it was them 1) not charging the approved amount & 2) overcharging + double charging for the stay. Maybe i was an easy target since i purchased at a discount (promotion) via Accor app. Wasted time talking to front desk everyday about the charges they kept slapping on my credit card. Only felt relieved when i check-ed out because they finally got their finance regarding my charges in order. Did not even get to enjoy any facilities.

title: happy holiday
desc: the best hotel i‚Äôve ever stayed in singapore. the staffs are very nice,helpful and the room, it has the best view.you can enjoy breakfast and dinner everyday if you are platinum member and they have a great executive lounge.

title: Excellent stay and service.
desc: We stayed at the hotel from 20/05/22 to 22/05/22 for leisure and the experience was excellent. All our requests were promptly adhered and the staffs were courteous and friendly. Specially commendable was Miss Elizabeth Tan who assisted us with the check in. She was professional and attentive to details and recommended the right room to us. We were really happy with the arrangement and the view was amazing. Thank you Elizabeth.

title: Excellent service with a smile post covid and the public holiday rush!
desc: Had a very pleasant stay for almost a week at the Swissotel Stamford. Was greeted by very helpful & friendly staff at both the reception and concierge on arrival despite the public holiday rush. The spacious room certainly met my expectations with a spectacular view! The room service staff and housekeeping were very prompt and accommodating. Needed to wrap a gift at the last minute and the housekeeping staff managed to source some ribbon for me to make it look presentable :) Also the 'green initiative' in relation to servicing the rooms was very clever and will certainly help the environment. Loved the inhouse restaurants and bars especially the staff at the Anti:dote bar at the Fairmont. Cocktails with a smile! :) Loved my stay and will certainly be recommending this to

title: Great service
