desc: Great hotel and convenient location. The service from the staff was the best part. I arrived in the middle of the night after a long flight and my room was ready to go. Perfect. I would definitely stay again.

title: Great service from Desiree and Clarence
desc: My wife and I are holidaying from Australia in Singapore and visited the TripAdvisor site at the Swissotel Hotel (Town Hall ) which also serves as the Tourist Visitor Centre As we did not have data on a phone and we wanted to book to go to the night safari at the zoo we needed help. We met Desiree and Clarence who where manning the information centre. I cannot speak highly enough of them and the effort they went to to make sure it all happened for us.They even went out of the way to endeavour to make bookings for the different attractions at the night safari.( booking the night show and also the train ride) We were staying at a different Swissotel but this did not bother them. Thank you very much Desiree and Clarence. Deon and Suzie Omond Portarlington Victoria Australia

title: VERY NICE Stay
desc: Alot of good hotels in the area but this one is extravagant! People are friendly, proximity is good! Train station is very close as well as the amenities and facilities it all provided a nice and comfortable stay for 2 montgs of staying swissotel stamford provided a really delightdul experience. Commending Mr Hanafi of the front desk who was very helpful from check in day up to check out day. He has all the knowledge on the hotel processes and all and he is very helpful the best way he can. Job well done sir!

title: Great service staff and view
desc: Excellent service provided by Reception staff Ms. Yijie. Nice and clean room. Extra point added - Beautiful view from the room and room comes with a bathtub. Huge room size with well-placed furnishings. Can see Marina Bay Sand, Merlion and Padang view from my room. That is amazing view that i can said!

title: Great location to everything and first class hotel
desc: Our family stayed 3 nights travelling from Europe to Australia and from the time we checked in until when we checked out the customer service was exceptional. We especially like the breakfast buffet and having cocktails/drinks around the pool!

title: Great to be back in Swissotel Stamford again
desc: Enjoyed the stay as a platinum member. Upgraded our room to harbour view (#56), nice view. Good to have access to the lounge and breakfast catered. Hotel should consider online pre-registration instead of doing it on-site which takes a lot more time. Also did not see VIP queue available for check-in. Will be back again soon for more staycations.

title: Nice Hotel in a very strategic location
desc: The location is very nice and strategic as it is in the center of Singapore down town and connected to Raffles City Mall and right on City Hall MRT Station. Very easy access to Esplanade as well as Suntec City, so, connectivity is very convenient. This is my first time staying in Swissotel The Stamford. In the beginning I was worried that the hotel is quite old already, but it is not shown. In fact the hotel is very nice with a nice bed room as well. Being Platinum member I have access to Executive Lounge which is very nice and overseeing the Marina Bay, beautiful scenery. Having breakfast at Executive Lounge is also very nice and more quite compare to the restaurant. Although food variety is not that many in Executive Lounge, but it is very peaceful having breakfast there. The

title: Good Hotel - Very Bad Food
desc: The Swissotel Stamford is a fairly standard 5 star Hotel. The location is good, if you want to be near the city centre. The Breakfasts were truly awful, certainly the worst of any 5 star hotel that I have stayed at. Outside that, the other restaurants at the hotel were OK, but relatively expensive.

title: Mother's Day 2022 Staycation
desc: I booked Swissotel the Stamford on 8th May to celebrate Mother's Day. Was my first time accommodating Swissotel the Stamford, overall service is worth it for me to compliment the staffs who are indeed an asset to the hotel. Upon check-in attended by the Duty Manager Darren, he was prompt and friendly and able to fulfill my request when I asked for high storey room (Because my mom is into scenery). Upon entering the room, NiuNiu welcomed me with a sweet note wishing Happy Mother's Day to my mom by Ivan Tee, she's impressed. But the room, unfortunately, is facing the city (my bad.....I forgot to request for a view facing the sea), so I called to try my luck, throughout I was attended by Ivan Tee who later got to know is an Assistant Front Office Manager, despite the busy period,

title: Excellent Location
desc: Hotel is very nice, staff very courteous, our room was a Premier with balcony overlooking the Harbour and Gardens - absolutely wonderful. Location with Raffles City next door was handy; the City Hall MRT at the door step which runs straight to ION - no changing lines

title: Best Location and City View in Singapore
desc: The hotel is nicely appointed and clean. The Staffs are nice and always eager to help. Unfortunately I didn't have breakfast in the hotel, but since the location is in the same complex as City Hall MRT and Raffles City Mall, than it is very easy to find any kind of food, from Asian to Western. Some of the food stalls open at 7.30 PM, so no worry about having your belly empty. In short, if you want a comfortable stay, both inside the nice room and because of the location, then this is the hotel for you.

title: 2nd staycation, absolutely exclusive expericence for Accor platinum members
desc: It was the 2nd time I stayed in Swissotel, this time as an Accor Platinum member rather than the previously Gold member. You can tell Platinum membership is recognised with all the exclusive benefits. You get a higher executive floor with magnificant view, you got inclusive breakfast at executive lounge with 360 degree view of Marina Bay (it is even higher than MBS), you got the daily cocktail session, you got late check-outs and all the personalized services. The whole family absoultely enjoyed the stay and every bit of the details of the hotel, e.g. the modern renovation, the customized leather furnitures, the interaction with the staff, and foremost, the Gym room and the Ping Pong room. Thank you Swissotel team for the memoriable experience and look forward to visiting you

title:
RETURN TRAVELLERS WELCOMED
LIKE ROYALTY
desc: Thanks Desiree Ong and Chelsea for ensuring our return visit to Swissotel the Stamford in Singapore was exceptional. Your assistance with our change of venue was swift. The room you gave Us was jaw dropping Who wouldn‚Äôt want a direct view to marina bay and all its glittering lights. Thanks to the executive lounge staff teddy and her team. Thanks for a few laughs at cocktail hour Zai. Thanks for everything. We‚Äôll be back

title: Great location, amazing view from balcony
desc: Great location and amazing view from the room. Some helpful staff, good food. Some staff needs re training on hospitality side. The room cleaned perfectly. They dont use single plastic bottle for soap anymore. Which is a plus.

title: Professional, friendly and helpful team
desc: Ms Eddy from the Club Lounge went above and beyond to assist me with logistics while in Singapore, she's very pleasant and made our stay more memorable. She is definitely the best ambassador for the Hotel. Room was nicely lit and nice ambiance, clean and perfect view of Singapore iconic buildings and lightings The housekeeping team did a great job and patiently waited with our "do not disturb" signs The check-in team are also friendly and helpful. Location is perfectly located to have night walk and close to restaurants and bars.

title: Good stay, well located
desc: Great room very nice located and as I requested. The only point is that the breakfast needs to be a better and take into consideration allergies!!! I am gluten intolerant and it was very difficult to find what I can and what I can't eat. However, the room was great clean and with amazing view of the city.

title: Family Holiday
desc: Memoriable and High impression during stay in the hotel. Easy to access to the Mall/store, the joging area and Nice place around the hotel. We really enjoy to see the view from the hotel especially night view.

title: always a great hotel to stay
desc: My wife and I always stay at your hotel because of so many reasons. The location, the rooms, the view, the friendly and very helpful staff amongst others . and with the MRT being downstairs that is terrific

title: Beautiful View
desc: Took the Harbour View room and it overlook Marina Bay Sands and Singapore Flyer, its just amazing. I could sit in the room the whole day to just enjoy the view. The team were excellent, especially breakfast team. Super busy yet remain calm and friendly.

title: Much needed break
desc: We enjoyed ourselves at Swissotel so much. Relaxing at level 65 is the best cos the staff is friendly and thoughtful whenever we pop up for drinks or a snack. Especially Ronald S. who makes perfect cocktails. The vibe is very chill. Room service is prompt. Front desk is efficient. Concierge is helpful and attentive. What more could I ask for! Oh wait! It's walking distance to lots of attractions and other good eats! And the MRT is right here too! House of Wei serves good food. Must try! In fact we are gonna show some new friends we made where to get the best duck!

title: Not a good experience
desc: We booked through Accor and it was a big mistake. It looks like the charges were made in US dollar hence there‚Äôs a slight difference with the amount. What I‚Äôm not happy about is the multiple charges made on my credit card. Stamford can‚Äôt see the payment I made online despite of showing them my credit card charges. They kept on saying it‚Äôs not billed. Usually on a 5 star hotels they sort out the billing on the spot but this is not the case for Stamford. It was handled like a 3 star hotel. I had to reach out to them to tell them about the multiple charges. No follow up from hotel. We also booked two rooms with harbour view and one of them had a bad view. The check in on online doesn‚Äôt work and when I reached the hotel I had to provide all the details again and took some time to

title: Stay for the views and great service
desc: This hotel has the best views of Singapore! We stayed here for just over a week in the middle of May while visiting family. The location is so convenient with one of the main MRT interchange stations downstairs. The rooms are well appointed, large and comfy, with amazing views. I loved standing out on the balcony in the morning with a coffee! The executive lounge is a really nice place to chill and relax, it offers almost a 360 degree view of downtown Singapore. The service by the staff is exceptional, a special shout-out to Eddy and Ronald who looked after us so well in the lounge! Having access to a 24 hour gym was a bonus, especially when we arrived late in the evening after travelling for over 20 hours. Definitely will return!

title: Fantastic hotel!
desc: My parents are currently staying at this hotel...it is their favourite hotel in Singapore! They chose the dates of their holiday to coincide with the re opening of Swissotel in early May after Covid restrictions were lifted. There are plenty of shops and eateries in this hotel complex which connects via underground walkways to other shopping centres. The MRT City Hall stop is located here, Orchard Rd is only two short stops away. The staff in the executive lounge are fantastic as are the views from almost all rooms of the hotel.
